æˆªå›¾æ¥è‡ªé»‘é©¬è¯¾ä»¶å’Œå°šç¡…è°·javawebè¯¾ä»¶

ä¸€.Springç®€ä»‹

1.Springæ˜¯ä»€ä¹ˆ

2.Springçš„ä¼˜åŠ¿

ï¼ˆ3ï¼‰æŒ‡çš„æ˜¯æ•°æ®åº“çš„äº‹ç‰©ç®¡ç†

ï¼ˆ4ï¼‰Springé›†æˆäº†junit

äºŒ.Springç¨‹åºå¼€å‘æ­¥éª¤

1.å¼€å‘æ­¥éª¤ä¸¾ä¾‹

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å›¾ä¸­çš„Serviceå±‚ä¸ç”¨å†åƒä»¥å‰javawebä¸€æ ·è‡ªå·±newä¸€ä¸ªDaoå±‚çš„å®ä¾‹å†è¿›è¡Œæ“ä½œï¼ŒSpringä¼šæ ¹æ®dæ ‡è¯†å¹¶é€šè¿‡xmlé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶çš„æ¥åˆ›å»ºå®ä¾‹ã€‚

2.Springå…¥é—¨å¼€å‘æ­¥éª¤ä»£ç ç¤ºä¾‹

æ­¥éª¤ï¼š

æœ€ç»ˆé¡¹ç›®çš„ç›®å½•ç»“æ„å¦‚ä¸‹:

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰åœ¨pom.xmlå¯¼å…¥åº”ç”¨ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡spring-contextã€‚

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Springé€šè¿‡åº”ç”¨ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡ï¼ˆApplication Contextï¼‰è£…è½½beançš„å®šä¹‰å¹¶æŠŠå®ƒä»¬ç»„è£…èµ·æ¥ã€‚Springåº”ç”¨ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡å…¨æƒè´Ÿè´£å¯¹è±¡çš„åˆ›å»ºå’Œç»„è£…ã€‚Springè‡ªå¸¦äº†å¤šç§åº”ç”¨ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡çš„å®ç°ï¼Œå®ƒä»¬ä¹‹é—´ä¸»è¦çš„åŒºåˆ«ä»…ä»…åœ¨äºå¦‚ä½•åŠ è½½é…ç½®ã€‚å…¶ä¸­ï¼š

ClassPathXmlApplicationContextï¼šä»ç±»è·¯å¾„ä¸‹çš„ä¸€ä¸ªæˆ–å¤šä¸ªXMLé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­åŠ  è½½ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡å®šä¹‰ï¼ŒæŠŠåº”ç”¨ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡çš„å®šä¹‰æ–‡ä»¶ä½œä¸ºç±»èµ„æºã€‚

åœ¨IDEAä¸­é…ç½®å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰åˆ›å»ºdao

(3)ã€ï¼ˆ4ï¼‰åˆ›å»ºå¹¶é…ç½®applicationContext.xml

(5)é€šè¿‡ApplicationContextå¯¹è±¡.getBean("id")åˆ›å»ºå“åº”çš„Beanå¯¹è±¡

è¿è¡Œç»“æœå¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

ä¸‰.Springé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶

1.Beanæ ‡ç­¾çš„åŸºæœ¬é…ç½®

3.1.1.idå’Œclasså±æ€§

![Beanæ ‡ç­¾çš„åŸºæœ¬é…ç½® ](https://xuanmai-typora.oss-cn-shenzhen.aliyuncs.com/Beanæ ‡ç­¾çš„åŸºæœ¬é…ç½® .png)

  • é»˜è®¤æƒ…å†µä¸‹ï¼ˆSingletonï¼‰ï¼Œå¤šæ¬¡è·å–åŒä¸€ä¸ªidçš„beanï¼Œå¾—åˆ°çš„å°†æ˜¯åŒä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ã€‚

3.1.2.scopeä½œç”¨èŒƒå›´å±æ€§

![Beanæ ‡ç­¾çš„åŸºæœ¬é…ç½®2 ](https://xuanmai-typora.oss-cn-shenzhen.aliyuncs.com/Beanæ ‡ç­¾çš„åŸºæœ¬é…ç½®2 .png)

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰singletonï¼š

ä»£ç æµ‹è¯•ï¼š

è¿è¡Œç»“æœï¼š

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â è¦æµ‹è¯•å¯¹è±¡æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªè¿˜æ˜¯å¤šä¸ªåœ¨å®¹å™¨å½“ä¸­ï¼Œåªè¦æµ‹ä¸€ä¸‹å®ƒçš„åœ°å€å°±è¡Œï¼Œå³æµ‹è¯•ä¸€ä¸‹userDao1å’ŒuserDao2çš„åœ°å€æ˜¯å¦ç›¸åŒã€‚æ ¹æ®ç»“æœæ˜¯ç›¸åŒçš„ã€‚

ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰prototypeï¼š

ä»£ç æµ‹è¯•ï¼š

è¿è¡Œç»“æœï¼š

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â userDao1å’ŒuserDao2çš„åœ°å€ä¸ç›¸åŒï¼Œå³ä»£è¡¨å®¹å™¨ä¸­å­˜åœ¨çš„UserDaoæœ‰å¤šä¸ªã€‚

3.1.3.Beanå¯¹è±¡çš„åˆ›å»ºæ—¶æœº

![Beanæ ‡ç­¾çš„åŸºæœ¬é…ç½®3 ](https://xuanmai-typora.oss-cn-shenzhen.aliyuncs.com/Beanæ ‡ç­¾çš„åŸºæœ¬é…ç½®3 .png)

3.1.4.Beanç”Ÿå‘½å‘¨æœŸé…ç½®

ä»£ç æµ‹è¯•ï¼š

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰åœ¨UserDaoImplç±»ä¸­åŠ æ— å‚æ„é€ å‡½æ•°ã€init()å’Œdestroy()æ–¹æ³•

//æ— å‚æ„é€ å‡½æ•°
public UserDaoImpl() {
    System.out.println("UserDaoImplåˆ›å»º....");
}
public void init(){
    System.out.println("åˆå§‹åŒ–æ–¹æ³•");
}

public void destroy(){
    System.out.println("é”€æ¯æ–¹æ³•");
}

ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰åœ¨applicationContextä¸­init-methodå’Œdestroy-methodæ ‡ç­¾

ï¼ˆ3ï¼‰è¿è¡Œç»“æœ

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â init-methodå’Œdestroy-methodæ ‡ç­¾å…¶å®å°±æ˜¯å®šä¹‰Beanå¯¹è±¡åˆå§‹åŒ–å’Œé”€æ¯çš„æ—¶å€™è¦è°ƒç”¨çš„æ–¹æ³•ã€‚

3.1.5.Beanå®ä¾‹åŒ–çš„ä¸‰ç§æ–¹å¼

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â é¦–å…ˆä»€ä¹ˆæ˜¯å·¥å‚ç±»ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç®€å•ç†è§£å°±æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå¯ä»¥åœ¨ä½ éœ€è¦ä¸€ä¸ªç±»Açš„åœ°æ–¹ï¼Œä»£æ›¿newåŠ¨æ€ç”Ÿæˆï¼ˆç”Ÿäº§ï¼‰ä¸€ä¸ªç±»Aï¼ˆæˆ–ç±»Açš„å­ç±»ï¼‰çš„ç±»ï¼Œå·¥å‚ç±»å¯ä»¥åŠ¨æ€çš„è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªç±»ç»™ä½ ï¼Œå®ç°è§£è€¦ï¼Œå¢åŠ ä»£ç çš„çµæ´»æ€§ã€‚å·¥å‚æ¨¡å¼ä¸€å…±æœ‰ä¸‰ç§ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œä¸éœ€è¦æ·±å…¥äº†è§£ã€‚

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰æ— å‚æ„é€ æ–¹æ³•å®ä¾‹åŒ–

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â è¿™ä¸ªæ˜¯é»˜è®¤æ–¹å¼ï¼Œæ•ˆæœå°±æ˜¯3.1.3å’Œ3.1.4ã€‚

ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰å·¥å‚é™æ€æ–¹æ³•å®ä¾‹åŒ–

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â 1ï¼‰åˆ›å»ºé™æ€å·¥å‚ç±»StaticFactory

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â 2ï¼‰åœ¨é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶é…ç½®Beanæ ‡ç­¾çš„factory-methodå±æ€§

<!--è¿™ä¹ˆå†™å°±æ˜¯æ— å‚æ„é€ åˆ›å»º
<bean id="userDao" class="dao.impl.UserDaoImpl" ></bean>-->

<!--ä¸€å®šä¸è¦å¿˜è®°åŠ factory-methodï¼Œå¦åˆ™å°±æ˜¯æ— å‚æ„é€ åˆ›å»ºStaticFactoryç±»äº†-->
<bean id="userDao" class="factory.StaticFactory" factory-method="getUserDao"></bean>

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â 3ï¼‰è¿è¡Œæµ‹è¯•ä»£ç :

    public void test1(){
        ClassPathXmlApplicationContext app = new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext("applicationContext.xml");
        UserDao userDao1 = (UserDao) app.getBean("userDao");
        System.out.println(userDao1);
    }

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â 4ï¼‰æµ‹è¯•ç»“æœï¼š

ï¼ˆ3ï¼‰å·¥å‚å®ä¾‹æ–¹æ³•å®ä¾‹åŒ–

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â 1ï¼‰åˆ›å»ºå·¥å‚ç±»DynamicFactory

package factory;

import dao.UserDao;
import dao.impl.UserDaoImpl;

public class DynamicFactory {

    //è¿™é‡Œçš„æ–¹æ³•ä¸æ˜¯é™æ€çš„ï¼Œå°±æ„å‘³ç€è¦å…ˆå®ä¾‹åŒ–ç±»DynamicFactory
    public UserDao getUserDao(){
        return new UserDaoImpl();
    }
}

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â 2ï¼‰åœ¨é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶é…ç½®Beanæ ‡ç­¾çš„factory-methodå±æ€§

<!--æ—¢ç„¶è¦å…ˆæœ‰å·¥å‚ç±»DynamicFactoryï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥è¦å…ˆè®©springå®¹å™¨äº§ç”Ÿå¯¹è±¡-->
<bean id="factory" class="factory.DynamicFactory"></bean>
<!--æœ€ç»ˆè¦çš„æ˜¯å·¥å‚è¿”å›çš„å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥è¿˜è¦é…ä¸€ä¸ªuserDaoçš„Bean-->
<bean id="userDao" factory-bean="factory" factory-method="getUserDao"></bean>

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â 3ï¼‰4ï¼‰æ­¥éª¤ç»“æœéƒ½ä¸€æ ·

åä¸¤ç§æ–¹æ³•æ€»ç»“ï¼š

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å…¶å®æœ¬è´¨ä¸Šæ²¡æœ‰å¤šå¤§ä¸åŒï¼Œåªæ˜¯è°ƒç”¨æ–¹æ³•çš„æ–¹å¼ä¸åŒã€‚ä¸€ä¸ªç±»çš„é™æ€æ–¹æ³•ï¼ˆstaticï¼‰å¯ä»¥ä¸ç”¨å…ˆåˆ›å»º(new)è¯¥ç±»ï¼Œå°±èƒ½é€šè¿‡â€œè¯¥ç±»å.æ–¹æ³•â€œè°ƒç”¨ã€‚ä½†æ˜¯å¦‚æœè¦è°ƒç”¨çš„æ–¹æ³•ä¸æ˜¯é™æ€çš„æ–¹æ³•å°±ä¸ç”¨é€šè¿‡ä¸€ä¸ªå®ä¾‹åŒ–çš„å¯¹è±¡æ¥è°ƒç”¨ï¼Œå³å¿…é¡»å…ˆåˆ›å»º(new)è¯¥ç±»ï¼Œç”Ÿæˆä¸€ä¸ªè¯¥ç±»çš„å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œå†é€šè¿‡â€å¯¹è±¡.æ–¹æ³•â€œæ‰èƒ½è°ƒç”¨ã€‚

2.Beanæ ‡ç­¾çš„ä¾èµ–æ³¨å…¥

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ä¾èµ–æ³¨å…¥ï¼ˆDependency Injectionï¼‰:å®ƒæ˜¯Springæ¡†æ¶æ ¸å¿ƒIOCçš„å…·ä½“å®ç°ã€‚

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ç»™æŸä¸ªç±»çš„å±æ€§è®¾ç½®å€¼æœ‰ä¸¤ç§æ–¹å¼ï¼š1.setæ–¹æ³•ï¼›2.æœ‰å‚æ„é€ å‡½æ•°ã€‚

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â è¿™ä¸ªâ€œä¾èµ–æ³¨å…¥â€å°±æ˜¯ç»™æŸä¸ªç±»é‡Œé¢çš„å±æ€§è®¾ç½®å€¼ï¼ˆè·å–å¯¹è±¡ï¼‰ã€‚åªä¸è¿‡ä»¥å‰javawebçš„å±æ€§æ˜¯ç›´æ¥newçš„ï¼Œ(æ¯”å¦‚UserServiceImpl)ï¼š

//ä¸šåŠ¡è¦æ“ä½œæ•°æ®åº“å°±è¦ç”¨daoå±‚
private UserDao userDao = new UserDaoImpl();

è€Œç°åœ¨userDaoè·å–å¯¹è±¡æ˜¯é€šè¿‡springçš„getBean()å®ç°ã€‚æ‰€ä»¥userDaoåœ¨å®šä¹‰æ—¶å°±ä¸èƒ½newäº†ã€‚ç›´æ¥å†™:

private UserDao userDao;

å¦‚æœä¸è®¾ç½®å€¼ï¼Œè¿è¡Œå°±ä¼šæŠ¥ç©ºæŒ‡é’ˆå¼‚å¸¸é”™è¯¯ã€‚è¿™ä¸ªä¾èµ–æ³¨å…¥å°±æ˜¯è§£å†³è¿™ç§é—®é¢˜ã€‚

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å¦‚æœä¸ä½¿ç”¨ä¾èµ–æ³¨å…¥ï¼ŒåŠ å…¥webå±‚è°ƒç”¨serviceå±‚ï¼Œserviceå±‚é‡Œé¢å†è°ƒç”¨daoå±‚éƒ½æ˜¯éœ€è¦ä½¿ç”¨getBean()æ¥è·å–çš„ã€‚

ApplicationContext.xml:

<bean id="userDao" class="dao.impl.UserDaoImpl" ></bean>
<bean id="userService" class="service.impl.UserServiceImpl"></bean>

webå±‚ä»£ç ï¼š

//å……å½“webå±‚ï¼Œè°ƒç”¨serviceå±‚
public static void main(String[] args) {
    ApplicationContext app = new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext("applicationContext.xml");
    UserService userService = (UserService) app.getBean("userService");
    userService.save();
}

serviceå±‚ï¼š

public void save() {
    ApplicationContext app = new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext("applicationContext.xml");
    UserDao userDao1 = (UserDao) app.getBean("userDao");
    //è¿™æ˜¯Serviceå±‚è¦è°ƒç”¨daoå±‚,daoå±‚æ˜¯ç”±Springåˆ›å»ºçš„
    userDao1.save();
}

ä½†æ˜¯æ— è®ºæ˜¯serviceå±‚è°ƒç”¨daoå±‚ï¼Œè¿˜æ˜¯webå±‚è°ƒç”¨serviceå±‚ï¼Œæ¯æ¬¡éƒ½é€šè¿‡getBean()æ¥è·å–å°±æœ‰ç‚¹éº»çƒ¦ï¼Œè¿™å°±éœ€è¦ä½¿ç”¨ä¾èµ–æ³¨å…¥äº†ã€‚

ps:ç›®å‰äº†è§£åˆ°ä¾èµ–æ³¨å…¥çš„å¥½å¤„å°±æ˜¯å‡ä½ä»£ç ä¹‹é—´çš„è€¦åˆåº¦å’ŒBeançš„ç”Ÿå‘½å‘¨æœŸæ§åˆ¶ã€‚

Springå®¹å™¨ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨åˆ°çš„åŸåˆ™å°±æ˜¯æ§åˆ¶åè½¬,æˆ‘ä»¬ä¹‹å‰å†™çš„ä»£ç ä¸­å¯¹è±¡å®ä¾‹éƒ½æ˜¯ç›´æ¥é€šè¿‡æˆ‘ä»¬è‡ªå·±ä½¿ç”¨newå…³é”®å­—æ¥åˆ›å»º,æˆ‘ä»¬å¯¹äºå¯¹è±¡æ¥è¯´å°±æ˜¯ç»å¯¹çš„éœ¸ä¸»,ä½†Springæ¡†æ¶ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨å®¹å™¨æ¥å¸®åŠ©æˆ‘ä»¬ç®¡ç†é¡¹ç›®ä¸­çš„ç±»çš„åˆ›å»º,è¿™æ ·æˆ‘ä»¬çš„æ§åˆ¶æƒå°±ç»™äº†springå®¹å™¨,ç±»ä¼¼ä¸€ç§åè½¬,æ‰€ä»¥ç§°ä¸ºæ§åˆ¶åè½¬,æˆ‘ä»¬æ§åˆ¶ç±»çš„åˆ›å»ºè¢«springå–ä»£äº†.

Springå®¹å™¨ç®¡ç†å¯¹è±¡ å¯¹è±¡çš„åˆ›å»ºå’Œç®¡ç†äº¤ç»™å®¹å™¨å®Œæˆ å½“æˆ‘ä»¬éœ€è¦å®ç°å…·ä½“ä¸šåŠ¡æ—¶ï¼Œåªéœ€è¦ä»å®¹å™¨ä¸­è·å–ç›¸å…³å¯¹è±¡å³å¯ ä¼ ç»Ÿæ–¹å¼ï¼š å¯¹è±¡çš„åˆ›å»ºå’Œç®¡ç†ç”±ç¨‹åºå‘˜æ‰‹åŠ¨å®Œæˆ å¯¹è±¡çš„åˆ›å»ºå’Œç®¡ç†æ–¹å¼å‘ç”Ÿäº†åè½¬ï¼Œç”±ç¨‹åºå‘˜å˜æˆäº†ç¨‹åºï¼ˆå®¹å™¨ï¼‰

3.2.1.setæ–¹å¼ä¾èµ–æ³¨å…¥

1.ç»™éœ€è¦è°ƒç”¨daoçš„serviceå±‚ï¼ˆUserServiceImplï¼‰è®¾ç½®å±æ€§å’Œè¯¥å±æ€§çš„setæ–¹æ³•

private UserDao userDao;
//setæ–¹æ³•
public void setUserDao(UserDao userDao) {
    this.userDao = userDao;
}

2.å»æ‰å¤šä½™çš„getBean()

UserServiceImplå®Œæ•´ä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

public class UserServiceImpl implements UserService {

    private UserDao userDao;
    //setæ–¹æ³•
    public void setUserDao(UserDao userDao) {
        this.userDao = userDao;
    }

    @Override
    public void save() {
        //ApplicationContext app = new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext("applicationContext.xml");
        //UserDao userDao = (UserDao) app.getBean("userDao");
        userDao.save();
    }
}

æŠŠgetBean()é‚£ä¸¤è¡Œå»æ‰ã€‚

3.é…ç½®ApplicationContext.xml

<bean id="userDao" class="dao.impl.UserDaoImpl" ></bean>
<bean id="userService" class="service.impl.UserServiceImpl">
    <property name="userDao" ref="userDao"></property>
</bean>

æ³¨æ„å±æ€§æ ‡ç­¾çš„nameå±æ€§é‡Œé¢çš„å€¼æ˜¯setteræ–¹æ³•åé¢é‚£éƒ¨åˆ†çš„åå­—çš„é¦–å­—æ¯æ”¹å°å†™ï¼Œè€Œä¸æ˜¯å±æ€§å€¼ ã€‚refæ˜¯æ³¨å…¥å¼•ç”¨ï¼Œæ³¨å…¥å€¼æ˜¯valueå±æ€§

4.æµ‹è¯•

ç”¨äºå……å½“webå±‚æµ‹è¯•çš„UserControllerç±»ï¼š

public class UserController {
    //å……å½“webå±‚ï¼Œè°ƒç”¨serviceå±‚
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        ApplicationContext app = new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext("applicationContext.xml");
        UserService userService = (UserService) app.getBean("userService");
        userService.save();
    }
}

æ‰§è¡Œå…¶mainæ–¹æ³•æ˜¯å¯ä»¥æ­£å¸¸è¿è¡Œçš„ã€‚

å»¶ä¼¸ï¼š

å¦‚æœmain()é‡Œé¢çš„userServiceä¸æ˜¯é€šè¿‡å®¹å™¨è·å–çš„ï¼Œè€Œæ˜¯newå‡ºæ¥çš„è¯ï¼Œä¼šæŠ¥â€œç©ºæŒ‡é’ˆå¼‚å¸¸â€ï¼š

å°†mainæ–¹æ³•æ”¹ä¸ºï¼š

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        UserService userService = new UserServiceImpl();
        userService.save();
    }

è¿è¡Œmain()æ–¹æ³•ï¼š

è¿™é‡Œçš„userServiceä¸æ˜¯é€šè¿‡å®¹å™¨æ‹¿çš„ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥é‡Œé¢æ²¡æœ‰userDao,æ ¹æœ¬å°±æ²¡æœ‰ç»™userDaoèµ‹å€¼ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ä¼šæŠ¥ç©ºæŒ‡é’ˆå¼‚å¸¸ã€‚

setæ–¹æ³•På‘½åç©ºé—´æ³¨å…¥

1.å¼•å…¥På‘½åç©ºé—´ï¼šï¼ˆå›¾ç”»é”™äº†ï¼Œåº”è¯¥æ˜¯ä¸‹ä¸€è¡Œï¼‰

2.ä¿®æ”¹æ³¨å…¥æ–¹å¼

<bean id="userService" class="service.impl.UserServiceImpl" p:userDao-ref="userDao">
</bean>

3.2.2.æœ‰å‚æ„é€ å‡½æ•°æ–¹å¼ä¾èµ–æ³¨å…¥

1.åœ¨serviceå±‚çš„UserServiceImplç±»ä¸­ï¼Œæ·»åŠ æœ‰å‚æ„é€ å‡½æ•°

public class UserServiceImpl implements UserService {

    private UserDao userDao;

    public UserServiceImpl(UserDao userDao1) {
        this.userDao = userDao1;
    }

    public UserServiceImpl() {
    }
    
    @Override
    public void save() {
        userDao.save();
    }
}

ä¸ºäº†æ›´åŠ æ˜ç¡®nameå±æ€§çš„å€¼æ˜¯ç»™è°çš„ï¼Œç‰¹æ„å°†æ„é€ å‡½æ•°çš„å‚æ•°ä¿®æ”¹ä¸ºuserDao1ï¼

2.é…ç½®ApplicationContext.xml

<bean id="userService" class="service.impl.UserServiceImpl" >
    <constructor-arg name="userDao1" ref="userDao"></constructor-arg>
</bean>

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â æµ‹è¯•è¿˜æ˜¯ç”¨çš„UserControllerç±»ä¸Šé¢è¿è¡Œæ— è¯¯ï¼Œconstructor-argæ ‡ç­¾çš„nameå±æ€§çš„å€¼æ˜¯æœ‰å‚æ„é€ å‡½æ•°çš„å‚æ•°ã€‚setæ–¹å¼ä¸­çš„propertyæ ‡ç­¾ä¸­çš„nameå±æ€§çš„å€¼æ˜¯setteræ–¹æ³•åé¢é‚£éƒ¨åˆ†çš„åå­—çš„é¦–å­—æ¯æ”¹å°å†™ï¼Œè€Œä¸æ˜¯å±æ€§å€¼ ã€‚

3.2.3.Beançš„å…¶ä»–æ•°æ®ç±»å‹ä¾èµ–æ³¨å…¥

![Beanæ ‡ç­¾çš„ä¾èµ–æ³¨å…¥çš„æ•°æ®ç±»å‹ ](https://xuanmai-typora.oss-cn-shenzhen.aliyuncs.com/Beanæ ‡ç­¾çš„ä¾èµ–æ³¨å…¥çš„æ•°æ®ç±»å‹ .png)

1.æ™®é€šæ•°æ®ç±»å‹æ³¨å…¥

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰UserDaoImplè®¾ç½®Stringã€intå’Œsetter()

public class UserDaoImpl implements UserDao {

    private String username;
    private int age;

    public void setUsername(String username) {
        this.username = username;
    }

    public void setAge(int age) {
        this.age = age;
    }

    public void save() {
        System.out.println("username = " + username + ";age=" + age);
        System.out.println("save() running...");
    }
}

ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰é…ç½®ApplicationContext.xml

<bean id="userDao" class="dao.impl.UserDaoImpl" >
    <property name="username" value="å¼ ä¸‰"/>
    <property name="age" value="18"/>
</bean>

ï¼ˆ3ï¼‰ä»¥ä¸‹ä»£ç æµ‹è¯•

public class UserController {
    //å……å½“webå±‚ï¼Œè°ƒç”¨serviceå±‚
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        ApplicationContext app = new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext("applicationContext.xml");
        UserService userService = (UserService) app.getBean("userService");
        userService.save();
    }
}

æµ‹è¯•ç»“æœä¸ºï¼š

2.é›†åˆæ•°æ®ç±»å‹æ³¨å…¥

propertyçš„åŒæ ‡ç­¾é‡Œé¢è¿˜èƒ½æœ‰å…¶ä»–ä¾èµ–æ³¨å…¥ç±»å‹çš„æ ‡ç­¾ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚ï¼š

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰åˆ›å»ºdomain.Userç±»è¿›è¡Œæµ‹è¯•

public class User {

    private String name;
    private String addr;

    public String getName() {
        return name;
    }

    public void setName(String name) {
        this.name = name;
    }

    public String getAddr() {
        return addr;
    }

    public void setAddr(String addr) {
        this.addr = addr;
    }

    @Override
    public String toString() {
        return "User{" +
                "name='" + name + '\'' +
                ", addr='" + addr + '\'' +
                '}';
    }
}

ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰ä¿®æ”¹UserDaoImplç±»ï¼Œæ·»åŠ ä¸‰ä¸ªé›†åˆ/å¼•ç”¨æ•°æ®ç±»å‹

public class UserDaoImpl implements UserDao {

    private List<String> strList;
    private Map<String, User> userMap;
    private Properties properties;

    public void setStrList(List<String> strList) {
        this.strList = strList;
    }

    public void setUserMap(Map<String, User> userMap) {
        this.userMap = userMap;
    }

    public void setProperties(Properties properties) {
        this.properties = properties;
    }

    private String username;
    private int age;

    public void setUsername(String username) {
        this.username = username;
    }

    public void setAge(int age) {
        this.age = age;
    }

    public void save() {
        //System.out.println("username = " + username + ";age=" + age);
        System.out.println(strList);
        System.out.println(userMap);
        System.out.println(properties);
        System.out.println("save() running...");
    }
}

ï¼ˆ3ï¼‰é…ç½®ApplicationContext.xmlå¹¶æ³¨å…¥

<!--setteræ–¹æ³•æ³¨å…¥-->
<bean id="userDao" class="dao.impl.UserDaoImpl" >
    <property name="strList">
        <list>
            <value>aaa</value>
            <value>bbb</value>
            <value>ccc</value>
        </list>
    </property>
    <property name="userMap">
        <map>
            <!--keyå¯ä»¥å–key,key-refåè€…æ˜¯å¼•ç”¨ç±»å‹ã€‚ä¼ å…¥çš„å€¼å°±æ˜¯mapçš„key-->
            <entry key="u1" value-ref="user1"></entry>
            <entry key="u2" value-ref="user2"></entry>
        </map>
    </property>
    <property name="properties">
        <props>
            <!--propé‡Œæ²¡æœ‰valueå±æ€§ï¼Œç›´æ¥å†™åœ¨æ ‡ç­¾é‡Œ-->
            <prop key="p1">ppp1</prop>
            <prop key="p2">ppp2</prop>
            <prop key="p3">ppp3</prop>
        </props>
    </property>
</bean>
<!--åˆ›å»ºä¸¤ä¸ªUserå¯¹è±¡user1,user2-->
<bean id="user1" class="domain.User">
    <!--å› ä¸ºUseré‡Œé¢çš„ä¸¤ä¸ªå±æ€§éƒ½æ˜¯String,å±äºæ™®é€šæ•°æ®ç±»å‹ï¼Œéƒ½ç”¨value-->
    <property name="name" value="tom"/>
    <property name="addr" value="beijing"/>
</bean>
<bean id="user2" class="domain.User">
    <property name="name" value="lucy"/>
    <property name="addr" value="tianjin"/>
</bean>

<bean id="userService" class="service.impl.UserServiceImpl">
    <property name="userDao" ref="userDao"></property>
</bean>

ï¼ˆ4ï¼‰ä½¿ç”¨UserControllerè¿›è¡Œæµ‹è¯•

public class UserController {
    //å……å½“webå±‚ï¼Œè°ƒç”¨serviceå±‚
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        ApplicationContext app = new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext("applicationContext.xml");
        UserService userService = (UserService) app.getBean("userService");
        userService.save();
    }
}

ï¼ˆ5ï¼‰è¿è¡Œç»“æœ

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â IoC(æ§åˆ¶åè½¬)å’ŒDI(ä¾èµ–æ³¨å…¥)çš„ç†è§£ã€‚

3.importæ ‡ç­¾å’Œæ€»ç»“

1.importæ ‡ç­¾å¼•å…¥å…¶ä»–é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶

2.æ€»ç»“ï¼š

4.Springç›¸å…³ç±»å’ŒAPI

3.4.1.ApplicationContextçš„ç»§æ‰¿ä½“ç³»

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰ApplicationContextï¼šæ¥å£ç±»å‹ï¼Œä»£è¡¨åº”ç”¨ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡ï¼Œå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡å…¶å®ä¾‹è·å¾—Springå®¹å™¨ä¸­çš„Beanå¯¹è±¡

ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰ApplicationContextçš„å®ç°ç±»

3.4.2.getBean()æ–¹æ³•çš„ä½¿ç”¨

ä¸¤ç§ä½¿ç”¨æ–¹å¼å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

public class UserController {
    //å……å½“webå±‚ï¼Œè°ƒç”¨serviceå±‚
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        ApplicationContext app = new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext("applicationContext.xml");
        //1.
//        UserService userService = (UserService) app.getBean("userService");
        //2.
        UserService userService = app.getBean(UserService.class);
        userService.save();
    }
}

5.Springé…ç½®æ•°æ®æº

3.5.1.é…ç½®C3P0æ•°æ®æº(æµ‹è¯•)

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰åˆ›å»ºæ–°çš„é¡¹ç›®

â€‹ 3.5.1.çš„æœ€ç»ˆç›®å½•å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰åœ¨pom.xmlå¯¼åæ ‡ï¼Œå¯¼å…¥mysqlæ•°æ®åº“é©±åŠ¨ï¼Œc3p0ï¼Œdruidï¼Œjunit

<dependencies>
    <dependency>
        <groupId>mysql</groupId>
        <artifactId>mysql-connector-java</artifactId>
        <version>5.1.32</version>
    </dependency>
    <dependency>
        <groupId>c3p0</groupId>
        <artifactId>c3p0</artifactId>
        <version>0.9.1.2</version>
    </dependency>
    <dependency>
        <groupId>com.alibaba</groupId>
        <artifactId>druid</artifactId>
        <version>1.1.10</version>
    </dependency>
    <dependency>
        <groupId>junit</groupId>
        <artifactId>junit</artifactId>
        <version>4.11</version>
        <scope>test</scope>
    </dependency>
</dependencies>

ï¼ˆ3ï¼‰åˆ›å»ºæµ‹è¯•ç±»å’Œæ–¹æ³•

public class DataSourceTest {

    @Test
    //æµ‹è¯•æ‰‹åŠ¨åˆ›å»ºc3p0æ•°æ®æº
    public void test() throws PropertyVetoException, SQLException {
        ComboPooledDataSource dataSource = new ComboPooledDataSource();
        //è®¾ç½®åŸºæœ¬çš„è¿æ¥å‚æ•°
        dataSource.setDriverClass("com.mysql.jdbc.Driver");
        dataSource.setJdbcUrl("jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/test");
        dataSource.setUser("root");
        dataSource.setPassword("123456");
        //è·å–è¿æ¥
        Connection connection = dataSource.getConnection();
        //æ‰“å°connectionåœ°å€çœ‹çœ‹æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºç©º
        System.out.println(connection);
        connection.close();
    }
}

ï¼ˆ4ï¼‰æµ‹è¯•ç»“æœï¼š

com.mchange.v2.c3p0.impl.NewProxyConnection@1534f01b

Process finished with exit code 0

3.5.2.é…ç½®druidæ•°æ®æº(æµ‹è¯•)

ç”±äºå·²ç»å¯¼å…¥druidåæ ‡ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ç›´æ¥åœ¨æµ‹è¯•ç±»DataSourceTesté‡Œæ·»åŠ æµ‹è¯•æ–¹æ³•å°±è¡Œäº†

@Test
//æµ‹è¯•druidæ•°æ®æº
public void test2() throws SQLException {
    DruidDataSource dataSource = new DruidDataSource();
    //c3p0æ˜¯setDriverClass()
    dataSource.setDriverClassName("com.mysql.jdbc.Driver");
    dataSource.setUrl("jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/test");
    dataSource.setUsername("root");
    dataSource.setPassword("123456");
    DruidPooledConnection connection = dataSource.getConnection();
    System.out.println(connection);
    connection.close();
}

3.5.3.æŠ½å–jdbc.propertiesé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶

æŠ½å–ç”Ÿæˆé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶çš„ç›®çš„æ˜¯ä¸ºäº†è§£è€¦ã€‚

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰ä½¿ç”¨ResourceBundleæ¥è·å–é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ä¿¡æ¯

è¿™é‡Œç”¨c3p0æ¥æ¼”ç¤ºï¼š

1.åœ¨resourcesä¸‹åˆ›å»ºæ–‡ä»¶jdbc.propertiesï¼Œå†…å®¹å¦‚ä¸‹

jdbc.driver=com.mysql.jdbc.Driver
jdbc.url=jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/test
jdbc.username=root
jdbc.password=123456

2.åœ¨DataSourceTestä¸‹åˆ›å»ºæµ‹è¯•æ–¹æ³•ï¼š

@Test
//æµ‹è¯•æ‰‹åŠ¨åˆ›å»ºc3p0æ•°æ®æºï¼ˆåŠ è½½propertiesé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ï¼‰
public void test3() throws PropertyVetoException, SQLException {
    //1.è¯»å–é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ Bundleï¼šç»‘å®š
    ResourceBundle resourceBundle = ResourceBundle.getBundle("jdbc");//ä¸ç”¨åŠ propertiesæ‰©å±•å
    //keyæ˜¯é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶çš„key
    String driver = resourceBundle.getString("jdbc.driver");
    String url = resourceBundle.getString("jdbc.url");
    String username = resourceBundle.getString("jdbc.username");
    String password = resourceBundle.getString("jdbc.password");
    //2.åˆ›å»ºæ•°æ®æºå¯¹è±¡
    ComboPooledDataSource dataSource = new ComboPooledDataSource();
    //3.è®¾ç½®è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
    dataSource.setDriverClass(driver);
    dataSource.setJdbcUrl(url);
    dataSource.setUser(username);
    dataSource.setPassword(password);
    //4.è·å¾—èµ„æºï¼ˆè¿æ¥ï¼‰
    Connection connection = dataSource.getConnection();
    System.out.println(connection);
    //5.èµ„æºå½’è¿˜
    connection.close();
}

3.è¿è¡Œç»“æœä¸º

com.mchange.v2.c3p0.impl.NewProxyConnection@4386f16

Process finished with exit code 0

ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰ä»InputStreamæµä¸­åŠ è½½é…ç½®ä¿¡æ¯å¹¶åˆ›å»ºæ•°æ®æºå¯¹è±¡

ç”¨druidæ¥æ¼”ç¤ºï¼Œè¿™ä¹Ÿæ˜¯ä»¥å‰javawebç”¨çš„æ–¹å¼ã€‚

1.jdbc.propertiesï¼š

username=root
password=123456
url=jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/book?useUnicode=true&characterEncoding=utf8
driverClassName=com.mysql.jdbc.Driver
initialSize=5
maxActive=10

2.å·¥å…·ç±»JdbcUtilsï¼š

public class JdbcUtils {

    private static DruidDataSource dataSource;
    //ä¸ºäº†å®ç°äº‹åŠ¡ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ç”¨ThreadLocalæ¥ä¿å­˜è¿æ¥
    private static ThreadLocal<Connection> conns = new ThreadLocal<Connection>();

    static {//é™æ€ä»£ç å—åšåˆå§‹åŒ–
        try {// Crtl + Alt +t å¿«æ·é”®
            Properties properties = new Properties();//è¿æ¥æ± çš„å±æ€§ä¿¡æ¯éƒ½æ˜¯é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶é‡Œæ¥çš„ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥è¦è¯»é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶jdbc.properties
            //è¯»å–jdbc.propertieså±æ€§é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶
            InputStream inputStream = JdbcUtils.class.getClassLoader().getResourceAsStream("jdbc.properties");
            //ä»æµä¸­åŠ è½½æ•°æ®
            properties.load(inputStream);//éœ€è¦ä¸€ä¸ªInputStream
            //åˆ›å»ºæ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥æ± 
            dataSource = (DruidDataSource) DruidDataSourceFactory.createDataSource(properties);//Alt+Enter :ç±»å‹è½¬æ¢
            /*//æŸ¥çœ‹æ˜¯å¦è¿æ¥æˆåŠŸ-è·å–è¿æ¥
            System.out.println(dataSource.getConnection());----------ç”¨äºæµ‹è¯•çš„ä»£ç */
        } catch (Exception e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }
}

å…¶å®åŠ è½½propertiesæ–‡ä»¶çš„æ–¹æ³•æœ‰è®¸å¤šçœ‹è‡ªå·±å–œæ¬¢äº†ã€‚

3.5.4.Springäº§ç”Ÿæ•°æ®æºå¯¹è±¡(æ­£é¢˜)

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰åˆ†æï¼š

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â æˆ‘ä»¬çœ‹ä¸€ä¸‹æµ‹è¯•æ–¹æ³•test3()ä¸­æœ‰å¦‚ä¸‹ä»£ç ï¼š

//2.åˆ›å»ºæ•°æ®æºå¯¹è±¡
ComboPooledDataSource dataSource = new ComboPooledDataSource();
//3.è®¾ç½®è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
dataSource.setDriverClass(driver);
dataSource.setJdbcUrl(url);
dataSource.setUser(username);
dataSource.setPassword(password);

é‡Œé¢æ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯æœ‰æ— å‚æ„é€ ï¼Œæ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯æœ‰é‚£ä¹ˆå¤šçš„setæ–¹æ³•ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆç”¨Springçš„setteræ–¹æ³•æ³¨å…¥ä¸æ˜¯åˆšåˆšå¥½ã€‚å³å°†dataSourceçš„åˆ›å»ºæƒäº¤ç»™Springå®¹å™¨å»å®Œæˆã€‚

ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰åœ¨pom.xmlå¯¼å…¥Springçš„åŸºæœ¬åæ ‡spring-context

<dependency>
    <groupId>org.springframework</groupId>
    <artifactId>spring-context</artifactId>
    <version>5.0.5.RELEASE</version>
</dependency>

ï¼ˆ3ï¼‰åˆ›å»ºé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶åœ¨resources/applicationContext.xml

<bean id="dataSource" class="com.mchange.v2.c3p0.ComboPooledDataSource">
    <!--æ— å‚æ„é€ åˆ›å»ºå®Œæ¯•åï¼Œè¿˜è¦æ³¨å…¥å‚æ•°-->
    <property name="driverClass" value="com.mysql.jdbc.Driver"></property>
    <property name="jdbcUrl" value="jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/test"></property>
    <property name="user" value="root"></property>
    <property name="password" value="123456"></property>
</bean>

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å…¶å®å°±æ˜¯ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰ä¸­çš„ä»£ç ï¼Œè¿™å°±åˆ›å»ºå¹¶é…ç½®å¥½å¥½æ•°æ®æºdataSourceäº†ã€‚

ï¼ˆ4ï¼‰test4()æµ‹è¯•

@Test
//æµ‹è¯•Springå®¹å™¨äº§ç”Ÿæ•°æ®æºå¯¹è±¡ï¼ˆc3p0ï¼‰
public void test4() throws PropertyVetoException, SQLException {
    ApplicationContext applicationContext = new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext("applicationContext.xml");
    ComboPooledDataSource dataSource = (ComboPooledDataSource) applicationContext.getBean("dataSource");
    Connection connection = dataSource.getConnection();
    System.out.println(connection);
    connection.close();
}

ï¼ˆ5ï¼‰æµ‹è¯•ç»“æœ

com.mchange.v2.c3p0.impl.NewProxyConnection@4ee203eb

Process finished with exit code 0

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ä½¿ç”¨druidæ•°æ®æºä¹Ÿä¸€æ ·é…ç½®ï¼Œåªä¸è¿‡é…çš„æ˜¯DruidDataSourceç±»ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”å®ƒçš„setter4ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•åæœ‰æ‰€ä¸åŒã€‚

3.5.5.SpringåŠ è½½Propertiesæ–‡ä»¶

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰åœ¨applicationContext.xmlå¼•å…¥å‘½åç©ºé—´å’Œçº¦æŸè·¯å¾„

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
       xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
       xmlns:comtext="http://www.springframework.org/schema/context"
       xsi:schemaLocation=
               "http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans.xsd
                http://www.springframework.org/schema/context  http://www.springframework.org/schema/context/spring-context.xsd">

    <!--åŠ è½½å¤–éƒ¨çš„propertiesæ–‡ä»¶-->
    <comtext:property-placeholder location="classpath:jdbc.properties"/>
    <bean id="dataSource" class="com.mchange.v2.c3p0.ComboPooledDataSource">
        <!--ç”¨Springè¡¨è¾¾å¼ï¼Œè·å–propertiesæ–‡ä»¶çš„keyï¼›è¾“å…¥çš„æ—¶å€™IDEAä¹Ÿæœ‰æç¤ºçš„-->
        <property name="driverClass" value="${jdbc.driver}"></property>
        <property name="jdbcUrl" value="${jdbc.url}"></property>
        <property name="user" value="${jdbc.username}"></property>
        <property name="password" value="${jdbc.password}"></property>
    </bean>

    <!--<bean id="dataSource" class="com.mchange.v2.c3p0.ComboPooledDataSource">
        &lt;!&ndash;æ— å‚æ„é€ åˆ›å»ºå®Œæ¯•åï¼Œè¿˜è¦æ³¨å…¥å‚æ•°&ndash;&gt;
        <property name="driverClass" value="com.mysql.jdbc.Driver"></property>
        <property name="jdbcUrl" value="jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/test"></property>
        <property name="user" value="root"></property>
        <property name="password" value="123456"></property>
    </bean>-->

</beans>

ï¼ˆ4ï¼‰ç”¨test4()æ–¹æ³•æµ‹è¯•ï¼Œç»“æœä¸º

com.mchange.v2.c3p0.impl.NewProxyConnection@14f232c4

Process finished with exit code 0

å››.Springçš„æ³¨è§£å¼€å‘

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Springæ˜¯è½»ä»£ç è€Œé‡é…ç½®çš„æ¡†æ¶ï¼Œé…ç½®æ¯”è¾ƒç¹é‡ï¼Œå½±å“å¼€å‘æ•ˆç‡ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æ³¨è§£å¼€å‘æ˜¯ä¸€ç§è¶‹åŠ¿ï¼Œæ³¨è§£ä»£æ›¿xmlé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶å¯ä»¥ç®€åŒ–é…ç½®ï¼Œæé«˜å¼€å‘æ•ˆç‡ã€‚

1.SpringåŸå§‹æ³¨è§£

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â SpringåŸå§‹æ³¨è§£ä¸»è¦æ˜¯ä»£æ›¿< Bean > çš„é…ç½®ã€‚ï¼ˆé™¤äº†æœ€åä¸¤ä¸ªéƒ½æ˜¯é‡ç‚¹ï¼‰

å…³äºèµ„æºæ–‡ä»¶resourcesèµ„æºæ–‡ä»¶

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â èµ„æºæ–‡ä»¶mainç›®å½•å’Œtestç›®å½•ä¸‹éƒ½èƒ½åˆ›å»ºï¼Œä½†æ˜¯testç›®å½•ä¸‹çš„æ–‡ä»¶åŒ…æ‹¬testèµ„æºæ–‡ä»¶å¯ä»¥è¯»åˆ°ä¸»èµ„æºæ–‡ä»¶å¤¹å’Œæºä»£ç ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯åœ¨mainç›®å½•ä¸‹çš„æ–‡ä»¶æ˜¯æ— æ³•è®¿é—®åˆ°testç›®å½•ä¸‹çš„æ–‡ä»¶çš„ï¼ˆæ¯”å¦‚test/Dao/impl/UserDaoImplï¼‰ã€‚

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å¦‚æœmainå’Œtestéƒ½æœ‰ç›¸åŒçš„èµ„æºæ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œå°±è¯»è‡ªå·±ç›®å½•ä¸‹çš„ã€‚mainå°±è¯»mainèµ„æºæ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œtestå°±è¯»testèµ„æºæ–‡ä»¶ã€‚

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰æ­å»ºæ¨¡æ‹Ÿç¯å¢ƒ

1.åˆ›å»ºdaoå’Œå…¶impl

public class UserDaoImpl implements UserDao {
    @Override
    public void save() {
        System.out.println("save running ...");
    }
}

2.åˆ›å»ºServiceå’Œå…¶impl

public class UserServiceImpl implements UserService {

    private UserDao userDao;
    //setteræ–¹æ³•
    public void setUserDao(UserDao userDao) {
        this.userDao = userDao;
    }

    @Override
    public void save() {
        //æ³¨å…¥æˆåŠŸåå°±å¯ä»¥è°ƒç”¨
        userDao.save();
    }
}

3.åˆ›å»ºæ¨¡æ‹Ÿwebå±‚ç”¨äºæµ‹è¯•

public class UserController {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        ApplicationContext app = new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext("applicationContext.xml");
        UserService userService = app.getBean(UserService.class);
        userService.save();
    }
}

ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰ç”¨é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶é…ç½®å®¹å™¨

<bean id="userDao" class="dao.impl.UserDaoImpl"></bean>
<bean id="userService" class="service.impl.UserServiceImpl">
    <!--Serviceå†…éƒ¨è¦æ³¨å…¥Dao-->
    <property name="userDao" ref="userDao"></property>
</bean>

ä½¿ç”¨æ³¨è§£æ›¿ä»£é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å…¶å®å°±æ˜¯æŠŠapplicationcontext.xmlé‡Œé¢çš„Beançš„é…ç½®æ³¨è§£åˆ°ç±»é‚£é‡Œã€‚

1.åœ¨daoå±‚çš„UserDaoImplä¸‹è¿›è¡Œæ³¨è§£

package dao.impl;

import dao.UserDao;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;

//<bean id="userDao" class="dao.impl.UserDaoImpl"></bean>
@Component("userDao")
public class UserDaoImpl implements UserDao {
    @Override
    public void save() {
        System.out.println("save running ...");
    }
}

2.åœ¨serviceå±‚çš„UserServiceImplä¸‹è¿›è¡Œæ³¨è§£å’Œä¾èµ–æ³¨å…¥

package service.impl;

import dao.UserDao;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Qualifier;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;
import service.UserService;

//<bean id="userService" class="service.impl.UserServiceImpl">
@Component("userService")
public class UserServiceImpl implements UserService {

    //<property name="userDao" ref="userDao"></property>
    @Autowired
    @Qualifier("userDao")
    private UserDao userDao;
    //setteræ–¹æ³•
    public void setUserDao(UserDao userDao) {
        this.userDao = userDao;
    }

    @Override
    public void save() {
        //æ³¨å…¥æˆåŠŸåå°±å¯ä»¥è°ƒç”¨
        userDao.save();
    }
}

3.åœ¨applicationcontext.xmlä¸‹é…ç½®ç»„ä»¶æ‰«æ

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â æ³¨æ„ï¼šä½¿ç”¨æ³¨è§£å¼€å‘æ—¶ï¼Œéœ€è¦åœ¨applicationContext.xmlä¸­é…ç½®ç»„ä»¶æ‰«æï¼Œä½œç”¨æ˜¯æŒ‡å®šå“ªä¸ªåŒ…åŠå…¶å­åŒ…ä¸‹çš„Beanéœ€è¦è¿›è¡Œæ‰«æä¸€éè¯†åˆ«ä½¿ç”¨æ³¨è§£é…ç½®çš„ç±»ã€å­—æ®µå’Œæ–¹æ³•ã€‚ä¸ç„¶Springæ€ä¹ˆçŸ¥é“ï¼Œå°±ä¼šæŠ¥é”™ã€‚ï¼ˆè¿™ä¸ªé…ç½®åé¢ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨æ–°æ³¨è§£å»æ³¨è§£çš„ï¼‰

åœ¨applicationcontext.xmlä¸‹é…ç½®ç»„ä»¶æ‰«æï¼š

<!--é…ç½®ç»„ä»¶æ‰«æ-->
<comtext:component-scan base-package="com.hugo"/>

å› ä¸ºè¦æ‰«ææ‰€æœ‰çš„Beanï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥è¦åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªæœ€åŸºç¡€çš„åŒ…com.hugo:(é¡¹ç›®åï¼šspring_aop)

4.è¿è¡Œæµ‹è¯•UserControllerçš„mainæ–¹æ³•ï¼š

save running ...

Process finished with exit code 0

å…¶ä»–æ³¨è§£ï¼š

1.@Repositoryç”¨åœ¨daoå±‚ç±»ä¸Šå®ä¾‹åŒ–Beanï¼ŒUserDaoImplçš„æ³¨è§£ä¹Ÿèƒ½å†™æˆï¼š

//<bean id="userDao" class="com.hugo.dao.impl.UserDaoImpl"></bean>
//@Component("userDao")
@Repository("userDao")
public class UserDaoImpl implements UserDao {
    ...
}

2.@Serviceæ˜¯ç”¨åœ¨Serviceå±‚çš„ï¼š

//<bean id="userService" class="com.hugo.service.impl.UserServiceImpl">
//@Component("userService")
@Service("userService")
public class UserServiceImpl implements UserService {

    //<property name="userDao" ref="userDao"></property>
    @Autowired
    @Qualifier("userDao")
    private UserDao userDao;
    //setteræ–¹æ³•
    public void setUserDao(UserDao userDao) {
        this.userDao = userDao;
    }
    ...
}

3.å…³äº@Autowiredå’Œ@Qualifier("userDao")

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â åœ¨ä¸Šé¢ç”¨xmlé…ç½®è€Œæ²¡æœ‰ç”¨æ³¨è§£çš„æ–¹æ³•æ—¶ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬ä½¿ç”¨çš„æ˜¯Setteræ–¹æ³•æ³¨å…¥æ‰€ä»¥UserServiceImplç±»é‡Œé¢ä¸€å®šè¦æœ‰ç›¸åº”çš„setteræ–¹æ³•ã€‚ä½†æ˜¯ä½¿ç”¨äº†æ³¨è§£çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼ŒæŠŠsetteræ–¹æ³•å»æ‰ä¹Ÿæ˜¯å¯ä»¥è¿è¡Œçš„ï¼ŒSpringä¼šé€šè¿‡åå°„å»ç»™å±æ€§èµ‹å€¼ã€‚

4.åªä½¿ç”¨@Autowiredä¹Ÿèƒ½æ³¨å…¥

@Service("userService")
public class UserServiceImpl implements UserService {

    @Autowired//æŒ‰ç…§æ•°æ®ç±»å‹ä»Springå®¹å™¨ä¸­è¿›è¡ŒåŒ¹é…
//    @Qualifier("userDao")//æ˜¯æŒ‰ç…§idå€¼ä»å®¹å™¨ä¸­è¿›è¡ŒåŒ¹é…çš„ ä½†æ˜¯æ­¤å¤„@Qualifier("userDao")æ˜¯è¦ç»“åˆ@Autowiredä¸€èµ·ä½¿ç”¨
    private UserDao userDao;
    
    @Override
    public void save() {
        //æ³¨å…¥æˆåŠŸåå°±å¯ä»¥è°ƒç”¨
        userDao.save();
    }
}

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â @Autowiredæ˜¯æŒ‰ç…§æ•°æ®ç±»å‹ä»Springå®¹å™¨ä¸­è¿›è¡ŒåŒ¹é…çš„ï¼Œå¦‚æœæœ‰å¤šä¸ªç±»å‹ä¸€æ ·çš„Beanå°±ä¼šå‡ºé”™ï¼æ‰€ä»¥è¦æ ¹æ®idæ³¨å…¥Beanå°±è¦ç»“åˆ@Qualifier("[id]")ä¸€èµ·ä½¿ç”¨

5.@Resource

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å¯èƒ½IDEAä¼šæŠ¥çº¢ï¼Œåœ¨pom.xmlé‡Œé¢æ·»åŠ åæ ‡ï¼š

<dependency>
    <groupId>javax.annotation</groupId>
    <artifactId>javax.annotation-api</artifactId>
    <version>1.3.1</version>
</dependency>

ä¿®æ”¹UserServiceImplçš„æ³¨å…¥æ³¨è§£

package com.hugo.service.impl;
import com.hugo.dao.UserDao;
import com.hugo.service.UserService;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;

import javax.annotation.Resource;

@Service("userService")
public class UserServiceImpl implements UserService {

    @Resource(name = "userDao")
    private UserDao userDao;

    @Override
    public void save() {
        //æ³¨å…¥æˆåŠŸåå°±å¯ä»¥è°ƒç”¨
        userDao.save();
    }
}

@Resource(name = "userDao")å°±ç›¸å½“äº@Autowired + @Qualifier("userDao")ã€‚

6.@Value

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å‰é¢æ¼”ç¤ºçš„æ—¶å€™éƒ½æ˜¯æ³¨å…¥çš„å¼•ç”¨ï¼Œå¦‚æœæ˜¯å€¼å°±ç”¨Value

@Service("userService")
public class UserServiceImpl implements UserService {

    @Value("itcast")
    private String driver;

    @Resource(name = "userDao")
    private UserDao userDao;

    @Override
    public void save() {
        System.out.println(driver);
        userDao.save();
    }
}

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ä½†æ˜¯åº”ç”¨åœºæ™¯å°±æœ‰ç‚¹å°´å°¬äº†ï¼Œæ—¢ç„¶éƒ½æ˜¯ç»™ä¸€ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼Œä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆä¸ç›´æ¥èµ‹å€¼private String driver=â€œitcastâ€;æ‰€ä»¥è¿˜æœ‰å…¶ä»–åº”ç”¨åœºæ™¯ï¼š

åœ¨å‰é¢çš„æ—¶å€™åœ¨applicationContext.xmlå°±é…ç½®è¿‡æ•°æ®æºçš„Beanï¼š

<!--åŠ è½½å¤–éƒ¨çš„propertiesæ–‡ä»¶-->
<comtext:property-placeholder location="classpath:jdbc.properties"/>
<bean id="dataSource" class="com.mchange.v2.c3p0.ComboPooledDataSource">
    <!--ç”¨Springè¡¨è¾¾å¼ï¼Œè·å–propertiesæ–‡ä»¶çš„keyï¼›è¾“å…¥çš„æ—¶å€™IDEAä¹Ÿæœ‰æç¤ºçš„-->
    <property name="driverClass" value="${jdbc.driver}"></property>
    <property name="jdbcUrl" value="${jdbc.url}"></property>
    <property name="user" value="${jdbc.username}"></property>
    <property name="password" value="${jdbc.password}"></property>
</bean>

æ‰€ä»¥å‡å¦‚æˆ‘è¦æŠŠé©±åŠ¨çš„åå­—èµ‹ç»™UserServiceImplé‡Œé¢çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²driverå‘¢ï¼Ÿ

å¯ä»¥è¿™æ ·åšï¼š

@Service("userService")
public class UserServiceImpl implements UserService {

    @Value("${jdbc.driver}")
    private String driver;

    @Resource(name = "userDao")
    private UserDao userDao;
    @Override
    public void save() {
        System.out.println(driver);
        userDao.save();
    }
}

ä½¿ç”¨UserControlleræµ‹è¯•ç»“æœä¸ºï¼š

com.mysql.jdbc.Driver
save running ...

Process finished with exit code 0

6.@Scope("singleton")å’Œ@Scope("prototype")

@Service("userService")
//@Scope("singleton")
@Scope("prototype")
public class UserServiceImpl implements UserService {

    @Value("${jdbc.driver}")
    private String driver;

    @Resource(name = "userDao")
    private UserDao userDao;
    ...
}

7.@PostConstructå’ŒPreDestroy

@Service("userService")
@Scope("singleton")
//@Scope("prototype")
public class UserServiceImpl implements UserService {

    @Value("${jdbc.driver}")
    private String driver;

    //@Autowired//æŒ‰ç…§æ•°æ®ç±»å‹ä»Springå®¹å™¨ä¸­è¿›è¡ŒåŒ¹é…
//    @Qualifier("userDao")//æ˜¯æŒ‰ç…§idå€¼ä»å®¹å™¨ä¸­è¿›è¡ŒåŒ¹é…çš„ ä½†æ˜¯æ­¤å¤„@Qualifier("userDao")æ˜¯è¦ç»“åˆ@Autowiredä¸€èµ·ä½¿ç”¨
    @Resource(name = "userDao")
    private UserDao userDao;

    @Override
    public void save() {
        System.out.println(driver);
        userDao.save();
    }
    //poståšä»‹è¯è¡¨ç¤ºåœ¨...ä¹‹å
    //åˆå§‹åŒ–æ–¹æ³•æ˜¯åœ¨æ„é€ å™¨æ–¹æ³•æ‰§è¡Œä¹‹åæ‰æ‰§è¡Œ
    @PostConstruct
    public void init(){
        System.out.println("Serviceå¯¹è±¡çš„åˆå§‹åŒ–æ–¹æ³•");
    }
    @PreDestroy
    public void destroy(){
        System.out.println("Serviceå¯¹è±¡çš„é”€æ¯æ–¹æ³•");
    }
}

éœ€è¦æ³¨æ„çš„æ˜¯ï¼Œå®šä¹‰ä¸ºprototypeç±»å‹çš„å®ä¾‹åˆ›å»ºä¹‹åspringå°±ä¸åœ¨ç®¡ç†äº†ï¼Œå®ƒåªæ˜¯åšäº†newæ“ä½œè€Œå·²ï¼Œè¦æƒ³ä½¿ç”¨preDestroyæ³¨è§£ï¼Œæ³¨æ„æŠŠscopeä¸­çš„å‚æ•°æ”¹æˆsingletonã€‚å¦åˆ™ä¸ºprototypeä¸æ‰§è¡Œdestroy()ã€‚

2.Springæ–°æ³¨è§£

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â è™½ç„¶ä½¿ç”¨åŸå§‹æ³¨è§£å¯ä»¥é…ç½®ä¸€äº›è‡ªå®šä¹‰çš„Beanï¼Œä½†æ˜¯å›åˆ°ç”¨åŸå§‹æ³¨è§£é…ç½®åçš„é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶applicationContext.xml:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
       xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
       xmlns:comtext="http://www.springframework.org/schema/context"
       xsi:schemaLocation=
               "http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans.xsd
                http://www.springframework.org/schema/context  http://www.springframework.org/schema/context/spring-context.xsd">

    <!--åŠ è½½å¤–éƒ¨çš„propertiesæ–‡ä»¶-->
    <comtext:property-placeholder location="classpath:jdbc.properties"/>
    <bean id="dataSource" class="com.mchange.v2.c3p0.ComboPooledDataSource">
        <!--ç”¨Springè¡¨è¾¾å¼ï¼Œè·å–propertiesæ–‡ä»¶çš„keyï¼›è¾“å…¥çš„æ—¶å€™IDEAä¹Ÿæœ‰æç¤ºçš„-->
        <property name="driverClass" value="${jdbc.driver}"></property>
        <property name="jdbcUrl" value="${jdbc.url}"></property>
        <property name="user" value="${jdbc.username}"></property>
        <property name="password" value="${jdbc.password}"></property>
    </bean>
    <!--é…ç½®ç»„ä»¶æ‰«æ-->
    <comtext:component-scan base-package="com.hugo"/>

</beans>

å‰©ä¸‹è¿™äº›éƒ½æ˜¯æ— æ³•ç”¨åŸå§‹æ³¨è§£é…ç½®çš„ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬ä»ä¸Šåˆ°ä¸‹æ¥çœ‹è¿™äº›é…ç½®ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚åŠ è½½å¤–éƒ¨é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ï¼›Beanè™½ç„¶å¯ä»¥é…ç½®ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯å¿…é¡»åˆ°æºç é‚£é‡Œè¿›è¡Œæ³¨è§£æ‰è¡Œï¼Œä¸æ˜¯æ‰€æœ‰çš„ä»£ç éƒ½èƒ½è¿›è¡Œä¿®æ”¹çš„ï¼Œç¬¬ä¸‰æ–¹çš„æ•°æ®æºComboPooledDataSourceæ˜¾ç„¶ä¸èƒ½ç”¨æ³¨è§£ï¼Œè¦è‡ªå·±å†™çš„ä»£ç æ‰å¯ä»¥ã€‚æ‰€ä»¥åŸå§‹æ³¨è§£å¯¹äºé‚£äº›éè‡ªå®šä¹‰çš„Beanå°±æŸæ‰‹æ— ç­–äº†ï¼›è¿˜æœ‰ç»„ä»¶æ‰«æä¹Ÿä¸€æ ·æ— æ³•ä½¿ç”¨åŸå§‹æ³¨è§£æ¥é…ç½®ã€‚

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â æ‰€ä»¥å°±è¦å¼•å…¥æ–°æ³¨è§£ã€‚

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰æ­å»ºæ¨¡æ‹Ÿç¯å¢ƒ

1.åˆ›å»ºSpringé…ç½®ç±»config.SpringConfigurationæ¥ä»£æ›¿applicationContext.xml

package com.hugo.config;

import org.springframework.context.annotation.Configuration;
//æ ‡å¿—è¯¥ç±»æ˜¯Springæ ¸å¿ƒé…ç½®ç±»
@Configuration
public class SpringConfiguration {
}

2.çœ‹applicationContext.xmlé‡Œé¢çš„å†…å®¹ï¼Œåœ¨SpringConfigurationç±»ä¸­è¿›è¡Œé€ä¸€æ›¿ä»£

//æ ‡å¿—è¯¥ç±»æ˜¯Springæ ¸å¿ƒé…ç½®ç±»
@Configuration
//<comtext:component-scan base-package="com.hugo"/>
@ComponentScan("com.hugo")
//<comtext:property-placeholder location="classpath:jdbc.properties"/>
@PropertySource("classpath:jdbc.properties ")
public class SpringConfiguration {

    @Value("${jdbc.driver}")
    private String driver;
    @Value("${jdbc.url}")
    private String url;
    @Value("${jdbc.username}")
    private String username;
    @Value("${jdbc.password}")
    private String password;

    //è¿™ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•çš„è¿”å›å€¼å°±æ˜¯éè‡ªå®šä¹‰çš„DataSource
    //å†™å®Œæ–¹æ³•åï¼Œå¾—æŠŠè¿”å›å€¼æ”¾åˆ°å®¹å™¨å½“ä¸­
    @Bean("dataSource")//Springä¼šå°†å½“å‰æ–¹æ³•çš„è¿”å›å€¼ä»¥æŒ‡å®šåç§°å­˜å‚¨åˆ°Springå®¹å™¨å½“ä¸­
    public DataSource getDataSource() throws PropertyVetoException {
        //å°±æŠŠåˆ›å»ºä»¥å‰åˆ›å»ºDataSourceçš„ä»£ç æ‹·è´è¿›æ¥
        //DataSourceTest.test1()
        ComboPooledDataSource dataSource = new ComboPooledDataSource();
        //è®¾ç½®åŸºæœ¬çš„è¿æ¥å‚æ•°
        dataSource.setDriverClass(driver);
        dataSource.setJdbcUrl(url);
        dataSource.setUser(username);
        dataSource.setPassword(password);
        return dataSource;
    }

}

3.@Import

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰å†åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªé…ç½®ç±»DataSourceConfigurationä¸“é—¨é…ç½®æ•°æ®æº

//<comtext:property-placeholder location="classpath:jdbc.properties"/>
@PropertySource("classpath:jdbc.properties ")
public class DataSourceConfiguration {
    @Value("${jdbc.driver}")
    private String driver;
    @Value("${jdbc.url}")
    private String url;
    @Value("${jdbc.username}")
    private String username;
    @Value("${jdbc.password}")
    private String password;

    //è¿™ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•çš„è¿”å›å€¼å°±æ˜¯éè‡ªå®šä¹‰çš„DataSource
    //å†™å®Œæ–¹æ³•åï¼Œå¾—æŠŠè¿”å›å€¼æ”¾åˆ°å®¹å™¨å½“ä¸­
    @Bean("dataSource")//Springä¼šå°†å½“å‰æ–¹æ³•çš„è¿”å›å€¼ä»¥æŒ‡å®šåç§°å­˜å‚¨åˆ°Springå®¹å™¨å½“ä¸­
    public DataSource getDataSource() throws PropertyVetoException {
        //å°±æŠŠåˆ›å»ºä»¥å‰åˆ›å»ºDataSourceçš„ä»£ç æ‹·è´è¿›æ¥
        //DataSourceTest.test1()
        ComboPooledDataSource dataSource = new ComboPooledDataSource();
        //è®¾ç½®åŸºæœ¬çš„è¿æ¥å‚æ•°
        dataSource.setDriverClass(driver);
        dataSource.setJdbcUrl(url);
        dataSource.setUser(username);
        dataSource.setPassword(password);
        return dataSource;
    }
}

ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰æ ¸å¿ƒé…ç½®ç±»å¼•å…¥DataSourceConfiguration

//æ ‡å¿—è¯¥ç±»æ˜¯Springæ ¸å¿ƒé…ç½®ç±»
@Configuration
//<comtext:component-scan base-package="com.hugo"/>
@ComponentScan("com.hugo")
//<import resource=""/>
@Import(DataSourceConfiguration.class)//è¿™æ˜¯ä¸ªæ•°ç»„{DataSourceConfiguration.class,xxx.class,....}å¯å¼•å…¥å¤šä¸ª
public class SpringConfiguration {

}

ï¼ˆ3ï¼‰æµ‹è¯•

public class UserController {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        //ClassPathXmlApplicationContext app = new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext("applicationContext.xml");ä½¿ç”¨äº†æ³¨è§£å°±ä¸éœ€è¦é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶æ¥åŠ è½½äº†
        ApplicationContext app = new AnnotationConfigApplicationContext(SpringConfiguration.class);
        UserService userService = app.getBean(UserService.class);
        userService.save();
    }
}

3.å…³äºè§£è€¦

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å…¶å®è§£è€¦ä¸æ˜¯æŒ‡ä¸èƒ½ä¿®æ”¹æºä»£ç ï¼Œè€¦åˆåº¦æ˜¯æŒ‡é€»è¾‘ä¸Šçš„ä¾èµ–ï¼Œä¸ä¼šæ”¹ä¸€å¤„è€ŒåŠ¨å…¨èº«ã€‚

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â æ³¨è§£æ˜¯ä¸ºäº†å¢åŠ ç¼–ç¨‹çš„æ•æ·æ€§ï¼Œç”¨åˆ°å“ªæ³¨åˆ°å“ªï¼Œéšç”¨éšæ³¨ã€‚åŸç†æ˜¯è·Ÿxmlæ˜¯ä¸€æ ·çš„ï¼Œå·®åˆ«åœ¨äºè¯»å–é…ç½®çš„æ–¹å¼ä¸ä¸€æ ·ã€‚è€¦åˆåº¦æ˜¯æŒ‡é€»è¾‘ä¸Šçš„ä¾èµ–ï¼Œä¸ä¼šæ”¹ä¸€å¤„è€ŒåŠ¨å…¨èº«ã€‚

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å¦‚æœä¸ä½¿ç”¨Springå®¹å™¨åˆ›å»ºæŸä¸ªæ¥å£çš„å®ç°ç±»ï¼Œè€Œæ˜¯ä½¿ç”¨newå»åˆ›å»ºæŸä¸ªå…·ä½“çš„å®ç°ç±»ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªç±»å¯èƒ½éœ€è¦newå¤šæ¬¡ï¼Œå› ä¸ºè¦ä½¿ç”¨å¤šæ¬¡ï¼›é‚£ä¹ˆé—®é¢˜æ¥äº†ï¼Œå¦‚æœæŸå¤©æˆ‘æƒ³æ”¹ä¸€ä¸‹è¯¥æ¥å£çš„å®ç°ç±»å‘¢ï¼Ÿé‚£ä¹ˆæ–°å†™ä¸€ä¸ªç±»ï¼Œä¿®æ”¹ä»¥ä¸‹æ³¨è§£å°±è¡Œäº†ï¼Œè€Œä¸ç”¨ä¿®æ”¹æ¯ä¸€å¤„newçš„ä»£ç ã€‚

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â æœ‰æ—¶å€™å°±æƒ³æ ä¸€ä¸‹ï¼Œæ—¢ç„¶è¦æ”¹å®ç°ç±»ï¼Œæˆ‘æŠŠåŸæ¥çš„ç±»ç›´æ¥ä¿®æ”¹ä¸å°±è¡Œäº†ï¼Ÿç¡®å®å¯ä»¥ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯å‡å¦‚æˆ‘çš„éœ€æ±‚æ˜¯ä¿ç•™åŸæ¥çš„å®ç°ç±»ï¼Œåˆè¦æ›´æ¢å®ç°ç±»å‘¢ï¼Ÿæˆ–è€…æˆ‘æœ¬æ¥å°±å†™å¥½å¤šä¸ªå®ç°ç±»äº†ï¼Œæˆ‘æƒ³åˆ‡æ¢ä¸€ä¸‹å‘¢ï¼Ÿè¿™å°±å¾ˆéœ€è¦è§£è€¦åˆäº†ã€‚

4.Springæ•´åˆJunit

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å…¶å®ä¸æ•´åˆä¹Ÿèƒ½ç”¨Junitï¼Œå¯¼å…¥åæ ‡å°±è¡Œäº†ã€‚ä½†æ˜¯çœ‹çœ‹ä»¥å‰çš„æµ‹è¯•æ–¹æ³•å’Œç±»çš„ä»£ç ã€‚

public class UserController {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        //ClassPathXmlApplicationContext app = new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext("applicationContext.xml");ä½¿ç”¨äº†æ³¨è§£å°±ä¸éœ€è¦é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶æ¥åŠ è½½äº†
        ApplicationContext app = new AnnotationConfigApplicationContext(SpringConfiguration.class);
        UserService userService = app.getBean(UserService.class);
        userService.save();
    }
}
@Test
//æµ‹è¯•Springå®¹å™¨äº§ç”Ÿæ•°æ®æºå¯¹è±¡ï¼ˆc3p0ï¼‰
public void test4() throws PropertyVetoException, SQLException {
    ApplicationContext applicationContext = new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext("applicationContext.xml");
    ComboPooledDataSource dataSource = (ComboPooledDataSource) applicationContext.getBean("dataSource");
    Connection connection = dataSource.getConnection();
    System.out.println(connection);
    connection.close();
}

ä¸Šè¿°é—®é¢˜è§£å†³æ€è·¯ï¼š

  • è®©SpringJunitè´Ÿè´£åˆ›å»ºSpringå®¹å™¨ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯éœ€è¦å°†é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶çš„åç§°å‘Šè¯‰å®ƒ
  • å°†éœ€è¦è¿›è¡Œæµ‹è¯•Beanç›´æ¥åœ¨æµ‹è¯•ç±»ä¸­è¿›è¡Œæ³¨å…¥

<dependency>
    <groupId>junit</groupId>
    <artifactId>junit</artifactId>
    <version>4.11</version>
    <scope>com.hugo.test</scope>
</dependency>
<dependency>
    <groupId>org.springframework</groupId>
    <artifactId>spring-test</artifactId>
    <version>5.0.5.RELEASE</version>
</dependency>

  • Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â æ³¨æ„ï¼šå› ä¸ºè¦ä½¿ç”¨æ³¨è§£å¼€å‘ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯æˆ‘ä»¬åˆä¸èƒ½åœ¨æºç ä¸Šè¿›è¡Œæ³¨è§£ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥éœ€è¦åœ¨applicationContext.xmlä¸­é…ç½®ç»„ä»¶æ‰«æï¼Œä½œç”¨æ˜¯æŒ‡å®šå“ªä¸ªåŒ…åŠå…¶å­åŒ…ä¸‹çš„Beanéœ€è¦è¿›è¡Œæ‰«æä¸€éè¯†åˆ«ä½¿ç”¨æ³¨è§£é…ç½®çš„ç±»ã€å­—æ®µå’Œæ–¹æ³•ã€‚ä¸ç„¶ä¼šæŠ¥é”™ã€‚(å¦‚æœä½¿ç”¨äº†Springé…ç½®ç±»config.SpringConfigurationæ¥ä»£æ›¿applicationContext.xmlå°±ä¸ç”¨äº†)

<!--é…ç½®ç»„ä»¶æ‰«æ-->
<comtext:component-scan base-package="com.hugo"/>
@RunWith(SpringJUnit4ClassRunner.class)//æŒ‡å®šæµ‹è¯•æ˜¯ä½¿ç”¨Springé›†æˆçš„Junitæµ‹è¯•
@ContextConfiguration("classpath:applicationContext.xml")//æŠŠé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶/ç±»å‘Šè¯‰Spring
public class SpringJunitTest {

    //å‡å¦‚è¦æµ‹è¯•çš„æ˜¯UserService,è¦å…ˆæ³¨å…¥
    @Autowired
    private UserService userService;

    @Test
    public void test1(){
        userService.save();
    }

}

è¿è¡Œç»“æœï¼š

å¦‚æœåŠ è½½çš„æ˜¯æ ¸å¿ƒé…ç½®ç±»@ContextConfiguration(classes = SpringConfiguration.class)å°±ä¸ç”¨å¼•å…¥xmlé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶äº†

å¦‚æœè¦æµ‹è¯•å¤šä¸ªå±æ€§ä¹Ÿæ˜¯å¯ä»¥çš„ï¼š

@RunWith(SpringJUnit4ClassRunner.class)//æŒ‡å®šæµ‹è¯•æ˜¯ä½¿ç”¨Springé›†æˆçš„Junitæµ‹è¯•
//@ContextConfiguration("classpath:applicationContext.xml")//æŠŠé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶/ç±»å‘Šè¯‰Spring
@ContextConfiguration(classes = {SpringConfiguration.class})//é…ç½®ç±»
public class SpringJunitTest {

    //å‡å¦‚è¦æµ‹è¯•çš„æ˜¯UserService,è¦å…ˆæ³¨å…¥
    @Autowired
    private UserService userService;
    @Autowired
    private DataSource dataSource;

    @Test
    public void test1() throws Exception {
        userService.save();
        System.out.println(dataSource.getConnection());
    }

}

äº”.Springçš„AOP

1.AOPç®€ä»‹

1.1.ä»€ä¹ˆæ˜¯AOP

1.2.AOPçš„ä½œç”¨ä¸ä¼˜åŠ¿

  • ä½œç”¨ï¼šåœ¨ç¨‹åºè¿è¡ŒæœŸé—´ï¼Œåœ¨ä¸ä¿®æ”¹æºç çš„æƒ…å†µä¸‹å¯¹æ–¹æ³•è¿›è¡ŒåŠŸèƒ½å¢å¼º
  • ä¼˜åŠ¿ï¼šå‡å°‘é‡å¤ä»£ç ï¼Œæé«˜å¼€å‘æ•ˆç‡ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”ä¾¿äºç»´æŠ¤

å…³äºä»£ç†

  • JDKåŠ¨æ€ä»£ç†æ˜¯åŸºäºæ¥å£çš„æ–¹å¼ï¼Œæ¢å¥è¯æ¥è¯´å°±æ˜¯ä»£ç†ç±»å’Œç›®æ ‡ç±»éƒ½å®ç°åŒä¸€ä¸ªæ¥å£
  • CGLibåŠ¨æ€ä»£ç†æ˜¯ä»£ç†ç±»å»ç»§æ‰¿ç›®æ ‡ç±»ï¼Œç„¶åé‡å†™å…¶ä¸­ç›®æ ‡ç±»çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œè¿™æ ·ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ä¿è¯ä»£ç†ç±»æ‹¥æœ‰ç›®æ ‡ç±»çš„åŒåæ–¹æ³•

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å·¦è¾¹æ˜¯ç”±å®ç°æ¥å£ï¼Œå³è¾¹æ˜¯æ²¡æœ‰implementæ¥å£

2.åŸºäºjdkçš„åŠ¨æ€ä»£ç†ï¼ˆå®ç°åŸç†ï¼‰

InvocationHandlerå’ŒProxy(Class)çš„åŠ¨æ€ä»£ç†æœºåˆ¶è¯¦è§£(è¿™ä¸¤ä¸ªä¸€èµ·ä½¿ç”¨çš„)

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â é™æ€ä»£ç†æ˜¯éœ€è¦ç»™æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªç›®æ ‡å¯¹è±¡çš„æ¥å£æ–¹æ³•é€ä¸€ä»£ç†ï¼Œè€ŒåŠ¨æ€ä»£ç†ï¼šé€šè¿‡è°ƒç ”Proxy.newProxyInstance()å°†ç›®æ ‡å¯¹è±¡å’Œå®ç°InvocationHandleræ¥å£çš„ä»£ç†å¯¹è±¡è¿›è¡Œç»‘å®šï¼Œä¿®æ”¹ä»£ç†å¯¹è±¡çš„InvocationHandleræ¥å£æ–¹æ³•invokeå³å¯ç»Ÿä¸€è¿›è¡Œä»£ç†

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å› ä¸ºä»£ç†å¯¹è±¡éœ€è¦ä¸ç›®æ ‡å¯¹è±¡å®ç°ä¸€æ ·çš„æ¥å£,æ‰€ä»¥ä¼šæœ‰å¾ˆå¤šä»£ç†ç±»,ç±»å¤ªå¤š.åŒæ—¶,ä¸€æ—¦æ¥å£å¢åŠ æ–¹æ³•,ç›®æ ‡å¯¹è±¡ä¸ä»£ç†å¯¹è±¡éƒ½è¦ç»´æŠ¤ã€‚å› ä¸ºé™æ€ä»£ç†çš„ç±»ä¹Ÿå®ç°äº†è¯¥æ¥å£ï¼Œè€ŒåŠ¨æ€ä»£ç†çš„å°±ä¸ç”¨è‡ªå·±å»å®ç°è¯¥æ¥å£ã€‚

public Object invoke(Object object, Method method, Object[] args)
            throws Throwable
    {
        //ã€€ã€€åœ¨ä»£ç†çœŸå®å¯¹è±¡å‰æˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥æ·»åŠ ä¸€äº›è‡ªå·±çš„æ“ä½œ
        System.out.println("before rent house");
        
        System.out.println("Method:" + method);
        
        //    å½“ä»£ç†å¯¹è±¡è°ƒç”¨çœŸå®å¯¹è±¡çš„æ–¹æ³•æ—¶ï¼Œå…¶ä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨çš„è·³è½¬åˆ°ä»£ç†å¯¹è±¡å…³è”çš„handlerå¯¹è±¡çš„invokeæ–¹æ³•æ¥è¿›è¡Œè°ƒç”¨
        method.invoke(subject, args);
        
        //ã€€ã€€åœ¨ä»£ç†çœŸå®å¯¹è±¡åæˆ‘ä»¬ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥æ·»åŠ ä¸€äº›è‡ªå·±çš„æ“ä½œ
        System.out.println("after rent house");
        
        return null;
    }

ä»£ç æ¼”ç¤ºï¼š

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰åˆ›å»ºå¦‚ä¸‹ç±»ï¼š

ç›®æ ‡æ¥å£TargetInterfaceï¼š

package com.hugo.proxy.jdk;

public interface TargetInterface {
    public void save();
}

ç›®æ ‡å¯¹è±¡ç±»Targetï¼š

package com.hugo.proxy.jdk;
//ç›®æ ‡å¯¹è±¡
public class Target implements TargetInterface{
    @Override
    public void save() {
        System.out.println("save running......");
    }
}

å†™å¢å¼ºæ–¹æ³•çš„ç±»Adviceï¼š

package com.hugo.proxy.jdk;
//å¢å¼º
public class Advice {
    public void before(){
        System.out.println("å‰ç½®å¢å¼º......");
    }
    public void afterReturning(){
        System.out.println("åç½®å¢å¼º......");
    }
}

æµ‹è¯•ç±»ProxyTest:

package com.hugo.proxy.jdk;

import java.lang.reflect.InvocationHandler;
import java.lang.reflect.Method;
import java.lang.reflect.Proxy;

//æµ‹è¯•ç±»
public class ProxyTest {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        //åˆ›å»ºç›®æ ‡å¯¹è±¡
        final Target target = new Target();
        //è·å¾—å¢å¼ºå¯¹è±¡
        Advice advice = new Advice();

        //è¿”å›å€¼å°±æ˜¯åŠ¨æ€ç”Ÿæˆçš„ä»£ç†å¯¹è±¡
        TargetInterface proxy = (TargetInterface) Proxy.newProxyInstance(
                target.getClass().getClassLoader()/*ç›®æ ‡å¯¹è±¡ç±»åŠ è½½å™¨*/,
                target.getClass().getInterfaces()/*ç›®æ ‡å¯¹è±¡ç›¸åŒçš„æ¥å£-Interfaceå¯¹è±¡çš„æ•°ç»„*/,
                new InvocationHandler() {
                    //è°ƒç”¨ä»£ç†å¯¹è±¡çš„ä»»ä½•æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå®è´¨æ‰§è¡Œçš„éƒ½æ˜¯invokeæ–¹æ³•
                    @Override
                    public Object invoke(Object o, Method method, Object[] objects) throws Throwable {
                        //å‰ç½®å¢å¼º
                        advice.before();
                        //åå°„
                        method.invoke(target, args);//åœ¨invokeæ–¹æ³•é‡Œè°ƒç”¨æ‰§è¡Œç›®æ ‡å¯¹è±¡çš„æ–¹æ³•
                        //åç½®å¢å¼º
                        advice.afterReturning();
                        return null;
                    }
                }/*å…³è”ä»£ç†å¯¹è±¡çš„InvocationHandlerå¯¹è±¡*/);
        //è°ƒç”¨ä»£ç†å¯¹è±¡çš„æ–¹æ³•
        proxy.save();//è¾“å…¥æ—¶ï¼ŒIDEAæœ‰è¡¥å…¨æç¤º
    }
}

ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰æµ‹è¯•ç»“æœï¼š

å‰ç½®å¢å¼º......
save running......
åç½®å¢å¼º......

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â è¿™jdkåŠ¨æ€ä»£ç†æ˜¯Spring aopçš„åº•å±‚å®ç°ï¼Œåé¢Springä¸ç”¨æˆ‘ä»¬è‡ªå·±å†™ï¼Œå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡é…ç½®æ¥å®ç°ã€‚

3.åŸºäºcglibçš„åŠ¨æ€ä»£ç†

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å¦‚æœç›®æ ‡å¯¹è±¡æ²¡æœ‰æ¥å£ï¼ˆæ¯”å¦‚2ä¸­çš„TargetInterfaceï¼‰ï¼Œå°±ä¸èƒ½ä½¿ç”¨jdkçš„åŠ¨æ€ä»£ç†äº†ã€‚ç¬¬ä¸‰æ–¹çš„cglibå°±èƒ½æ´¾ä¸Šç”¨åœºäº†ã€‚ä½†æ˜¯æ–°ç‰ˆçš„Springçš„æ ¸å¿ƒå·²ç»é›†æˆäº†cglibï¼Œä¸ç”¨å¯¼åæ ‡äº†ã€‚

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰å°†ä¸Šé¢com.hugo.proxy.jdké‡Œçš„Targetï¼ŒAdviceï¼Œæ‹·è´åˆ°æ–°åˆ›å»ºçš„åŒ…package com.hugo.proxy.cglibä¸‹ã€‚

  • å–æ¶ˆTargetçš„æ¥å£
package com.hugo.proxy.cglib;

//ç›®æ ‡å¯¹è±¡
public class Target{

    public void save() {
        System.out.println("save running......");
    }
}
  • ä¿®æ”¹æµ‹è¯•ç±»ProxyTest
package com.hugo.proxy.cglib;

import org.springframework.cglib.proxy.Enhancer;
import org.springframework.cglib.proxy.MethodInterceptor;
import org.springframework.cglib.proxy.MethodProxy;

import java.lang.reflect.Method;

//æµ‹è¯•ç±»
public class ProxyTest {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        //åˆ›å»ºç›®æ ‡å¯¹è±¡
        final Target target = new Target();
        //è·å¾—å¢å¼ºå¯¹è±¡
        Advice advice = new Advice();

        //è¿”å›å€¼å°±æ˜¯åŠ¨æ€ç”Ÿæˆçš„ä»£ç†å¯¹è±¡ åŸºäºcglib
        //1.åˆ›å»ºå¢å¼ºå™¨
        Enhancer enhancer = new Enhancer();
        //2.è®¾ç½®çˆ¶ç±»ï¼ˆç›®æ ‡ï¼‰
        enhancer.setSuperclass(target.getClass());
        //3.è®¾ç½®å›è°ƒ        MethodInterceptoræ˜¯Callbackçš„å­æ¥å£
        enhancer.setCallback(new MethodInterceptor() {
            @Override
            public Object intercept(Object o, Method method, Object[] args, MethodProxy methodProxy) throws Throwable {
                advice.before();//æ‰§è¡Œå‰ç½®
                Object invoke = method.invoke(target, args);//æ‰§è¡Œç›®æ ‡
                advice.afterReturning();//æ‰§è¡Œåç½®
                return null;
            }
        });
        //4.åˆ›å»ºä»£ç†å¯¹è±¡
        Target proxy = (Target) enhancer.create();//ç”Ÿæˆçš„æ˜¯Targetå­å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥èƒ½ç”¨Targetæ¥æ”¶
        proxy.save();
    }
}

ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰æµ‹è¯•ç»“æœï¼š

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å¦‚æœæœ‰çº¢è‰²è­¦å‘Šï¼Œä¸å½±å“è¿è¡Œï¼Œåªéœ€å°†pom.xmlæ–‡ä»¶é‡Œé¢æŠŠspringframeworkçš„å„ä¸ªdependencyç‰ˆæœ¬æ”¹åˆ°5.2.5å°±å¥½äº†ã€‚

å‰ç½®å¢å¼º......
save running......
åç½®å¢å¼º......

Process finished with exit code 0

4.AOPç›¸å…³æ¦‚å¿µå’Œå¼€å‘äº‹é¡¹

5.åŸºäºXMLçš„AOPå¼€å‘

1.å¯¼å…¥AOPç›¸å…³åæ ‡

â€‹ è™½ç„¶Springå†…éƒ¨æœ‰æºç”Ÿçš„AOPï¼Œä½†æ˜¯å®ƒæ›´æå€¡ä½¿ç”¨aspectj

<dependency>
    <groupId>org.aspectj</groupId>
    <artifactId>aspectjweaver</artifactId>
    <version>1.8.4</version>
</dependency>

2.åˆ›å»ºç›®æ ‡æ¥å£å’Œç›®æ ‡ç±»ï¼ˆå†…éƒ¨æœ‰åˆ‡ç‚¹ï¼‰

åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªaopåŒ…ï¼ŒæŠŠjdkåŒ…ä¸‹çš„ç›®æ ‡æ¥å£TargetInterfaceå’Œç›®æ ‡å¯¹è±¡ç±»Targetå¤åˆ¶åˆ°aopåŒ…ã€‚

package com.hugo.aop;

public interface TargetInterface {
    public void save();
}
package com.hugo.aop;

//ç›®æ ‡å¯¹è±¡
public class Target implements TargetInterface {
    @Override
    public void save() {
        System.out.println("save running......");
    }
}

3.åˆ›å»ºåˆ‡é¢ç±»ï¼ˆå†…éƒ¨æœ‰å¢å¼ºæ–¹æ³•ï¼‰

package com.hugo.aop;
//åˆ‡é¢ç±»
public class MyAspect {
    public void before(){
        System.out.println("å‰ç½®å¢å¼º......");
    }
}

4.å°†ç›®æ ‡ç±»å’Œåˆ‡é¢ç±»çš„å¯¹è±¡åˆ›å»ºäº¤ç»™Spring

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â åœ¨èµ„æºç›®å½•ä¸‹åˆ›å»ºé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶applicationContext.xmlæ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œå¹¶ç»™Targetå’ŒMyAspecté…ç½®Bean

<!--ç›®æ ‡å¯¹è±¡-->
<bean id="target" class="com.hugo.aop.Target"></bean>

<!--åˆ‡é¢å¯¹è±¡-->
<bean id="myAspect" class="com.hugo.aop.MyAspect"></bean>

5.åœ¨applicationContext.xmlä¸­é…ç½®ç»‡å…¥å…³ç³»ï¼š

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰å¼•å…¥aopå‘½åç©ºé—´ï¼š

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
       xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
       xmlns:aop="http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop"
       xsi:schemaLocation="
       http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans.xsd
       http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop/spring-aop.xsd
">

ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰é…ç½®ç»‡å…¥å…³ç³»ï¼š

<!--é…ç½®ç»‡å…¥ï¼Œå‘Šè¯‰springæ¡†æ¶ï¼Œå“ªäº›æ–¹æ³•ï¼ˆåˆ‡ç‚¹ï¼‰éœ€è¦è¿›è¡Œå“ªäº›å¢å¼ºï¼ˆå‰ç½®ã€åç½®...ï¼‰-->
<aop:config>
    <!--å£°æ˜åˆ‡é¢,myAspectæ˜¯åˆ‡é¢ç±»é‡Œé¢æœ‰å¢å¼ºæ–¹æ³•ï¼ˆæ¯”å¦‚ç”¨ä½œå‰ç½®å¢å¼ºçš„before()ï¼‰-->
    <aop:aspect ref="myAspect">
        <!--åˆ‡é¢åŒ…æ‹¬ åˆ‡ç‚¹ + é€šçŸ¥ï¼ˆå¢å¼ºï¼‰-->
        <aop:before method="before" pointcut="execution(public void com.hugo.aop.Target.save())"/>
    </aop:aspect>
</aop:config>

6.æµ‹è¯•ï¼š

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰åœ¨testç›®å½•ä¸‹çš„teståŒ…åˆ›å»ºæµ‹è¯•ç±»ï¼šAopTest:

package com.hugo.test;

import com.hugo.aop.TargetInterface;
import org.junit.Test;
import org.junit.runner.RunWith;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.test.context.ContextConfiguration;
import org.springframework.test.context.junit4.SpringJUnit4ClassRunner;

@RunWith(SpringJUnit4ClassRunner.class)
@ContextConfiguration("classpath:applicationContext1.xml")
public class AopTest {

    @Autowired
    private TargetInterface target;

    @Test
    public void test1(){
        target.save();
    }
}

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å› ä¸ºæˆ‘åœ¨ä¸»ç›®å½•å’Œtestç›®å½•éƒ½æœ‰èµ„æºæ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”é‡Œé¢éƒ½æœ‰applicationContext.xmlé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥è¦å°†ä¸»mainç›®å½•ä¸‹çš„èµ„æºæ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ä¸‹çš„applicationContext.xmlæ”¹åä¸ºapplicationContext1.xmlã€‚å¦åˆ™åªèƒ½è¯»å–åˆ°testç›®å½•ä¸‹çš„ã€‚

ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰å°†applicationContext1.xmlé‡Œé¢çš„ç»‡å…¥å…³ç³»æ³¨é‡Šæ‰ï¼Œè¿è¡Œç»“æœä¸ºï¼š

save running......

Process finished with exit code 0

ï¼ˆ3ï¼‰é…ç½®ç»‡å…¥å…³ç³»åè¿è¡Œç»“æœä¸ºï¼š

å‰ç½®å¢å¼º......
save running......

Process finished with exit code 0

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å¢å¼ºçš„åŠŸèƒ½é€»è¾‘ä»£ç å’Œç›®æ ‡æ˜¯è§£è€¦åˆçš„ã€‚è¿™å°±æ˜¯åŸºäºxmlçš„AOPå¿«é€Ÿå…¥é—¨ã€‚

  • å¤§æ¦‚éƒ½åœ¨æ³¨é‡Šé‡Œå†™äº†ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œåªæ˜¯è¡¥å……ä¸€ä¸‹ã€‚

é€šçŸ¥çš„ç±»å‹ï¼š

aop:before

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â è¿˜å¯ä»¥é€‰æ‹©å…¶ä»–å¢å¼ºï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚åç½®å¢å¼ºç­‰ã€‚

å…³äºç¯ç»•é€šçŸ¥ï¼š

1ï¼‰åœ¨MyAspectå¢åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•ï¼š

package com.hugo.aop;

import org.aspectj.lang.ProceedingJoinPoint;

//åˆ‡é¢ç±»
public class MyAspect {
    public void before(){
        System.out.println("å‰ç½®å¢å¼º......");
    }
    public Object around(ProceedingJoinPoint pjp) throws Throwable {
        System.out.println("ç¯ç»•å‰å¢å¼ºã€‚ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚");
        Object proceed = pjp.proceed();//åˆ‡ç‚¹æ–¹æ³• ProceedingJoinPoint
        System.out.println("ç¯ç»•åå¢å¼ºã€‚ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚");
        return proceed;//å› ä¸ºåˆ‡ç‚¹å¯èƒ½ä¼šæœ‰è¿”å›å€¼ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ä¸€èˆ¬è¦æœ‰è¿”å›ç±»å‹
    }
}

2ï¼‰é…ç½®ç»‡å…¥

    <aop:config>
        <!--å£°æ˜åˆ‡é¢,myAspectæ˜¯åˆ‡é¢ç±»é‡Œé¢æœ‰å¢å¼ºæ–¹æ³•ï¼ˆæ¯”å¦‚ç”¨ä½œå‰ç½®å¢å¼ºçš„before()ï¼‰-->
        <aop:aspect ref="myAspect">
            <!--åˆ‡é¢åŒ…æ‹¬ åˆ‡ç‚¹ + é€šçŸ¥ï¼ˆå¢å¼ºï¼‰-->
<!--            <aop:before method="before" pointcut="execution(public void com.hugo.aop.Target.save())"/>-->
            <aop:around method="around" pointcut="execution(public void com.hugo.aop.Target.save())"/>
        </aop:aspect>
    </aop:config>

3ï¼‰æµ‹è¯•ç»“æœ

ç¯ç»•å‰å¢å¼ºã€‚ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚
save running......
ç¯ç»•åå¢å¼ºã€‚ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚

Process finished with exit code 0

methodè¡¨ç¤ºé€‰ç”¨åˆ‡é¢ç±»é‡Œé¢çš„å“ªä¸ªå¢å¼ºæ–¹æ³•ã€‚

åˆ‡ç‚¹è¡¨è¾¾å¼ï¼š

execution(public void com.hugo.aop.Target.save())

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å¯ä»¥æŒ‡å®šå¤šä¸ªæ–¹æ³•ã€‚

åˆ‡ç‚¹è¡¨è¾¾å¼çš„æŠ½å–ï¼š

    <aop:config>
        <aop:aspect ref="myAspect">
            <!--æŠ½å–åˆ‡ç‚¹è¡¨è¾¾å¼-->
            <aop:pointcut id="myPointcut" expression="execution(* com.hugo.aop.*.*(..))" />
<!--            <aop:around method="around" pointcut="execution(public void com.hugo.aop.Target.save())"/>-->
            <aop:around method="around" pointcut-ref="myPointcut"/>
        </aop:aspect>
    </aop:config>

6.åŸºäºæ³¨è§£çš„AOPå¼€å‘

1.åˆ›å»ºannoåŒ…ï¼Œå¹¶å°†aopåŒ…ä¸‹çš„MyAspectï¼ŒTargetInterfaceï¼ŒTargetå¤åˆ¶åˆ°åŒ…ä¸‹

package com.hugo.anno;

public interface TargetInterface {
    public void save();
}
package com.hugo.anno;

//ç›®æ ‡å¯¹è±¡
public class Target implements TargetInterface {
    @Override
    public void save() {
        System.out.println("save running......");
    }
}
package com.hugo.anno;

import org.aspectj.lang.ProceedingJoinPoint;

//åˆ‡é¢ç±»
public class MyAspect {
    public void before(){
        System.out.println("å‰ç½®å¢å¼º......");
    }
    //ProceedingJoinPointï¼š æ­£åœ¨æ‰§è¡Œçš„è¿æ¥ç‚¹ == åˆ‡ç‚¹
    public Object around(ProceedingJoinPoint pjp) throws Throwable {
        System.out.println("ç¯ç»•å‰å¢å¼ºã€‚ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚");
        Object proceed = pjp.proceed();//åˆ‡ç‚¹æ–¹æ³•
        System.out.println("ç¯ç»•åå¢å¼ºã€‚ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚");
        return proceed;//å› ä¸ºåˆ‡ç‚¹å¯èƒ½ä¼šæœ‰è¿”å›å€¼ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ä¸€èˆ¬è¦æœ‰è¿”å›ç±»å‹
    }
}

2.å°†ç›®æ ‡ç±»å’Œåˆ‡é¢ç±»çš„å¯¹è±¡åˆ›å»ºäº¤ç»™Springå¹¶æ ‡è®°åˆ‡é¢ç±»å’Œç»‡å…¥

ç›®æ ‡ç±»ï¼š

package com.hugo.anno;

import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;

//ç›®æ ‡å¯¹è±¡
@Component("target")
public class Target implements TargetInterface {
    @Override
    public void save() {
        System.out.println("save running......");
    }
}

åˆ‡é¢ç±»ï¼š

package com.hugo.anno;

import org.aspectj.lang.ProceedingJoinPoint;
import org.aspectj.lang.annotation.Aspect;
import org.aspectj.lang.annotation.Before;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;

//åˆ‡é¢ç±»
@Component("myAspect")
@Aspect//æ ‡æ³¨å½“å‰MyAspectæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªåˆ‡é¢ç±»
public class MyAspect {
    @Before("execution(* com.hugo.anno.*.*(..))")
    public void before(){
        System.out.println("å‰ç½®å¢å¼º......");
    }
    @Around("execution(* com.hugo.anno.*.*(..))")
    public Object around(ProceedingJoinPoint pjp) throws Throwable {
        System.out.println("ç¯ç»•å‰å¢å¼ºã€‚ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚");
        Object proceed = pjp.proceed();//åˆ‡ç‚¹æ–¹æ³•
        System.out.println("ç¯ç»•åå¢å¼ºã€‚ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚");
        return proceed;//å› ä¸ºåˆ‡ç‚¹å¯èƒ½ä¼šæœ‰è¿”å›å€¼ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ä¸€èˆ¬è¦æœ‰è¿”å›ç±»å‹
    }
}

3.åˆ›å»ºæµ‹è¯•ç±»AnnoTestå’Œæ–°çš„é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶applicationContext-anno.xmlï¼ˆå› ä¸ºè¦ä½¿ç”¨æ³¨è§£æ¥æµ‹è¯•åˆä¸æƒ³å†™é…ç½®ç±»ï¼‰

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
       xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
       xmlns:aop="http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop"
       xmlns:context="http://www.springframework.org/schema/context"
       xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans.xsd
       http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop/spring-aop.xsd http://www.springframework.org/schema/context https://www.springframework.org/schema/context/spring-context.xsd">

    <context:component-scan base-package="com.hugo.anno"/>

</beans>

4.æµ‹è¯•æ—¶ï¼šæ³¨æ„è¦å°†TargetInterfaceçš„åŒ…æ”¹ä¸ºannoçš„

package com.hugo.test;

import com.hugo.anno.TargetInterface;
import org.junit.Test;
import org.junit.runner.RunWith;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.test.context.ContextConfiguration;
import org.springframework.test.context.junit4.SpringJUnit4ClassRunner;

@RunWith(SpringJUnit4ClassRunner.class)
@ContextConfiguration("classpath:applicationContext-anno.xml")
public class AnnoTest {

    @Autowired
    private TargetInterface target;

    @Test
    public void test1(){
        target.save();
    }
}

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â æ­¤æ—¶æ‰§è¡Œæµ‹è¯•ï¼Œä¼šå‘ç°æ²¡æœ‰å¢å¼ºæ–¹æ³•çš„è¿è¡Œã€‚åŸå› åœ¨äºå°‘äº†AOPçš„è‡ªåŠ¨ä»£ç†ã€‚

5.é…ç½®AOPçš„è‡ªåŠ¨ä»£ç†åï¼Œé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶çš„å…¨éƒ¨å†…å®¹å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
       xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
       xmlns:aop="http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop"
       xmlns:context="http://www.springframework.org/schema/context"
       xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans.xsd
       http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop/spring-aop.xsd http://www.springframework.org/schema/context https://www.springframework.org/schema/context/spring-context.xsd">

    <context:component-scan base-package="com.hugo.anno"/>
    <!--aopè‡ªåŠ¨ä»£ç†-->
    <aop:aspectj-autoproxy/>

</beans>

æ³¨è§£é€šçŸ¥ç±»å‹ï¼š

åˆ‡ç‚¹è¡¨è¾¾å¼çš„æŠ½å–ï¼š

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å¯ä»¥ä¸åŠ ç±»åæ¥å¼•ç”¨åˆ‡ç‚¹è¡¨è¾¾å¼ã€‚

æ€»ç»“ï¼š

å…­.JdbcTemplate

1.æ¦‚è¿°

2.åŸºæœ¬ä½¿ç”¨ï¼ˆå¿«é€Ÿå…¥é—¨ï¼‰

1.å¯¼å…¥spring-jdbcå’Œspring-txåæ ‡

<dependency>
  <groupId>org.springframework</groupId>
  <artifactId>spring-jdbc</artifactId>
  <version>5.2.5.RELEASE</version>
</dependency>
<dependency>
  <groupId>org.springframework</groupId>
  <artifactId>spring-tx</artifactId>
  <version>5.2.5.RELEASE</version>
</dependency>

2.åˆ›å»ºæ•°æ®åº“è¡¨å’Œå®ä½“

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰åˆ›å»ºæ•°æ®åº“è¡¨

ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰åˆ›å»ºè¯¥è¡¨å¯¹äºçš„å®ä½“

package com.hugo.domain;

public class Account {
    private String name;
    private double money;

    public Account() {
    }

    public Account(String name, double money) {
        this.name = name;
        this.money = money;
    }

    public String getName() {
        return name;
    }

    public void setName(String name) {
        this.name = name;
    }

    public double getMoney() {
        return money;
    }

    public void setMoney(double money) {
        this.money = money;
    }

    @Override
    public String toString() {
        return "Account{" +
                "name='" + name + '\'' +
                ", money=" + money +
                '}';
    }
}

3.åˆ›å»ºJdbcTemplateå¯¹è±¡å’Œæ•°æ®æº

package com.hugo.test;

import com.mchange.v2.c3p0.ComboPooledDataSource;
import org.junit.Test;
import org.springframework.jdbc.core.JdbcTemplate;

import java.beans.PropertyVetoException;

public class JdbcTemplateTest {
    @Test
    //æµ‹è¯•JdbcTemplateå¼€å‘æ­¥éª¤
    public void test() throws PropertyVetoException {
        //åˆ›å»ºæ•°æ®æºå¯¹è±¡
        ComboPooledDataSource dataSource = new ComboPooledDataSource();
        dataSource.setDriverClass("com.mysql.jdbc.Driver");
        dataSource.setJdbcUrl("jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/test");
        dataSource.setUser("root");
        dataSource.setPassword("123456");
        //åˆ›å»ºæ¨¡æ¿å¯¹è±¡
        JdbcTemplate jdbcTemplate = new JdbcTemplate();
        //è®¾ç½®æ•°æ®æºå¯¹è±¡ï¼ŒçŸ¥é“æ•°æ®æºåœ¨å“ª
        jdbcTemplate.setDataSource(dataSource);
        //æ‰§è¡Œæ“ä½œ
        int row = jdbcTemplate.update("insert into account value (?,?)", "tom", 5000);
        System.out.println(row);
    }
}

4.æµ‹è¯•ç»“æœï¼ˆæ’å…¥ï¼‰ï¼š

1

Process finished with exit code 0

3.Springäº§ç”ŸJdbcTemplateå¯¹è±¡

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰åˆ›å»ºå¹¶é…ç½®applicationContext.xmlæ–‡ä»¶

<!--é…ç½®æ•°æ®æºå¯¹è±¡-->
<bean id="dataSource" class="com.mchange.v2.c3p0.ComboPooledDataSource">
    <property name="driverClass" value="com.mysql.jdbc.Driver"/>
    <property name="jdbcUrl" value="jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/test"/>
    <property name="user" value="root"/>
    <property name="password" value="123456"/>
</bean>
<!--jdbcæ¨¡æ¿-->
<bean id="jdbcTemplate" class="org.springframework.jdbc.core.JdbcTemplate">
    <property name="dataSource" ref="dataSource"/>
</bean>

ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰åœ¨JdbcTemplateTestä¸­ç¼–å†™æµ‹è¯•æ–¹æ³•test2()

@Test
//æµ‹è¯•Springäº§ç”ŸjdbcTemplateå¯¹è±¡
public void test2() throws PropertyVetoException {
    ApplicationContext app = new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext("classpath:applicationContext.xml");
    JdbcTemplate jdbcTemplate = app.getBean(JdbcTemplate.class);
    int row = jdbcTemplate.update("insert into account value (?,?)", "zhangsan", 4399);
    System.out.println(row);
}

ï¼ˆ3ï¼‰è¿è¡Œç»“æœ

1

Process finished with exit code 0

æŠ½å–jdbc.propertiesæ–‡ä»¶:

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â applicationContext.xml:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
       xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
       xmlns:context="http://www.springframework.org/schema/context"
       xsi:schemaLocation="
       http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans.xsd
       http://www.springframework.org/schema/context  http://www.springframework.org/schema/context/spring-context.xsd
">

    <!--åŠ è½½jdbc.properties-->
    <context:property-placeholder location="jdbc.properties"/>

    <!--é…ç½®æ•°æ®æºå¯¹è±¡-->
    <bean id="dataSource" class="com.mchange.v2.c3p0.ComboPooledDataSource">
        <property name="driverClass" value="${jdbc.driver}"/>
        <property name="jdbcUrl" value="${jdbc.url}"/>
        <property name="user" value="${jdbc.username}"/>
        <property name="password" value="${jdbc.password}"/>
    </bean>
    <!--jdbcæ¨¡æ¿-->
    <bean id="jdbcTemplate" class="org.springframework.jdbc.core.JdbcTemplate">
        <property name="dataSource" ref="dataSource"/>
    </bean>

</beans>

4.å¸¸ç”¨æ“ä½œï¼ˆå¢åˆ æ”¹æŸ¥ï¼‰

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰å¢åˆ æ”¹éƒ½å±äºupdateæ“ä½œã€‚

ä½¿ç”¨springé›†æˆJunitè¿›è¡Œæµ‹è¯•ï¼Œæ–°å»ºtest.JdbcTemplateCRUDTestï¼š

package com.hugo.test;

import org.junit.Test;
import org.junit.runner.RunWith;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.jdbc.core.JdbcTemplate;
import org.springframework.test.context.ContextConfiguration;
import org.springframework.test.context.junit4.SpringJUnit4ClassRunner;

@RunWith(SpringJUnit4ClassRunner.class)
@ContextConfiguration("classpath:applicationContext.xml")//å°†ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡å‘Šè¯‰spring
public class JdbcTemplateCRUDTest {
    @Autowired
    private JdbcTemplate jdbcTemplate;

    @Test
    public void testUpdate(){
        jdbcTemplate.update("update account set money=? where name=?", 10000,"tom");
    }
    @Test
    public void testDelete(){
        jdbcTemplate.update("delete from account where name = ?", "tom");
    }
}

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â insertå·²ç»åœ¨ä¸Šé¢æµ‹è¯•è¿‡äº†ï¼Œå°±ä¸åœ¨è¿›è¡Œæ¼”ç¤ºäº†ã€‚

ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰æŸ¥è¯¢å±äºQueryæ“ä½œ

1ï¼‰æŸ¥è¯¢å…¨éƒ¨

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å‚æ•°RowMapperæ¥å£å°±æ˜¯å¸®åŠ©è¿›è¡Œå°è£…æˆjavaBeançš„åŠŸèƒ½å’Œè¡Œä¸ºæ¥å£ã€‚æ‰€ä»¥è¦newä¸€ä¸ªæ¥å£å¯¹åº”çš„å®ç°ç±»ã€‚è¯¥ç±»æœ‰å®ä½“å±æ€§å°è£…çš„å®ç°ã€‚è¯¥ç±»å°±æ˜¯BeanPropertyRowMapperã€‚æ„é€ å‡½æ•°ï¼š

å…³äºæ³›å‹å’Œæ³›å‹çš„ç¡®å®š

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â åœ¨æµ‹è¯•ç±»JdbcTemplateCRUDTestä¸­åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªæµ‹è¯•æ–¹æ³•ï¼š

    @Test
    public void testQueryAll(){
        //(sql:sqlè¯­å¥ï¼ŒrowMapper:å°è£…æˆJavabeançš„æ¥å£)
//        List<Account> accountList = jdbcTemplate.query("select * from account", new BeanPropertyRowMapper(Account.class));
//        List<Account> accountList = jdbcTemplate.query("select * from account", new BeanPropertyRowMapper<>(Account.class));
        List<Account> accountList = jdbcTemplate.query("select * from account", new BeanPropertyRowMapper<Account>(Account.class));
        System.out.println(accountList);
    }

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â æµ‹è¯•ç»“æœï¼š

[Account{name='lisi', money=4399.0}, Account{name='tom', money=5000.0}, Account{name='zhangsan', money=4399.0}]

Process finished with exit code 0

2ï¼‰æŸ¥è¯¢ä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â åœ¨æµ‹è¯•ç±»JdbcTemplateCRUDTestä¸­åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªæµ‹è¯•æ–¹æ³•ï¼š

@Test
public void testQueryOne(){
    Account account = jdbcTemplate.queryForObject("select * from account where name=?", new BeanPropertyRowMapper<>(Account.class), "tom");
    System.out.println(account);
}

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â æµ‹è¯•ç»“æœï¼š

Account{name='tom', money=5000.0}

Process finished with exit code 0

3ï¼‰èšåˆæŸ¥è¯¢

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ä½¿ç”¨çš„æ–¹æ³•ä¸ºï¼š

å› ä¸ºè¿”å›çš„æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç®€å•çš„ç±»å‹ï¼Œå°±ä¸éœ€è¦ä½¿ç”¨BeanPropertyRowMapperè¿›è¡Œå°è£…ï¼Œåªéœ€è¦å°†ç»“æœè½¬æ¢ï¼ˆå¼ºè½¬ï¼‰ä¸€ä¸‹å³å¯ã€‚

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â åœ¨æµ‹è¯•ç±»JdbcTemplateCRUDTestä¸­åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªæµ‹è¯•æ–¹æ³•ï¼š

public void testQueryCount(){
    Long count = jdbcTemplate.queryForObject("select count(*) from account", Long.class);
    System.out.println(count);
}

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â æµ‹è¯•ç»“æœï¼š

3

Process finished with exit code 0

5.çŸ¥è¯†è¦ç‚¹

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â quertForObjectçš„å‚æ•°é€‰æ‹©åŒºåˆ«å°±æ˜¯çœ‹è¿”å›çš„æ•°æ®ç±»å‹æ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªè¦å°è£…çš„Javabeanã€‚Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â 

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ç°åœ¨ä¼ä¸šå½“ä¸­ç”¨çš„JdbcTemplateç”¨çš„ä¸æ˜¯ç‰¹åˆ«å¤šï¼Œä½¿ç”¨Mybatisæ›´å¤šã€‚

ä¸ƒ.äº‹åŠ¡æ§åˆ¶

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ç¼–ç¨‹å¼å°±æ˜¯è‡ªå·±ä½¿ç”¨javaçš„APIå»å†™ä»£ç ï¼Œå£°æ˜å¼å°±æ˜¯ç”¨é…ç½®çš„æ–¹å¼ã€‚

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â äº‹åŠ¡åŠäº‹åŠ¡éš”ç¦»çº§åˆ«ï¼šhttps://www.cnblogs.com/xrq730/p/5087378.html

1.ç¼–ç¨‹å¼äº‹åŠ¡æ§åˆ¶

ç›¸å…³å¯¹è±¡ï¼š

1.1.å¹³å°äº‹åŠ¡ç®¡ç†å™¨ï¼ˆæ¥å£ï¼‰

å…³äºå¹³å°äº‹åŠ¡ç®¡ç†å™¨ï¼Œä¸åŒçš„daoå±‚æœ‰ä¸åŒçš„å®ç°å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥åœ¨åé¢ä½¿ç”¨å£°æ˜å¼äº‹åŠ¡æ§åˆ¶æ—¶ï¼Œé€šè¿‡é…ç½®æˆ–æ³¨è§£çš„æ–¹å¼æ—¶å¿…é¡»è¦å…ˆå‘Šè¯‰Springéœ€è¦ç”¨å“ªä¸ªå…·ä½“çš„å¹³å°äº‹åŠ¡ç®¡ç†å™¨ã€‚

1.2.äº‹åŠ¡å®šä¹‰å¯¹è±¡

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰å¹¶å‘äº‹åŠ¡ä¼šäº§ç”Ÿçš„é—®é¢˜ï¼šï¼ˆå°±æ˜¯æœ‰å¤šä¸ªäº‹åŠ¡â€œåŒæ—¶â€æ‰§è¡Œä¼šå‘ç”Ÿçš„é—®é¢˜ï¼‰

â€‹ â‘  è„è¯»ï¼šäº‹åŠ¡Aè¯»åˆ°äº†äº‹åŠ¡Bè¿˜æ²¡æœ‰æäº¤çš„æ•°æ®ã€‚

â€‹ â‘¡ ä¸å¯é‡å¤è¯»ï¼šåœ¨ä¸€ä¸ªäº‹åŠ¡é‡Œé¢è¯»å–äº†ä¸¤æ¬¡æŸä¸ªæ•°æ®ï¼Œè¯»å‡ºæ¥çš„æ•°æ®ä¸ä¸€è‡´ã€‚

â€‹ â‘¢ å¹»è¯»ï¼šåœ¨ä¸€ä¸ªäº‹åŠ¡é‡Œé¢çš„æ“ä½œä¸­å‘ç°äº†æœªè¢«æ“ä½œçš„æ•°æ®ï¼ˆè¿™ä¸ªæ•°æ®æ˜¯å…¶ä»–äº‹åŠ¡äº§ç”Ÿçš„æ•°æ®ï¼‰ï¼Œå°±å¥½åƒå¹»è§‰ä¸€æ ·ï¼

ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰äº‹åŠ¡éš”ç¦»çº§åˆ«ï¼š

â€‹ â‘  read_uncommittedï¼ˆè¯»æœªæäº¤ï¼‰

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  è¯»æœªæäº¤ï¼Œå³èƒ½å¤Ÿè¯»å–åˆ°æ²¡æœ‰è¢«æäº¤çš„æ•°æ®ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å¾ˆæ˜æ˜¾è¿™ä¸ªçº§åˆ«çš„éš”ç¦»æœºåˆ¶æ— æ³•è§£å†³è„è¯»ã€ä¸å¯é‡å¤è¯»ã€å¹»è¯»ä¸­çš„ä»»ä½•ä¸€ç§ï¼Œå› æ­¤å¾ˆå°‘ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚

â€‹ â‘¡ read_committedï¼ˆè¯»å·²æäº¤ï¼‰

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  ä¸€ä¸ªäº‹åŠ¡ç­‰å¦ä¸€ä¸ªäº‹åŠ¡æäº¤ä¹‹åæ‰å¯è¿›è¡Œè¯»å–ï¼Œè§£å†³äº†è„è¯»é—®é¢˜ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯æ— æ³•é™åˆ¶ä¸å¯é‡å¤è¯»å’Œå¹»è¯»ã€‚

â€‹ â‘¢ repeatable_readï¼ˆå¯é‡å¤è¯»ï¼‰

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  é‡å¤è¯»å–ï¼Œå³åœ¨æ•°æ®è¯»å‡ºæ¥ä¹‹ååŠ é”ï¼Œç±»ä¼¼"select * from XXX for update"ï¼Œæ˜ç¡®æ•°æ®è¯»å–å‡ºæ¥å°±æ˜¯ä¸ºäº†æ›´æ–°ç”¨çš„ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥è¦åŠ ä¸€æŠŠé”ï¼Œé˜²æ­¢åˆ«äººä¿®æ”¹å®ƒã€‚REPEATABLE_READçš„æ„æ€ä¹Ÿç±»ä¼¼ï¼Œè¯»å–äº†ä¸€æ¡æ•°æ®ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªäº‹åŠ¡ä¸ç»“æŸï¼Œåˆ«çš„äº‹åŠ¡å°±ä¸å¯ä»¥æ”¹è¿™æ¡è®°å½•ï¼Œè¿™æ ·å°±è§£å†³äº†è„è¯»ã€ä¸å¯é‡å¤è¯»çš„é—®é¢˜ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯å¹»è¯»çš„é—®é¢˜è¿˜æ˜¯æ— æ³•è§£å†³ã€‚

â€‹ â‘£ serializableï¼ˆåºåˆ—åŒ–ï¼‰

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  ä¸²è¡ŒåŒ–ï¼Œæœ€é«˜çš„äº‹åŠ¡éš”ç¦»çº§åˆ«ï¼Œä¸ç®¡å¤šå°‘äº‹åŠ¡ï¼ŒæŒ¨ä¸ªè¿è¡Œå®Œä¸€ä¸ªäº‹åŠ¡çš„æ‰€æœ‰å­äº‹åŠ¡ä¹‹åæ‰å¯ä»¥æ‰§è¡Œå¦å¤–ä¸€ä¸ªäº‹åŠ¡é‡Œé¢çš„æ‰€æœ‰å­äº‹åŠ¡ï¼Œè¿™æ ·å°±è§£å†³äº†è„è¯»ã€ä¸å¯é‡å¤è¯»å’Œå¹»è¯»çš„é—®é¢˜äº†ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯è¿™ç§äº‹åŠ¡éš”ç¦»çº§åˆ«æ•ˆç‡ä½ä¸‹ï¼Œæ¯”è¾ƒè€—æ•°æ®åº“æ€§èƒ½ï¼Œä¸€èˆ¬ä¸ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚

ï¼ˆ3ï¼‰äº‹åŠ¡ä¼ æ’­ï¼š

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â è§£å†³å½“ä¸€ä¸ªä¸šåŠ¡ï¼ˆäº‹åŠ¡ï¼‰æ–¹æ³•è¢«å¦ä¸€ä¸ªä¸šåŠ¡ï¼ˆäº‹åŠ¡ï¼‰æ–¹æ³•è°ƒç”¨æ—¶ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªäº‹åŠ¡åº”è¯¥å¦‚ä½•è¿›è¡Œçš„é—®é¢˜ã€‚

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Springåœ¨TransactionDefinitionæ¥å£ä¸­è§„å®šäº†7ç§ç±»å‹çš„äº‹åŠ¡ä¼ æ’­è¡Œä¸ºã€‚äº‹åŠ¡ä¼ æ’­è¡Œä¸ºæ˜¯Springæ¡†æ¶ç‹¬æœ‰çš„äº‹åŠ¡å¢å¼ºç‰¹æ€§ï¼Œä»–ä¸å±äºçš„äº‹åŠ¡å®é™…æä¾›æ–¹æ•°æ®åº“è¡Œä¸ºã€‚

1.3.äº‹åŠ¡çŠ¶æ€å¯¹è±¡

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â è¿™ä¸ªæ˜¯ä¸ç”¨é…ç½®ç»™springçš„ï¼Œå› ä¸ºäº‹åŠ¡çŠ¶æ€å¯¹è±¡æ˜¯è¢«åŠ¨å°è£…äº‹åŠ¡çŠ¶æ€ä¿¡æ¯çš„ï¼Œå®ƒéšç€ç¨‹åºçš„è¿›è¡Œï¼Œå†…éƒ¨çš„ä¿¡æ¯ä¼šè·Ÿç€ç›¸åº”çš„æ”¹å˜ã€‚è¿™ä¸ªæ˜¯ç»´æŠ¤ä¸åŒæ—¶é—´ç‚¹è¿™ä¸ªäº‹åŠ¡çŠ¶æ€ä¿¡æ¯çš„ã€‚

2.å£°æ˜å¼äº‹åŠ¡æ§åˆ¶

åˆ›å»ºå¦‚ä¸‹é¡¹ç›®ï¼šï¼ˆåŸå§‹çŠ¶æ€ï¼‰

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰å……å½“webå±‚çš„æµ‹è¯•ç±»

public class AccountController {

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        ApplicationContext app = new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext("applicationContext.xml");
        AccountService accountService = app.getBean(AccountService.class);
        accountService.transfer("tom","lucy",500);
    }

}

ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰daoå±‚

public class AccountDaoImpl implements AccountDao {

    private JdbcTemplate jdbcTemplate;
    public void setJdbcTemplate(JdbcTemplate jdbcTemplate) {
        this.jdbcTemplate = jdbcTemplate;
    }
	//è½¬å‡º
    public void out(String outMan, double money) {
        jdbcTemplate.update("update account set money=money-? where name=?",money,outMan);
    }
	//è½¬å…¥
    public void in(String inMan, double money) {
        jdbcTemplate.update("update account set money=money+? where name=?",money,inMan);
    }
}

ï¼ˆ3ï¼‰domainé‡Œé¢æ˜¯æ•°æ®åº“è¡¨accountçš„Javabean

public class Account {

    private String name;
    private double money;

    public String getName() {
        return name;
    }

    public void setName(String name) {
        this.name = name;
    }

    public double getMoney() {
        return money;
    }

    public void setMoney(double money) {
        this.money = money;
    }
}

ï¼ˆ4ï¼‰serviceå±‚

public class AccountServiceImpl implements AccountService {

    private AccountDao accountDao;
    public void setAccountDao(AccountDao accountDao) {
        this.accountDao = accountDao;
    }

    public void transfer(String outMan, String inMan, double money) {
        accountDao.out(outMan,money);
        accountDao.in(inMan,money);
    }
}

ï¼ˆ5ï¼‰é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
       xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
       xmlns:aop="http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop"
       xmlns:tx="http://www.springframework.org/schema/tx"
       xsi:schemaLocation="
       http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans.xsd
       http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop/spring-aop.xsd
       http://www.springframework.org/schema/tx http://www.springframework.org/schema/tx/spring-tx.xsd
">

    <bean id="dataSource" class="com.mchange.v2.c3p0.ComboPooledDataSource">
        <property name="driverClass" value="com.mysql.jdbc.Driver"/>
        <property name="jdbcUrl" value="jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/test"/>
        <property name="user" value="root"/>
        <property name="password" value="123456"/>
    </bean>

    <bean id="jdbcTemplate" class="org.springframework.jdbc.core.JdbcTemplate">
        <property name="dataSource" ref="dataSource"/>
    </bean>

    <bean id="accountDao" class="com.itheima.dao.impl.AccountDaoImpl">
        <property name="jdbcTemplate" ref="jdbcTemplate"/>
    </bean>

    <bean id="accountService" class="com.itheima.service.impl.AccountServiceImpl">
        <property name="accountDao" ref="accountDao"/>
    </bean>


</beans>

ï¼ˆ6ï¼‰pom.xml

<groupId>com.itheima</groupId>
<artifactId>itheima_spring_tx</artifactId>
<version>1.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
<packaging>war</packaging>

  <dependencies>
      <dependency>
          <groupId>org.springframework</groupId>

          <version>1.8.4</version>
      </dependency>

          <artifactId>spring-jdbc</artifactId>
          <version>5.0.5.RELEASE</version>
      </dependency>
      <dependency>
          <groupId>org.springframework</groupId>
          <artifactId>spring-tx</artifactId>
          <version>5.0.5.RELEASE</version>
      </dependency>

          <groupId>org.springframework</groupId>
          <artifactId>spring-test</artifactId>
          <version>5.0.5.RELEASE</version>

          <artifactId>c3p0</artifactId>
          <version>0.9.1.1</version>
      </dependency>

          <artifactId>mysql-connector-java</artifactId>
          <version>5.1.32</version>
      </dependency>
