          <artifactId>junit</artifactId>
          <version>4.12</version>
      </dependency>
  </dependencies>

2.1.åŸºäºxmlçš„å£°æ˜å¼äº‹åŠ¡æ§åˆ¶

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â åœ¨ä¸Šé¢çš„é¡¹ç›®ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶æ˜¯æ²¡æœ‰äº‹åŠ¡æ§åˆ¶çš„ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬æ¥åˆ†æä¸€ä¸‹AccountServiceImplé‡Œé¢çš„transferæ–¹æ³•ï¼šï¼ˆå¹¶åšå¦‚ä¸‹ä¿®æ”¹ï¼‰

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â è¿™é‡Œæœ‰ä¸¤ä¸ªäº‹åŠ¡outå’Œinå…±åŒå®ç°è½¬è´¦è¿™ä¸ªä¸šåŠ¡ï¼Œå‡å¦‚outå’Œinä¸­é—´å‡ºé”™ï¼ˆé™¤é›¶é”™è¯¯ï¼‰ï¼Œè½¬å‡ºé’±outæ‰§è¡Œä½†æ˜¯è½¬å…¥é’±inå¤±è´¥ï¼›å¹¶ä¸èƒ½å®ç°åŒæ—¶æˆåŠŸ/å¤±è´¥ã€‚

public void transfer(String outMan, String inMan, double money) {
    //å¼€å¯äº‹åŠ¡
    accountDao.out(outMan,money);
    int i=1/0;//æ¨¡æ‹Ÿå‡ºé”™
    accountDao.in(inMan,money);
    //æäº¤äº‹åŠ¡
}

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å‡å¦‚ä¸šåŠ¡å±‚æœ‰å¾ˆå¤šæ–¹æ³•éƒ½éœ€è¦è¿›è¡Œäº‹åŠ¡æ§åˆ¶ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå°±è¦å†™å¾ˆå¤štry...catchã€‚é‚£ä¹ˆå°±è¦ä½¿ç”¨springçš„aopæ€æƒ³ï¼ŒæŠŠå¼€å¯äº‹åŠ¡å’Œæäº¤äº‹åŠ¡ï¼ˆäº‹åŠ¡æ§åˆ¶ï¼‰çœ‹æˆæ˜¯é€šçŸ¥ï¼ˆå¢å¼ºï¼‰æå–å‡ºå»ï¼ŒæŠŠä¸Šé¢çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼ˆè½¬è´¦æ–¹æ³•transfer()ï¼‰å½“æˆåˆ‡ç‚¹ï¼Œè¿›è¡Œç»‡å…¥ã€‚

2.2.åŸºäºxmlå£°æ˜å¼äº‹åŠ¡æ§åˆ¶çš„å®ç°

1.å¿«é€Ÿå…¥é—¨

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰åœ¨é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶applicationContext.xmlä¸­å¼•å…¥txå‘½åç©ºé—´å’ŒæŒ‡å®šå¹³å°äº‹åŠ¡ç®¡ç†å™¨transactionManagerçš„å®ç°ç±»DataSourceTransactionManagerçš„Beanæ ‡ç­¾ã€‚

ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰é…ç½®äº‹åŠ¡çš„aopç»‡å…¥

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
       xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
       xmlns:aop="http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop"
       xmlns:tx="http://www.springframework.org/schema/tx"
       xsi:schemaLocation="
       http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans.xsd
       http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop/spring-aop.xsd
       http://www.springframework.org/schema/tx http://www.springframework.org/schema/tx/spring-tx.xsd
">

    <bean id="dataSource" class="com.mchange.v2.c3p0.ComboPooledDataSource">
        <property name="driverClass" value="com.mysql.jdbc.Driver"/>
        <property name="jdbcUrl" value="jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/test"/>
        <property name="user" value="root"/>
        <property name="password" value="123456"/>
    </bean>

    <bean id="jdbcTemplate" class="org.springframework.jdbc.core.JdbcTemplate">
        <property name="dataSource" ref="dataSource"/>
    </bean>

    <bean id="accountDao" class="com.itheima.dao.impl.AccountDaoImpl">
        <property name="jdbcTemplate" ref="jdbcTemplate"/>
    </bean>

    <!--ç›®æ ‡å¯¹è±¡-->
    <bean id="accountService" class="com.itheima.service.impl.AccountServiceImpl">
        <property name="accountDao" ref="accountDao"/>
    </bean>
    <!--é…ç½®å¹³å°äº‹åŠ¡ç®¡ç†å™¨-->
    <bean id="transactionManager" class="org.springframework.jdbc.datasource.DataSourceTransactionManager">
        <!--æ³¨å…¥dataSource,å› ä¸ºè¦ä»ä¸­è·å–connection-->
        <property name="dataSource" ref="dataSource"/>
    </bean>
    <!--é€šçŸ¥ äº‹åŠ¡çš„å¢å¼º-->
    <tx:advice id="txAdvice" transaction-manager="transactionManager">
        <tx:attributes>
            <tx:method name="*"/>
        </tx:attributes>
    </tx:advice>
    <!--é…ç½®äº‹åŠ¡çš„aopç»‡å…¥ï¼Œå°†äº‹åŠ¡å¢å¼ºä¸åˆ‡ç‚¹è¿›è¡Œç»“åˆ-->
    <aop:config>
        <!--springä¸“é—¨ä¸ºäº‹åŠ¡å¢å¼ºæä¾›ä¸€ä¸ªé…ç½®ï¼šadvisor-->
        <!--åˆ‡é¢åŒ…æ‹¬  é€šçŸ¥ï¼ˆå¢å¼ºï¼‰+ åˆ‡ç‚¹ -->
        <aop:advisor advice-ref="txAdvice" pointcut="execution(* com.itheima.service.impl.*.*(..))"/>
    </aop:config>


</beans>

ï¼ˆ3ï¼‰ä½¿ç”¨AccountControllerè¿›è¡Œæµ‹è¯•

public class AccountController {

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        ApplicationContext app = new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext("applicationContext.xml");
        AccountService accountService = app.getBean(AccountService.class);
        accountService.transfer("tom","lucy",500);
    }

}

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â æµ‹è¯•è¦è¾¾åˆ°çš„æ•ˆæœæ˜¯1.æŠ¥é”™ï¼›2.æ•°æ®åº“çš„é’±æ²¡å˜ï¼›

æµ‹è¯•å‰æ•°æ®åº“ä¸ºï¼š

æµ‹è¯•ç»“æœä¸ºï¼š

1.æŠ¥é”™

2.æ•°æ®åº“çš„é’±æ²¡å˜

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ä»¥ä¸Šå°±æ˜¯å¿«é€Ÿå…¥é—¨ï¼Œç°åœ¨å†çœ‹çœ‹é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶çš„é…ç½®ã€‚

2.é…ç½®è§£æ-è®¾ç½®äº‹åŠ¡å±æ€§ä¿¡æ¯ï¼š

<!--tx:äº‹åŠ¡ attributes:å±æ€§-->
<tx:attributes>
    <tx:method name="*"/>
</tx:attributes>

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â è¿™ä¸ªæ ‡ç­¾çš„é…ç½®å°±ç›¸å½“äºäº‹åŠ¡å®šä¹‰å¯¹è±¡çš„åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚è®¾ç½®äº‹åŠ¡çš„éš”ç¦»çº§åˆ«ç­‰ã€‚

<tx:method />æ ‡ç­¾è¿˜å¯ä»¥è¡¥å…¨ï¼Œè¿˜æœ‰å…¶ä»–è®¾ç½®äº‹åŠ¡ä¿¡æ¯çš„å±æ€§ã€‚æ¯”å¦‚ï¼š

<tx:method name="*" isolation="DEFAULT" propagation="REQUIRED" timeout="-1" read-only="false"/>

ä½†æ˜¯è¿™ä¹ˆé…ï¼Œæ„ä¹‰ä¸å¤§ã€‚è¯¦ç»†ä¿¡æ¯è¯·çœ‹ä»¥ä¸‹é…ç½®ï¼š

<!--é€šçŸ¥ äº‹åŠ¡çš„å¢å¼º-->
<tx:advice id="txAdvice" transaction-manager="transactionManager">
    <!--è®¾ç½®æ¯ä¸ªäº‹åŠ¡çš„å±æ€§ä¿¡æ¯çš„-->
    <tx:attributes>
        <!--nameæŒ‡çš„æ˜¯AccountServiceImplï¼ˆç›®æ ‡å¯¹è±¡ï¼‰é‡Œé¢çš„æ–¹æ³•å-->
        <tx:method name="transfer" isolation="REPEATABLE_READ" read-only="false"/>
        <!--åŠ å…¥ç›®æ ‡å¯¹è±¡è¿˜æœ‰ä»¥ä¸‹å‡ ä¸ªï¼ˆç§ï¼‰æ–¹æ³•-->
        <tx:method name="save" isolation="REPEATABLE_READ" read-only="false"/>
        <!--å› ä¸ºæŸ¥è¯¢æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œè®¾ç½®åªè¯»å°±è¡Œ-->
        <tx:method name="findALL" isolation="REPEATABLE_READ" read-only="true"/>
        <!--ä¸‹é¢è¿™ä¸ª*è¡¨ç¤ºé€šé…ç¬¦-->
        <tx:method name="update*" isolation="REPEATABLE_READ" read-only="false"/>
        <!--*è¡¨ç¤ºä»»æ„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå…¶ä»–å±æ€§ä¸é…å°±æ˜¯é»˜è®¤å€¼-->
        <tx:method name="*"/>
    </tx:attributes>
</tx:advice>

3.æ€»ç»“ï¼š

å£°æ˜å¼äº‹åŠ¡æ§åˆ¶çš„é…ç½®è¦ç‚¹ï¼š

  • å¹³å°äº‹åŠ¡ç®¡ç†å™¨é…ç½®
  • äº‹åŠ¡é€šçŸ¥é…ç½®
  • äº‹åŠ¡aopç»‡å…¥çš„é…ç½®

å®Œæ•´çš„applicationContext.xmlï¼š

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
       xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
       xmlns:aop="http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop"
       xmlns:tx="http://www.springframework.org/schema/tx"
       xsi:schemaLocation="
       http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans.xsd
       http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop/spring-aop.xsd
       http://www.springframework.org/schema/tx http://www.springframework.org/schema/tx/spring-tx.xsd
">

    <bean id="dataSource" class="com.mchange.v2.c3p0.ComboPooledDataSource">
        <property name="driverClass" value="com.mysql.jdbc.Driver"/>
        <property name="jdbcUrl" value="jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/test"/>
        <property name="user" value="root"/>
        <property name="password" value="123456"/>
    </bean>

    <bean id="jdbcTemplate" class="org.springframework.jdbc.core.JdbcTemplate">
        <property name="dataSource" ref="dataSource"/>
    </bean>

    <bean id="accountDao" class="com.itheima.dao.impl.AccountDaoImpl">
        <property name="jdbcTemplate" ref="jdbcTemplate"/>
    </bean>

    <!--ç›®æ ‡å¯¹è±¡-->
    <bean id="accountService" class="com.itheima.service.impl.AccountServiceImpl">
        <property name="accountDao" ref="accountDao"/>
    </bean>
    <!--é…ç½®å¹³å°äº‹åŠ¡ç®¡ç†å™¨-->
    <bean id="transactionManager" class="org.springframework.jdbc.datasource.DataSourceTransactionManager">
        <!--æ³¨å…¥dataSource,å› ä¸ºè¦ä»ä¸­è·å–connection-->
        <property name="dataSource" ref="dataSource"/>
    </bean>
    <!--é€šçŸ¥ äº‹åŠ¡çš„å¢å¼º-->
    <tx:advice id="txAdvice" transaction-manager="transactionManager">
        <!--è®¾ç½®æ¯ä¸ªäº‹åŠ¡çš„å±æ€§ä¿¡æ¯çš„-->
        <tx:attributes>
            <!--nameæŒ‡çš„æ˜¯AccountServiceImplï¼ˆç›®æ ‡å¯¹è±¡ï¼‰é‡Œé¢çš„æ–¹æ³•å-->
            <tx:method name="transfer" isolation="REPEATABLE_READ" read-only="false"/>
            <!--åŠ å…¥ç›®æ ‡å¯¹è±¡è¿˜æœ‰ä»¥ä¸‹å‡ ä¸ªï¼ˆç§ï¼‰æ–¹æ³•-->
            <tx:method name="save" isolation="REPEATABLE_READ" read-only="false"/>
            <!--å› ä¸ºæŸ¥è¯¢æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œè®¾ç½®åªè¯»å°±è¡Œ-->
            <tx:method name="findALL" isolation="REPEATABLE_READ" read-only="true"/>
            <!--ä¸‹é¢è¿™ä¸ª*è¡¨ç¤ºé€šé…ç¬¦-->
            <tx:method name="update*" isolation="REPEATABLE_READ" read-only="false"/>
            <!--*è¡¨ç¤ºä»»æ„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå…¶ä»–å±æ€§ä¸é…å°±æ˜¯é»˜è®¤å€¼-->
            <tx:method name="*"/>
        </tx:attributes>
    </tx:advice>
    <!--é…ç½®äº‹åŠ¡çš„aopç»‡å…¥ï¼Œå°†äº‹åŠ¡å¢å¼ºä¸åˆ‡ç‚¹è¿›è¡Œç»“åˆ-->
    <aop:config>
        <!--springä¸“é—¨ä¸ºäº‹åŠ¡å¢å¼ºæä¾›ä¸€ä¸ªé…ç½®ï¼šadvisor-->
        <!--åˆ‡é¢åŒ…æ‹¬  é€šçŸ¥ï¼ˆå¢å¼ºï¼‰+ åˆ‡ç‚¹ -->
        <aop:advisor advice-ref="txAdvice" pointcut="execution(* com.itheima.service.impl.*.*(..))"/>
    </aop:config>


</beans>

ç›®æ ‡å¯¹è±¡AccountServiceImplï¼š

public class AccountServiceImpl implements AccountService {

    private AccountDao accountDao;
    public void setAccountDao(AccountDao accountDao) {
        this.accountDao = accountDao;
    }

    public void transfer(String outMan, String inMan, double money) {
        accountDao.out(outMan,money);
        int i = 1/0;//æ¨¡æ‹Ÿé”™è¯¯
        accountDao.in(inMan,money);
    }
}

2.3.åŸºäºæ³¨è§£çš„å£°æ˜å¼äº‹åŠ¡æ§åˆ¶

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ä¸€èˆ¬æƒ…å†µä¸‹è‡ªå®šä¹‰çš„Beanç”¨æ³¨è§£ï¼Œéè‡ªå®šä¹‰çš„Beanç”¨é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ã€‚

å…ˆå›é¡¾ä¸€ä¸‹é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶applicationContext.xmlçš„å†…å®¹ï¼š

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
       xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
       xmlns:aop="http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop"
       xmlns:tx="http://www.springframework.org/schema/tx"
       xsi:schemaLocation="
       http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans.xsd
       http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop/spring-aop.xsd
       http://www.springframework.org/schema/tx http://www.springframework.org/schema/tx/spring-tx.xsd
">

    <bean id="dataSource" class="com.mchange.v2.c3p0.ComboPooledDataSource">
        <property name="driverClass" value="com.mysql.jdbc.Driver"/>
        <property name="jdbcUrl" value="jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/test"/>
        <property name="user" value="root"/>
        <property name="password" value="123456"/>
    </bean>

    <bean id="jdbcTemplate" class="org.springframework.jdbc.core.JdbcTemplate">
        <property name="dataSource" ref="dataSource"/>
    </bean>

    <bean id="accountDao" class="com.itheima.dao.impl.AccountDaoImpl">
        <property name="jdbcTemplate" ref="jdbcTemplate"/>
    </bean>

    <!--ç›®æ ‡å¯¹è±¡-->
    <bean id="accountService" class="com.itheima.service.impl.AccountServiceImpl">
        <property name="accountDao" ref="accountDao"/>
    </bean>
    <!--é…ç½®å¹³å°äº‹åŠ¡ç®¡ç†å™¨-->
    <bean id="transactionManager" class="org.springframework.jdbc.datasource.DataSourceTransactionManager">
        <!--æ³¨å…¥dataSource,å› ä¸ºè¦ä»ä¸­è·å–connection-->
        <property name="dataSource" ref="dataSource"/>
    </bean>
    <!--é€šçŸ¥ äº‹åŠ¡çš„å¢å¼º-->
    <tx:advice id="txAdvice" transaction-manager="transactionManager">
        <!--è®¾ç½®æ¯ä¸ªäº‹åŠ¡çš„å±æ€§ä¿¡æ¯çš„-->
        <tx:attributes>
            <!--nameæŒ‡çš„æ˜¯AccountServiceImplï¼ˆç›®æ ‡å¯¹è±¡ï¼‰é‡Œé¢çš„æ–¹æ³•å-->
            <tx:method name="transfer" isolation="REPEATABLE_READ" read-only="false"/>
            <!--åŠ å…¥ç›®æ ‡å¯¹è±¡è¿˜æœ‰ä»¥ä¸‹å‡ ä¸ªï¼ˆç§ï¼‰æ–¹æ³•-->
            <tx:method name="save" isolation="REPEATABLE_READ" read-only="false"/>
            <!--å› ä¸ºæŸ¥è¯¢æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œè®¾ç½®åªè¯»å°±è¡Œ-->
            <tx:method name="findALL" isolation="REPEATABLE_READ" read-only="true"/>
            <!--ä¸‹é¢è¿™ä¸ª*è¡¨ç¤ºé€šé…ç¬¦-->
            <tx:method name="update*" isolation="REPEATABLE_READ" read-only="false"/>
            <!--*è¡¨ç¤ºä»»æ„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå…¶ä»–å±æ€§ä¸é…å°±æ˜¯é»˜è®¤å€¼-->
            <tx:method name="*"/>
        </tx:attributes>
    </tx:advice>
    <!--é…ç½®äº‹åŠ¡çš„aopç»‡å…¥ï¼Œå°†äº‹åŠ¡å¢å¼ºä¸åˆ‡ç‚¹è¿›è¡Œç»“åˆ-->
    <aop:config>
        <!--springä¸“é—¨ä¸ºäº‹åŠ¡å¢å¼ºæä¾›ä¸€ä¸ªé…ç½®ï¼šadvisor-->
        <!--åˆ‡é¢åŒ…æ‹¬  é€šçŸ¥ï¼ˆå¢å¼ºï¼‰+ åˆ‡ç‚¹ -->
        <aop:advisor advice-ref="txAdvice" pointcut="execution(* com.itheima.service.impl.*.*(..))"/>
    </aop:config>


</beans>

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰å°†è‡ªå®šä¹‰çš„accountDaoå’Œaccountserviceçš„ã€ä»é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­åˆ æ‰ï¼Œç”¨æ³¨è§£å–ä»£

ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰é…ç½®ç»„ä»¶æ‰«æ,è¦å…ˆå¼•å…¥contextå‘½åç©ºé—´

AccountDaoImplï¼š

@Repository("accountDao")
public class AccountDaoImpl implements AccountDao {
    @Autowired
    private JdbcTemplate jdbcTemplate;
    /* ä½¿ç”¨æ³¨è§£çš„æ–¹å¼æ³¨å…¥ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªsetteræ–¹æ³•å°±å¯ä»¥ä¸è¦äº†
    public void setJdbcTemplate(JdbcTemplate jdbcTemplate) {
        this.jdbcTemplate = jdbcTemplate;
    }*/

    public void out(String outMan, double money) {
        jdbcTemplate.update("update account set money=money-? where name=?",money,outMan);
    }

    public void in(String inMan, double money) {
        jdbcTemplate.update("update account set money=money+? where name=?",money,inMan);
    }
}

AccountServiceImplï¼š

@Service("accountService")
public class AccountServiceImpl implements AccountService {
    @Autowired
    private AccountDao accountDao;
    /*public void setAccountDao(AccountDao accountDao) {
        this.accountDao = accountDao;
    }*/

    public void transfer(String outMan, String inMan, double money) {
        accountDao.out(outMan,money);
        //int i = 1/0;
        accountDao.in(inMan,money);
    }
}
<!--ç»„ä»¶æ‰«æ-->
<context:component-scan base-package="com.itheima"/>

<bean id="dataSource" class="com.mchange.v2.c3p0.ComboPooledDataSource">
    <property name="driverClass" value="com.mysql.jdbc.Driver"/>
    <property name="jdbcUrl" value="jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/test"/>
    <property name="user" value="root"/>
    <property name="password" value="123456"/>
</bean>

<bean id="jdbcTemplate" class="org.springframework.jdbc.core.JdbcTemplate">
    <property name="dataSource" ref="dataSource"/>
</bean>

ï¼ˆ3ï¼‰äº‹åŠ¡æ§åˆ¶çš„å¢å¼ºå’Œç»‡å…¥çš„é…ç½®ç”¨æ³¨è§£**@Transactional**æ›¿æ¢

@Service("accountService")
//ç”šè‡³å¯ä»¥ç»™æ­¤ç±»çš„æ‰€æœ‰æ–¹æ³•åŠ åŒä¸€ä¸ªäº‹åŠ¡æ§åˆ¶çš„å‚æ•°
//@Transactional(isolation = Isolation.READ_COMMITTED)
// å¦‚æœç±»ä¸­çš„æŸä¸ªæ–¹æ³•ä¹Ÿé…ç½®äº†@Transactionalï¼Œå°±ä½¿ç”¨å°±è¿‘åŸåˆ™
public class AccountServiceImpl implements AccountService {
    @Autowired
    private AccountDao accountDao;
    /*public void setAccountDao(AccountDao accountDao) {
        this.accountDao = accountDao;
    }*/

    @Transactional(isolation = Isolation.READ_COMMITTED,propagation = Propagation.REQUIRED)
    //é…ç½®äº‹åŠ¡çš„å¢å¼º
    public void transfer(String outMan, String inMan, double money) {
        accountDao.out(outMan,money);
        int i = 1/0;
        accountDao.in(inMan,money);
    }
    //å†å†™ä¸€ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•
    //@Transactional(isolation = Isolation.DEFAULT)
    public void xxx(){
    }
}

ï¼ˆ4ï¼‰é…ç½®äº‹åŠ¡çš„æ³¨è§£é©±åŠ¨ï¼ˆå¦‚æœä¸é…ç½®ï¼Œäº‹åŠ¡å°†ä¸èµ·ä½œç”¨ï¼‰

<!--äº‹åŠ¡çš„æ³¨è§£é©±åŠ¨-->
<tx:annotation-driven transaction-manager="transactionManager"/>

ï¼ˆ5ï¼‰ä½¿ç”¨AccountControllerè¿›è¡Œæµ‹è¯•

è¿è¡Œç»“æœï¼š

æ•°æ®åº“çš„å†…å®¹ä¹Ÿæ²¡å˜ã€‚

æœ€åé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶applicationContext.xmlå†…å®¹ä¸ºï¼š

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
       xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
       xmlns:aop="http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop"
       xmlns:context="http://www.springframework.org/schema/context"
       xmlns:tx="http://www.springframework.org/schema/tx"
       xsi:schemaLocation="
       http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans.xsd
       http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop/spring-aop.xsd
       http://www.springframework.org/schema/tx http://www.springframework.org/schema/tx/spring-tx.xsd
       http://www.springframework.org/schema/context http://www.springframework.org/schema/tx/spring-context.xsd
">

    <!--ç»„ä»¶æ‰«æ-->
    <context:component-scan base-package="com.itheima"/>

    <bean id="dataSource" class="com.mchange.v2.c3p0.ComboPooledDataSource">
        <property name="driverClass" value="com.mysql.jdbc.Driver"/>
        <property name="jdbcUrl" value="jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/test"/>
        <property name="user" value="root"/>
        <property name="password" value="123456"/>
    </bean>

    <bean id="jdbcTemplate" class="org.springframework.jdbc.core.JdbcTemplate">
        <property name="dataSource" ref="dataSource"/>
    </bean>

    <!--é…ç½®å¹³å°äº‹åŠ¡ç®¡ç†å™¨-->
    <bean id="transactionManager" class="org.springframework.jdbc.datasource.DataSourceTransactionManager">
        <!--æ³¨å…¥dataSource,å› ä¸ºè¦ä»ä¸­è·å–connection-->
        <property name="dataSource" ref="dataSource"/>
    </bean>


    <!--äº‹åŠ¡çš„æ³¨è§£é©±åŠ¨-->
    <tx:annotation-driven transaction-manager="transactionManager"/>
<!--    ç›¸å½“äº<tx:advice id="txAdvice" transaction-manager="transactionManager">-->


</beans>

æ€»ç»“ï¼š

å…«.Springé›†æˆwebç¯å¢ƒ

1.åŸºæœ¬ä¸‰å±‚æ¡†æ¶ç¯å¢ƒæ­å»º

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰å¯¼å…¥servletå’Œjspåæ ‡

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â pom.xml

<dependency>
  <groupId>javax.servlet</groupId>
  <artifactId>javax.servlet-api</artifactId>
  <version>3.0.1</version>
  <scope>provided</scope>
</dependency>
<dependency>
  <groupId>javax.servlet.jsp</groupId>
  <artifactId>javax.servlet.jsp-api</artifactId>
  <version>2.2.1</version>
  <scope>provided</scope>
</dependency>

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ä»¥å‰ä¸ç”¨å¯¼åŒ…æ˜¯å› ä¸ºTomcaté‡Œé¢æœ‰ï¼Œç°åœ¨æ²¡æœ‰é›†æˆTomcatæ‰€ä»¥è¦å¯¼åæ ‡ã€‚(PS:provideä»…ä»…éœ€è¦åœ¨ç¼–è¯‘å’Œæµ‹è¯•é˜¶æ®µï¼ŒåŒæ ·provideå°†ä¸ä¼šè¢«æ‰“åŒ…åˆ°libç›®å½•ä¸‹ã€‚)

ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰æ·»åŠ webå±‚å¹¶é…ç½®Servletåœ°å€

web.UserServlet:

public class UserServlet extends HttpServlet {

    @Override
    protected void doGet(HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse resp) throws ServletException, IOException {
        ApplicationContext app = new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext("applicationContext.xml");
        UserService userService = app.getBean(UserService.class);
        userService.save();
    }
}

web.xml

<servlet>
  <servlet-name>UserServlet</servlet-name>
  <servlet-class>com.itheima.web.UserServlet</servlet-class>
</servlet>
<servlet-mapping>
  <servlet-name>UserServlet</servlet-name>
  <url-pattern>/userServlet</url-pattern>
</servlet-mapping>

ï¼ˆ3ï¼‰å‘å¸ƒåˆ°Tomcatï¼š

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å¦‚æœæŒ‰ç…§è§†é¢‘ç›´æ¥æ·»åŠ ç°æœ‰é¡¹ç›®çš„war Explorerè¿è¡ŒæŠ¥é”™war exploded: Error during artifact deploymentï¼›å°±æ‰“å¼€project structureæŠŠArtifactsé‡Œé¢çš„å½“å‰é¡¹ç›®çš„war Exploreråˆ æ‰å†å›æ¥Tomcaté…ç½®é‚£é‡Œæ·»åŠ Artifactï¼Œé€‰æ‹©é¡¹ç›®çš„war Explorerã€‚

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å›¾æ–‡æ“ä½œè¿æ¥å¯å‚è€ƒï¼šhttps://blog.csdn.net/Petershusheng/article/details/52382216?utm_source=copy

è¡¥å……ï¼š

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å…¶å®ä¸Šé¢çš„æ–¹æ³•å¹¶ä¸ä¸€å®šæœ‰ç”¨ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚æˆ‘ä¹‹åè¿˜æ˜¯æŠ¥é”™ï¼Œåªæ˜¯ç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡æˆåŠŸè¿è¡Œã€‚å…³é”®è¿˜å¾—å­¦ä¼šæŠ¥é”™çœ‹æ—¥å¿—å•Šï¼

é”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯ï¼š

org.springframework.web.context.ContextLoader.initWebApplicationContext Context initialization failed
 org.springframework.beans.factory.BeanInitializationException: Could not load properties; nested exception is java.io.FileNotFoundException: Could not open ServletContext resource [/jdbc.properties]

å¯ä»¥çœ‹åˆ°æ˜¯åŠ è½½é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶jdbc.propertieså‡ºé”™äº†

web.xml:

<!--åŠ è½½å¤–éƒ¨çš„propertiesæ–‡ä»¶-->
<context:property-placeholder location="classpath:jdbc.properties"/>

å°†ä¸Šé¢çš„è·¯å¾„åŠ ä¸Šclassplath:

<!--åŠ è½½å¤–éƒ¨çš„propertiesæ–‡ä»¶-->
<context:property-placeholder location="classpath:jdbc.properties"/>

è¿™æ ·å°±å¯ä»¥äº†ï¼

ï¼ˆ4ï¼‰é¡¹ç›®çš„åŸºæœ¬ç»“æ„å†…å®¹å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

daoå±‚ï¼š

public class UserDaoImpl implements UserDao {
    @Override
    public void save() {
        System.out.println("save running......");
    }
}

serviceå±‚ï¼š

public class UserServiceImpl implements UserService {

    private UserDao userDao;
    public void setUserDao(UserDao userDao) {
        this.userDao = userDao;
    }

    @Override
    public void save() {
        userDao.save();
    }
}

webå±‚ï¼š

public class UserServlet extends HttpServlet {

    @Override
    protected void doGet(HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse resp) throws ServletException, IOException {
        ApplicationContext app = new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext("applicationContext.xml");
        UserService userService = app.getBean(UserService.class);
        userService.save();
    }
}

applicationContext.xml:

<!--åŠ è½½å¤–éƒ¨çš„propertiesæ–‡ä»¶-->
<context:property-placeholder location="jdbc.properties"/>

<bean id="dataSource" class="com.mchange.v2.c3p0.ComboPooledDataSource">
    <property name="driverClass" value="${jdbc.driver}"/>
    <property name="jdbcUrl" value="${jdbc.url}"/>
    <property name="user" value="${jdbc.username}"/>
    <property name="password" value="${jdbc.password}"/>
</bean>

<!--é…ç½®Dao-->
<bean id="userDao" class="com.itheima.dao.impl.UserDaoImpl"/>

<!--é…ç½®service-->
<bean id="userService" class="com.itheima.service.impl.UserServiceImpl">
    <property name="userDao" ref="userDao"/>
</bean>

jdbc.properties:

jdbc.driver=com.mysql.jdbc.Driver
jdbc.url=jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/test
jdbc.username=root
jdbc.password=123456

2.è·å–ApplicationContextå¯¹è±¡

é—®é¢˜å¼•å…¥ï¼š

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â åœ¨ä¹‹å‰ï¼ŒåŒ…æ‹¬ä¸Šé¢åˆ›å»ºçš„webå±‚é‡Œé¢çš„UserServletï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬è¦è·å–Springå®¹å™¨é‡Œé¢çš„å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚UserServiceImplã€‚æˆ‘ä»¬éƒ½éœ€è¦å…ˆè·å–ApplicationContextå¯¹è±¡ï¼š

ApplicationContext app = new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext("applicationContext.xml");
UserService userService = app.getBean(UserService.class);

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â æˆ‘ä»¬ä»¥åå¯æ˜¯è¦å¤šæ¬¡å»æ‹¿å®¹å™¨é‡Œé¢çš„å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œå°±è¦å¤šæ¬¡ç¼–å†™è¿™ä¸¤è¡Œä»£ç äº†ï¼Œé‚£å°±æ„å‘³ç€æ¯æ¬¡éƒ½è¦åŠ è½½ä¸€æ¬¡é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œæ¯æ¬¡éƒ½å»åˆ›å»ºå®¹å™¨ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå°±ä¼šåˆ›å»ºå¾ˆå¤šæ¬¡ï¼Œè¿™æ²¡æœ‰æ„ä¹‰ï¼è¿˜å½±å“æ€§èƒ½ã€‚

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å› ä¸ºæ‰€æœ‰çš„å®¹å™¨éƒ½æ˜¯ä½¿ç”¨ç›¸åŒçš„é‚£ä¸ªé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆåŠ è½½ä¸€æ¬¡é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œåˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªå®¹å™¨ä¾›å¤§å®¶ä½¿ç”¨å°±è¡Œäº†ï¼

è§£å†³æ–¹æ³•ï¼š

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â 1.å°†åº”ç”¨ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡ï¼ˆApplicationContextï¼‰å®šä¹‰ä¸ºé™æ€å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯åªèƒ½è§£å†³æœ¬ç±»å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œæ¯ä¸ªç±»éƒ½è¦åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªï¼Œè¿˜æ˜¯ä¸å¤Ÿå®Œç¾ã€‚

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â 2.ä½¿ç”¨ç›‘å¬å™¨ï¼ŒæœåŠ¡å™¨ä¸€å¯åŠ¨å°±åˆ›å»ºåº”ç”¨ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡å¯¹è±¡ï¼ˆServletContextå¯¹è±¡ï¼‰ï¼Œå…¶ç›‘å¬å™¨ServletContextListenerå°±ä¼šæ‰§è¡Œã€‚é‚£ä¹ˆå°±å¯ä»¥å°†ä¸Šé¢é‚£ä¸¤è¡Œåˆ›å»ºApplicationContextå¯¹è±¡ä»£ç æ”¾åˆ°ç›‘å¬å™¨åˆå§‹åŒ–æ–¹æ³•å½“ä¸­ï¼Œå†å°†å®ƒæ”¾åˆ°ContextåŸŸä¸­ã€‚

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â 3.ä¾èµ–æ³¨å…¥ï¼ˆæ³¨è§£æ–¹å¼ï¼‰ã€‚å°†è¦ä½¿ç”¨çš„å¯¹è±¡å®šä¹‰ä¸ºå±æ€§ï¼Œå…¶å®ä¹ŸæŒºä¸é”™çš„ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯æ¯ä¸ªç±»éƒ½è¦å†™ä¸€ä¸ªå±æ€§ï¼Œä¹Ÿè¿˜ä¸å¤Ÿå®Œç¾ã€‚

ä¸‹é¢æ˜¯æ¨¡æ‹Ÿspringç”ŸæˆApplicationContextå¯¹è±¡

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰åˆ›å»ºlisten.ContextLoaderListener:

public class ContextLoaderListener implements ServletContextListener {
    //åˆå§‹åŒ–æ–¹æ³•
    @Override
    public void contextInitialized(ServletContextEvent servletContextEvent) {
        ApplicationContext app = new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext("applicationContext.xml");
        //å°†Springçš„åº”ç”¨ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡å¯¹è±¡å­˜å‚¨åˆ°ServletContextåŸŸä¸­
        ServletContext servletContext = servletContextEvent.getServletContext();
        servletContext.setAttribute("app", app);
    }

    //é”€æ¯æ–¹æ³•
    @Override
    public void contextDestroyed(ServletContextEvent servletContextEvent) {

    }
}

ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰åœ¨web.xmlé…ç½®ç›‘å¬å™¨

<!--é…ç½®ç›‘å¬å™¨-->
<listener>
  <listener-class>com.itheima.listener.ContextLoaderListener</listener-class>
</listener>

ï¼ˆ3ï¼‰ä¿®æ”¹webå±‚UserServletè·å–å®¹å™¨å¯¹è±¡ä»£ç ï¼š

public class UserServlet extends HttpServlet {

    @Override
    protected void doGet(HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse resp) throws ServletException, IOException {
        //ApplicationContext app = new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext("applicationContext.xml");
        ServletContext servletContext = getServletContext();
        ApplicationContext app = (ApplicationContext) servletContext.getAttribute("app");//è¿”å›å€¼æ˜¯Object
        //ä½†æ˜¯è‡ªå·±çŸ¥é“æ˜¯ApplicationContextï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥è¿›è¡Œå¼ºè½¬
        UserService userService = app.getBean(UserService.class);
        userService.save();
    }
}

3.è·å–ApplicationContextå¯¹è±¡ä»£ç ä¼˜åŒ–

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰è§£è€¦

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â åœ¨ContextLoaderListenerå½“ä¸­é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶å†™æ­»äº†ï¼š

ApplicationContext app = new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext("applicationContext.xml");

1).å¯ä»¥åœ¨web.xmlé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­è®¾ç½®è¦åŠ è½½çš„Springé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶åå­—ã€‚

<!--å…¨å±€åˆå§‹åŒ–å‚æ•°-->
<context-param>
  <param-name>contextConfigLocation</param-name>
  <param-value>applicationContext.xml</param-value>
</context-param>

2).ä¿®æ”¹ç›‘å¬å™¨ä»£ç 

public class ContextLoaderListener implements ServletContextListener {
    //åˆå§‹åŒ–æ–¹æ³•
    @Override
    public void contextInitialized(ServletContextEvent servletContextEvent) {
        ServletContext servletContext = servletContextEvent.getServletContext();
        //è¯»å–web.xmlä¸­çš„å…¨å±€å‚æ•°
        String contextConfigLocation = servletContext.getInitParameter("contextConfigLocation");
        ApplicationContext app = new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext(contextConfigLocation);

        //å°†Springçš„åº”ç”¨ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡å¯¹è±¡å­˜å‚¨åˆ°ServletContextåŸŸä¸­
        servletContext.setAttribute("app", app);
        System.out.println("Springå®¹å™¨åˆ›å»ºå®Œæ¯•...");
    }

    //é”€æ¯æ–¹æ³•
    @Override
    public void contextDestroyed(ServletContextEvent servletContextEvent) {
    }
}

ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰æå–å·¥å…·ç±»

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â è·å–springåº”ç”¨ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡å¯¹è±¡æ—¶ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬é€šè¿‡å‚æ•°appæ¥è·å–,æ¯”å¦‚web.UserServleté‡Œçš„ï¼š

ApplicationContext app = (ApplicationContext) servletContext.getAttribute("app");

è¿™æ ·ä¸æ˜¯å¾ˆç›´è§‚ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥åœ¨è®¾è®¡ä»£ç æ—¶ï¼Œè®¾ç½®ä¸€ä¸ªå·¥å…·ç±»é‡Œé¢åŒ…æ‹¬ï¼Œè·å–åº”ç”¨ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡å¯¹è±¡çš„æ–¹æ³•ã€‚

1).åˆ›å»ºå·¥å…·ç±»WebApplicationContextUtils:

public class WebApplicationContextUtils {
    public static ApplicationContext getApplicationContext(ServletContext servletContext){
        return (ApplicationContext) servletContext.getAttribute("app");
    }
}

2).ä¿®æ”¹è·å–springåº”ç”¨ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡å¯¹è±¡ä»£ç ï¼š

public class UserServlet extends HttpServlet {

    @Override
    protected void doGet(HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse resp) throws ServletException, IOException {
        //ApplicationContext app = new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext("applicationContext.xml");
        ServletContext servletContext = getServletContext();
        //ApplicationContext app = (ApplicationContext) servletContext.getAttribute("app");//è¿”å›å€¼æ˜¯Object
        ApplicationContext app = WebApplicationContextUtils.getApplicationContext(servletContext);
        UserService userService = app.getBean(UserService.class);
        userService.save();
    }
}

4.Springæä¾›è·å–åº”ç”¨ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡çš„å·¥å…·

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰åœ¨pom.xmlå¯¼å¦‚spring-webåæ ‡

<dependency>
  <groupId>org.springframework</groupId>
  <artifactId>spring-web</artifactId>
  <version>5.2.5.RELEASE</version>
</dependency>

ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰ä¿®æ”¹web.xml

é…ç½®ç›‘å¬å™¨ï¼ŒContextLoaderListeneræ˜¯springæä¾›çš„ã€‚

<!--é…ç½®ç›‘å¬å™¨-->
<listener>
  <listener-class>org.springframework.web.context.ContextLoaderListener</listener-class>
</listener>

ä¿®æ”¹é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ä½ç½®ï¼Œä¸Šé¢è‡ªå·±å†™çš„åˆå§‹åŒ–å‚æ•°åªæ˜¯æ¼”ç¤ºç”¨é€”ï¼Œæ­£ç¡®çš„å†™æ³•æ˜¯ï¼š

<!--å…¨å±€åˆå§‹åŒ–å‚æ•°-->
<context-param>
  <param-name>contextConfigLocation</param-name>
  <param-value>classpath:applicationContext.xml</param-value>
</context-param>

ï¼ˆ3ï¼‰è·å–springåº”ç”¨ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡å¯¹è±¡ä»£ç ï¼š

    @Override
    protected void doGet(HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse resp) throws ServletException, IOException {
        //ApplicationContext app = new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext("applicationContext.xml");
        ServletContext servletContext = getServletContext();
        //ApplicationContext app = (ApplicationContext) servletContext.getAttribute("app");//è¿”å›å€¼æ˜¯Object
//        ApplicationContext app = WebApplicationContextUtils.getApplicationContext(servletContext);
        ApplicationContext app = WebApplicationContextUtils.getWebApplicationContext(servletContext);
        //è¿”å›å€¼æ˜¯WebApplicationContext æ˜¯ ApplicationContext çš„å­ç±»ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç”¨çˆ¶ç±»ç›´æ¥æ¥æ”¶
        UserService userService = app.getBean(UserService.class);
        userService.save();
    }

ä¹.SpringMVC

1.JavaEEä¸‰å±‚æ¡†æ¶å’ŒMVCæ¨¡å‹çš„å…³ç³»

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰JavaEEä¸‰å±‚æ¡†æ¶

ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰MVCæ¨¡å‹

ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰ä¸¤è€…å…³ç³»

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â JavaEEä¸åªæ˜¯åŒ…å«webè¿˜æœ‰æ¡Œé¢çš„ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œåªè®¨è®ºwebï¼ˆJavawebï¼‰æ–¹é¢ï¼ˆJavaWebåˆæ˜¯JavaEEçš„å­é›†ï¼‰ã€‚MVCæ¨¡å‹åœ¨JavaEEé‡Œæ˜¯å±äºwebå±‚çš„ï¼Œæ˜¯å­é›†ã€‚

2.SpringMVCæ¦‚è¿°å’Œå¼€å‘æ­¥éª¤

3.SpringMVCåˆä½“éªŒ

â‘  å¯¼å…¥SpringMVCç›¸å…³åæ ‡

pom.xml:

<dependency>
  <groupId>org.springframework</groupId>
  <artifactId>spring-webmvc</artifactId>
  <version>5.2.5.RELEASE</version>
</dependency>

â‘¡ é…ç½®SpringMVCæ ¸å¿ƒæ§åˆ¶å™¨DispatcherServlet

web.xml:

<!--é…ç½®SpringMVCçš„å‰ç«¯æ§åˆ¶å™¨-->
<servlet>
  <servlet-name>DispatcherServlet</servlet-name>
  <servlet-class>org.springframework.web.servlet.DispatcherServlet</servlet-class>
  <load-on-startup>1</load-on-startup>
</servlet>
<servlet-mapping>
  <servlet-name>DispatcherServlet</servlet-name>
  <url-pattern>/</url-pattern>
</servlet-mapping>

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â load-on-startupå…ƒç´ æ ‡è®°å®¹å™¨æ˜¯å¦åœ¨å¯åŠ¨çš„æ—¶å€™å°±åŠ è½½è¿™ä¸ªservlet(å®ä¾‹åŒ–å¹¶è°ƒç”¨å…¶init()æ–¹æ³•)

â‘¢ ç¼–å†™è§†å›¾é¡µé¢å’Œåˆ›å»ºwebå±‚çš„Controllerç±»ï¼ˆåŒ…ï¼‰

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰controller.UserController:

package com.itheima.controller;

public class UserController {

    public String save(){
        System.out.println("Controller save running...");
        return "";
    }
}

ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰jspé¡µé¢ï¼š

<%@ page contentType="text/html;charset=UTF-8" language="java" %>
<html>
<head>
    <title>Title</title>
</head>
<body>
<h1>Success</h1>
</body>
</html>

â‘£ é…ç½®æ³¨è§£å’ŒControllerç±»ä¸­ä¸šåŠ¡æ–¹æ³•çš„æ˜ å°„åœ°å€

controller.UserController:

@Controller
public class UserController {

    @RequestMapping("/quick")
    public String save(){
        System.out.println("Controller save running...");
        return "success.jsp";//è¿”å›çš„å°±æ˜¯ä½ è¦è·³è½¬çš„è§†å›¾
    }
}

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â è¿˜éœ€è¦é…ç½®ç»„ä»¶æ‰«æï¼Œè™½ç„¶å¯ä»¥é…ç½®åœ¨applicationContext.xmlé‡Œé¢ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯SpringMVCç›¸å…³é…ç½®è¿˜æ˜¯ä¸“é—¨é…ç½®åˆ°spring-mvc.xmlé‡Œé¢ã€‚

â‘¤ é…ç½®SpringMVCæ ¸å¿ƒæ–‡ä»¶spring-mvc.xmlæ–‡ä»¶

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰ é…ç½®ç»„ä»¶æ‰«æè¿˜è¦å¼•å…¥Contextå‘½åç©ºé—´ï¼Œæœ€åè¯¥æ–‡ä»¶çš„å†…å®¹ä¸ºï¼š

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
       xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
       xmlns:context="http://www.springframework.org/schema/context"
       xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans.xsd
       http://www.springframework.org/schema/context  http://www.springframework.org/schema/context/spring-context.xsd
">

    <!--Controllerçš„ç»„ä»¶æ‰«æ-->
    <context:component-scan base-package="com.itheima.controller"/>

</beans>

ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰spring-mvc.xmlæ–‡ä»¶è¦é…ç½®æ‰èƒ½è¢«åŠ è½½

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å› ä¸ºSpringMVCçš„é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶æ˜¯ç»™æ ¸å¿ƒæ§åˆ¶å™¨ç”¨çš„ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥åœ¨web.xmlä¸­é…ç½®æ ¸å¿ƒæ§åˆ¶å™¨DispatcherServletæ—¶å¢åŠ åˆå§‹åŒ–å‚æ•°ï¼š

<!--é…ç½®SpringMVCçš„å‰ç«¯æ§åˆ¶å™¨-->
<servlet>
  <servlet-name>DispatcherServlet</servlet-name>
  <servlet-class>org.springframework.web.servlet.DispatcherServlet</servlet-class>
  <init-param>
    <param-name>contextConfigLocation</param-name>
    <param-value>classpath:spring-mvc.xml</param-value>
  </init-param>
  <load-on-startup>1</load-on-startup>
</servlet>
<servlet-mapping>
  <servlet-name>DispatcherServlet</servlet-name>
  <url-pattern>/</url-pattern>
</servlet-mapping>

â‘¥ æµ‹è¯•

å¯åŠ¨åé¡µé¢ï¼š

è®¿é—®â€œ/quickâ€:

4.SpringMVCæ‰§è¡Œæµç¨‹

5.SpringMVCç»„ä»¶è§£æ

5.1.æ³¨è§£è§£æ@RequestMapping

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â è¯¥æ³¨è§£è¿˜æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªproduceså±æ€§å¯ä»¥è®¾ç½®è¿”å›æ•°æ®çš„ç±»å‹ä»¥åŠç¼–ç ï¼Œè§£å†³å“åº”ä¸­æ–‡ä¹±ç ã€‚

UserController:

@Controller
public class UserController {

    @RequestMapping(value = "/quick",method = RequestMethod.GET,params = {"username"})
    public String save(){
        System.out.println("Controller save running...");
        return "success.jsp";//è¿”å›çš„å°±æ˜¯ä½ è¦è·³è½¬çš„è§†å›¾
    }
}

5.2.xml(Spring-mvc.xml)é…ç½®è§£æï¼ˆèµ„æºè§£æå™¨ï¼‰

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â åé¢è¿˜ä¼šè®²å…¶ä»–ç›¸å…³é…ç½®ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œåªä¸¾ä¾‹é…ç½®å†…éƒ¨èµ„æºè§†å›¾è§£æå™¨ï¼Œäº†è§£å³å¯ï¼š

<!--é…ç½®å†…éƒ¨èµ„æºè§†å›¾è§£æå™¨-->
<bean id="viewResolver" class="org.springframework.web.servlet.view.InternalResourceViewResolver">
    <!--é…ç½®åœ°å€å‰ç¼€-->
    <property name="prefix" value="/jsp/"></property>
    <!--é…ç½®åœ°å€çš„åç¼€-->
    <property name="suffix" value=".jsp"></property>
</bean>

5.3.çŸ¥è¯†è¦ç‚¹

6.è¯·æ±‚-@RequestMapping()ä¸å“åº”

6.1.å“åº”ï¼šé¡µé¢è·³è½¬-é»˜è®¤

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰è¿”å›å­—ç¬¦ä¸²å½¢å¼

1.å›é¡¾é¡¹ç›®çš„spring-mvc.xmlã€UserControllerç±»ã€web.xmlï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”success.jspå·²ç»ç§»åŠ¨åˆ°webappä¸‹çš„jspç›®å½•

spring-mvc.xml

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
       xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
       xmlns:context="http://www.springframework.org/schema/context"
       xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans.xsd
       http://www.springframework.org/schema/context  http://www.springframework.org/schema/context/spring-context.xsd
">

    <!--Controllerçš„ç»„ä»¶æ‰«æ-->
    <context:component-scan base-package="com.itheima.controller"/>

    <!--é…ç½®å†…éƒ¨èµ„æºè§†å›¾è§£æå™¨-->
    <bean id="viewResolver" class="org.springframework.web.servlet.view.InternalResourceViewResolver">
        <!--é…ç½®åœ°å€å‰ç¼€-->
        <property name="prefix" value="/jsp/"></property>
        <!--é…ç½®åœ°å€çš„åç¼€-->
        <property name="suffix" value=".jsp"></property>
    </bean>

</beans>

UserControllerï¼š

package com.itheima.controller;

import org.springframework.stereotype.Controller;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestMapping;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestMethod;

@Controller
@RequestMapping("/user")
public class UserController {

    //è¯·æ±‚åœ°å€å˜ä¸º http://ip:import/å·¥ç¨‹å/user/quick
    @RequestMapping(value = "/quick",method = RequestMethod.GET,params = {"username"})
    public String save(){
        System.out.println("Controller save running...");
        return "success";//è¿”å›çš„å°±æ˜¯ä½ è¦è·³è½¬çš„è§†å›¾,ä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨åŠ ä¸Šå‰åç¼€
    }
}

web.xml:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<web-app xmlns="http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee"
         xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
         xsi:schemaLocation="http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee/web-app_4_0.xsd"
         version="4.0">

  <!--é…ç½®SpringMVCçš„å‰ç«¯æ§åˆ¶å™¨-->
  <servlet>
    <servlet-name>DispatcherServlet</servlet-name>
    <servlet-class>org.springframework.web.servlet.DispatcherServlet</servlet-class>
    <init-param>
      <param-name>contextConfigLocation</param-name>
      <param-value>classpath:spring-mvc.xml</param-value>
    </init-param>
    <load-on-startup>1</load-on-startup>
  </servlet>
  <servlet-mapping>
    <servlet-name>DispatcherServlet</servlet-name>
    <url-pattern>/</url-pattern>
  </servlet-mapping>

  <!--å…¨å±€åˆå§‹åŒ–å‚æ•°-->
  <context-param>
    <param-name>contextConfigLocation</param-name>
    <param-value>classpath:applicationContext.xml</param-value>
  </context-param>
  
  <!--é…ç½®ç›‘å¬å™¨-->
  <listener>
    <listener-class>org.springframework.web.context.ContextLoaderListener</listener-class>
  </listener>

  <servlet>
    <servlet-name>UserServlet</servlet-name>
    <servlet-class>com.itheima.web.UserServlet</servlet-class>
  </servlet>
  <servlet-mapping>
    <servlet-name>UserServlet</servlet-name>
    <url-pattern>/userServlet</url-pattern>
  </servlet-mapping>
</web-app>

2.è®¿é—®åœ°å€â€œhttp://localhost:8080/itheima_spring_mvc_war_exploded/user/quick/?username=123123231â€å°±èƒ½çœ‹åˆ°/jsp/success.jspæ–‡ä»¶

ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰è¿”å›ModelAndViewå¯¹è±¡å½¢å¼

â‘  1.åœ¨UserControllerç±»ä¸­å¢åŠ æ–¹æ³•ï¼š

@RequestMapping(value = "/quick2")
public ModelAndView save2(){
    /*
        Model:æ¨¡å‹ ä½œç”¨æ˜¯å°è£…æ•°æ®
        View:è§†å›¾ ä½œç”¨å±•ç¤ºæ•°æ®çš„
    */
    ModelAndView modelAndView =new ModelAndView();
    //è®¾ç½®è§†å›¾åç§°
    modelAndView.setViewName("success");
    return modelAndView;
}

2.è®¿é—®â€œhttp://localhost:8080/itheima_spring_mvc_war_exploded/user/quick2â€å°±èƒ½çœ‹åˆ°success.jspé¡µé¢

â‘¡ ä¸Šé¢è®¾ç½®å®Œè§†å›¾ï¼Œmodelæ˜¯ç©ºçš„ã€‚ä¸‹è¾¹ç»™modelè®¾ç½®ç‚¹æ•°æ®ï¼Œå…¶å®å°±æ˜¯åœ¨åŸŸä¸­ä¿å­˜æ•°æ®ã€‚

1.ä¿®æ”¹UserControllerçš„saveæ–¹æ³•

@RequestMapping(value = "/quick2")
public ModelAndView save2(){
    /*
        Model:æ¨¡å‹ ä½œç”¨æ˜¯å°è£…æ•°æ®
        View:è§†å›¾ ä½œç”¨å±•ç¤ºæ•°æ®çš„
    */
    ModelAndView modelAndView =new ModelAndView();
    //è®¾ç½®æ¨¡å‹æ•°æ®(æ”¾åˆ°RequeståŸŸä¸­)
    modelAndView.addObject("username", "itcast");
    //è®¾ç½®è§†å›¾åç§°
    modelAndView.setViewName("success");
    return modelAndView;
}

2.ä¿®æ”¹success.jspï¼Œåœ¨é¡µé¢ä¸­å±•ç¤ºæ•°æ®

<%@ page contentType="text/html;charset=UTF-8" language="java" %>
<html>
<head>
    <title>Title</title>
</head>
<body>
<h1>Successï¼${requestScope.username}</h1>
</body>
</html>

3.è®¿é—®â€œhttp://localhost:8080/itheima_spring_mvc_war_exploded/user/quick2â€

â‘¢ ModelAndViewå¯ä»¥ä¸è‡ªå·±new

1.åœ¨UserControllerä¸­å¢åŠ æ–¹æ³•

@RequestMapping(value = "/quick3")
public ModelAndView save3(ModelAndView modelAndView){
    modelAndView.addObject("username", "itheima");
    modelAndView.setViewName("success");
    return modelAndView;
}

2.è®¿é—®â€œhttp://localhost:8080/itheima_spring_mvc_war_exploded/user/quick3â€

â‘£ å°†modelå’ŒViewæ‹†å¼€

1.åœ¨UserControllerä¸­å¢åŠ æ–¹æ³•

@RequestMapping(value = "/quick4")
public String save4(Model model/*å°è£…æ•°æ®çš„model*/) {
    model.addAttribute("username", "åå­—");
    return "success";//è¿™ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸²å°±æ˜¯è§†å›¾
}

2.è®¿é—®â€œhttp://localhost:8080/itheima_spring_mvc_war_exploded/user/quick4â€

â‘¤ ç”¨åŸå§‹(JavaWeb)çš„æ–¹å¼å­˜æ•°æ®

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ä½†æ˜¯è¿™é‡Œå†™çš„Controlleråªæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ™®é€šçš„ç±»ï¼Œå’Œwebä¸­çš„Servletç±»æ²¡æœ‰ä¸€ç‚¹å…³ç³»ã€‚ä¸Šé¢æ‰€æœ‰saveæ–¹æ³•éƒ½æ˜¯SpringMVCæ¡†æ¶å¸®ä½ è°ƒç”¨çš„ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥åŠ ä¸ªå½¢å‚HttpServletRequestå°±è¡Œã€‚

1.åœ¨UserControllerä¸­å¢åŠ æ–¹æ³•

@RequestMapping(value = "/quick5")
public String save5(HttpServletRequest Request) {
    Request.setAttribute("username", "çœ‹å®Œå°±åƒé¥­");
    return "success";//è¿™ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸²å°±æ˜¯è§†å›¾

2.è®¿é—®â€œhttp://localhost:8080/itheima_spring_mvc_war_exploded/user/quick5â€

6.2.å“åº”ï¼šå›å†™æ•°æ®-@ResponseBody

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰ç›´æ¥è¿”å›å­—ç¬¦ä¸²

â‘  ä½¿ç”¨åŸå§‹å“åº”æµ

1.åœ¨UserControllerä¸­å¢åŠ æ–¹æ³•

@RequestMapping(value = "/quick6")
public void save6(HttpServletResponse response) throws IOException {
    response.setContentType("text/html;charset=UTF-8");
    response.getWriter().print("hello itcast!ä½ å¥½");
}

2.è®¿é—®â€œhttp://localhost:8080/itheima_spring_mvc_war_exploded/user/quick6â€

â‘¡ æ›´ç®€å•çš„æ–¹å¼å›å†™â€”â€”ç›´æ¥è¿”å›å­—ç¬¦ä¸²

1.åœ¨UserControllerä¸­å¢åŠ æ–¹æ³•å¹¶ä¸”è¦å¢åŠ æ³¨è§£

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â åŸæ¥çš„åªä½¿ç”¨@RequestMappingæ³¨è§£çš„æ–¹æ³•ç›´æ¥è¿”å›å­—ç¬¦ä¸²è¡¨ç¤ºè¿”å›çš„æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªè§†å›¾ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥è¦æƒ³ç›´æ¥è¿”å›å­—ç¬¦ä¸²å¿…é¡»ä½¿ç”¨æ–°çš„æ³¨è§£æ¥åŒºåˆ†ï¼ˆæ ‡è®°ï¼‰ï¼ä½¿ç”¨çš„æ–°æ³¨è§£æ˜¯ResponseBodyï¼ˆå“åº”ä½“ï¼‰ã€‚

@RequestMapping(value = "/quick7",produces = {"text/html;charset=UTF-8"})//producesè§£å†³ä¸­æ–‡ä¹±ç 
@ResponseBody   //å‘ŠçŸ¥SpringMVCæ¡†æ¶ ä¸è¿›è¡Œè¯•å›¾è·³è½¬ ç›´æ¥è¿›è¡Œæ•°æ®å›å†™
public String save7() {
    return "hello itcast!ä½ å¥½";//è¿™æ˜¯å“åº”ä½“è€Œä¸æ˜¯è¯•å›¾

2.è®¿é—®â€œhttp://localhost:8080/itheima_spring_mvc_war_exploded/user/quick7â€

ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰è¿”å›å¯¹è±¡æˆ–é›†åˆ

â‘  è¿”å›JSONæ ¼å¼çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²

1.åœ¨UserControllerä¸­å¢åŠ æ–¹æ³•

@RequestMapping(value = "/quick8")
@ResponseBody
public String save8() {
    //JSONæœ¬è´¨ä¸Šå°±æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥è¿™æ ·è¿”å›
    return "{\"username\":\"zhangsan\",\"age\":18}";
}

2.è®¿é—®â€œhttp://localhost:8080/itheima_spring_mvc_war_exploded/user/quick8â€

â‘¡ ä½¿ç”¨ç¬¬ä¸‰æ–¹è½¬æ¢å·¥å…·è½¬æ¢JSON

1.åˆ›å»ºdomian.Userç±»

package com.itheima.domain;

public class User {
    private String username;
    private int age;

    public User() {
    }

    public User(String username, int age) {
        this.username = username;
        this.age = age;
    }

    public String getUsername() {
        return username;
    }

    public void setUsername(String username) {
        this.username = username;
    }

    public int getAge() {
        return age;
    }

    public void setAge(int age) {
        this.age = age;
    }

    @Override
    public String toString() {
        return "User{" +
                "username='" + username + '\'' +
                ", age=" + age +
                '}';
    }
}

2.åœ¨pom.xmlå¯¼åŒ…

<dependency>
  <groupId>com.fasterxml.jackson.core</groupId>
  <artifactId>jackson-core</artifactId>
  <version>2.9.0</version>
</dependency>
<dependency>
  <groupId>com.fasterxml.jackson.core</groupId>
  <artifactId>jackson-databind</artifactId>
  <version>2.9.0</version>
</dependency>
<dependency>
  <groupId>com.fasterxml.jackson.core</groupId>
  <artifactId>jackson-annotations</artifactId>
  <version>2.9.0</version>
</dependency>

3.åœ¨UserControllerä¸­å¢åŠ æ–¹æ³•

@RequestMapping(value = "/quick9")
@ResponseBody
public String save9() throws JsonProcessingException {
    User user = new User();
    user.setUsername("lisi");
    user.setAge(30);
    //ä½¿ç”¨jsonçš„è½¬æ¢å·¥å…·å°†å¯¹è±¡è½¬æ¢jsonæ ¼å¼å­—ç¬¦ä¸²å†è¿”å›
    ObjectMapper objectMapper = new ObjectMapper();
    String json = objectMapper.writeValueAsString(user);
    return json;
}

4.è®¿é—®â€œhttp://localhost:8080/itheima_spring_mvc_war_exploded/user/quick9â€

â‘¢ ä¸ç”¨è‡ªå·±ä½¿ç”¨è½¬æ¢ä»£ç å°†å¯¹è±¡è½¬æ¢ä¸ºJSONå­—ç¬¦ä¸²

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â æˆ‘ä»¬è¦æƒ³ç›´æ¥è¿”å›Userå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œè®©è½¬æ¢jaonçš„è¿‡ç¨‹äº¤ç»™æ¡†æ¶ï¼Œå°±å¾—é…ç½®ã€‚é¦–å…ˆçœ‹æºç ï¼š

æœ‰RequestMappingHandlerAdapterï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥è¦æƒ³ç›´æ¥è¿”å›è‡ªå®šä¹‰çš„Userå¯¹è±¡ç„¶åæ¡†æ¶è‡ªåŠ¨å°†å…¶è½¬æ¢æˆjsonæ ¼å¼å­—ç¬¦ä¸²åˆ°RequeståŸŸä¸­ï¼Œå¿…é¡»é…ç½®è¯¥ç±»ã€‚ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆæ˜¯å®ƒï¼Ÿè¦æƒ³ä¿®æ”¹å¤„ç†å™¨å¿…é¡»é å¤„ç†å™¨é€‚é…å™¨ï¼Œç„¶åè¿”å›çš„æ•°æ®æ˜¯åˆ°RequeståŸŸä¸­çš„ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥çœ‹åå­—å°±æ˜¯å®ƒäº†ã€‚

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â è¯¥ç±»æœ‰ä¸ªsetMessageConvertersæ–¹æ³•(ç¿»è¯‘è¿‡æ¥å°±æ˜¯è®¾ç½®æ¶ˆæ¯è½¬æ¢å™¨):

public void setMessageConverters(List<HttpMessageConverter<?>> messageConverters) {
    this.messageConverters = messageConverters;
}

å°±å¯ä»¥åœ¨è¿™é‡Œè®¾ç½®jsonæ ¼å¼è½¬æ¢çš„è½¬æ¢å™¨ã€‚

1.é…ç½®å¤„ç†å™¨é€‚é…å™¨ï¼Œå¹¶è¿›è¡Œå‚æ•°è®¾ç½®ä½¿ç”¨jacksonè¿›è¡Œè½¬æ¢ï¼ˆè¯´ç™½äº†å°±æ˜¯è¦ç»™æ¡†æ¶é…ä¸€ä¸ªè½¬æ¢å™¨ï¼‰

spring-mvc.xml

<!--é…ç½®å¤„ç†å™¨é€‚é…å™¨-->
<bean class="org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation.RequestMappingHandlerAdapter">
    <property name="messageConverters">
        <list>
            <!--çœ‹æºç çŸ¥é“listè¦çš„æ˜¯HttpMessageConverterè½¬æ¢å™¨å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ç›´æ¥é…ä¸€ä¸ªbeanå¯¹è±¡-->
            <bean class="org.springframework.http.converter.json.MappingJackson2HttpMessageConverter"/>
        </list>
    </property>
</bean>

2.åœ¨UserControllerä¸­å¢åŠ æ–¹æ³•

@RequestMapping(value = "/quick10")
@ResponseBody
//æœŸæœ›SpringMVCè‡ªåŠ¨å°†Userè½¬æ¢æˆjsonæ ¼å¼çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥è¦é…ç½®

    User user = new User();

    user.setAge(32);
    //è¿™é‡Œæ²¡æœ‰è¿›è¡Œè½¬æ¢ï¼Œç›´æ¥è¿”å›Userå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œè®©æ¡†æ¶å¸®æˆ‘ä»¬è½¬æ¢æˆjson
    return user;

3.è®¿é—®â€œhttp://localhost:8080/itheima_spring_mvc_war_exploded/user/quick10â€

â‘£ ç®€åŒ–é…ç½®

1.å¼•å…¥mvcå‘½åç©ºé—´é…ç½®mvcæ³¨è§£é©±åŠ¨

       http://www.springframework.org/schema/context  http://www.springframework.org/schema/context/spring-context.xsd
       http://www.springframework.org/schema/mvc  http://www.springframework.org/schema/mvc/spring-mvc.xsd

    <!--Controllerçš„ç»„ä»¶æ‰«æ-->

çŸ¥è¯†è¦ç‚¹

7.è·å¾—è¯·æ±‚å‚æ•°

2.è®¿é—®â€œhttp://localhost:8080/itheima_spring_mvc_war_exploded/user/quick13?strs=aaa&strs=bbb&strs=cccâ€

[aaa, bbb, ccc]
ï¼ˆ4ï¼‰è·å¾—é›†åˆç±»å‹å‚æ•°-VOç±»

â‘  å°†é›†åˆå°è£…åˆ°ä¸€ä¸ªpojoä¸­å†è·å–

@RequestMapping(value = "/quick14")
@ResponseBody

}

ä½†æ˜¯è¿™æ ·ä¸è¡Œçš„ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬è¦æŠŠListå°è£…åˆ°ä¸€ä¸ªpojoå¯¹è±¡å½“ä¸­ç„¶åæ‰èƒ½æ³¨å…¥ã€‚è¿™ä¸ªç±»å°±å« VOï¼ˆValueObjectï¼‰ç±»ã€‚

1.åˆ›å»ºdomain.VOç±»(é‡Œé¢æœ‰æˆ‘ä»¬è¦å°è£…çš„é›†åˆ)

package com.itheima.domain;

import java.util.List;

public class VO {
    private List<User> userList;

    public List<User> getUserList() {
        return userList;
    }

    public void setUserList(List<User> userList) {
        this.userList = userList;
    }

    @Override
    public String toString() {
        return "VO{" +
                "userList=" + userList +
                '}';
    }
}

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â é‡Œé¢æœ‰ä¸ªå±æ€§ï¼Œåå«userListã€‚

2.ä¸ºäº†æµ‹è¯•ï¼Œå»ºä¸€ä¸ªform.jspé¡µé¢

<%@ page contentType="text/html;charset=UTF-8" language="java" %>
<html>
<head>
    <title>Title</title>
</head>
<body>
    <form action="${pageContext.request.contextPath}/user/quick14" method="post">
        <%--è¡¨æ˜æ˜¯ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªUserå¯¹è±¡çš„username age--%>
        <input type="text" name="userList[0].username"/><br/>
        <input type="text" name="userList[0].age"/><br/>
        <input type="text" name="userList[1].username"/><br/>
        <input type="text" name="userList[1].age"/><br/>
        <input type="submit" value="æäº¤">
    </form>
</body>
</html>

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â æ³¨æ„è¡¨å•é¡¹çš„nameå±æ€§åçš„å‘½åæ ¼å¼ã€‚

4.è®¿é—®jspé¡µé¢å¹¶è¿›è¡Œæµ‹è¯•

æäº¤å‰ï¼š

æäº¤åï¼Œæ§åˆ¶å°è¾“å‡ºï¼š

VO{userList=[User{username='zhangsan', age=18}, User{username='lisi', age=22}]}

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ä¸€èˆ¬éƒ½æ˜¯è¿™æ ·ä½¿ç”¨çš„ï¼Œè™½ç„¶æœ‰ç‚¹éº»çƒ¦ã€‚é‡åˆ°æŸäº›ç‰¹æ®Šæƒ…å†µå°±å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ç®€å•çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå³å½¢å‚ç›´æ¥å†™é›†åˆã€‚

â‘¡ ç‰¹æ®Šæƒ…å†µï¼ˆajaxï¼‰

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â @requestBodyæ³¨è§£å¸¸ç”¨æ¥å¤„ç†content-typeä¸æ˜¯é»˜è®¤çš„application/x-www-form-urlcodedç¼–ç çš„å†…å®¹ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚è¯´ï¼šapplication/jsonæˆ–è€…æ˜¯application/xmlç­‰ã€‚ä¸€èˆ¬æƒ…å†µä¸‹æ¥è¯´å¸¸ç”¨å…¶æ¥å¤„ç†application/jsonç±»å‹ã€‚æˆ–è€…å‚è€ƒhttps://blog.csdn.net/xhf852963/article/details/94353491

1.åˆ›å»ºjsç›®å½•å¹¶å°†jqueryæ–‡ä»¶å¤åˆ¶è¿›å»

2.åˆ›å»ºajax.jspå¹¶åœ¨å…¶å†…å¼•å…¥jquery

<%@ page contentType="text/html;charset=UTF-8" language="java" %>
<html>
<head>
    <title>Title</title>
    <script src="${pageContext.request.contextPath}/js/jquery-1.7.2.js"></script>
    <script>
        var userList = new Array();
        userList.push({username:"zhangsan",age:"18"});
        userList.push({username:"lisi",age:"28"});

        $.ajax({
            type:"POST",
            url:"${pageContext.request.contextPath}/user/quick15",
            data:JSON.stringify(userList),
            contentType:"application/json;charset=utf-8"
        });

    </script>
</head>
<body>

</body>
</html>

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â è¡¥å……ï¼šJSON.stringify() æ–¹æ³•ç”¨äºå°† JavaScript å€¼è½¬æ¢ä¸º JSON å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ã€‚

3.è®¿é—®â€œhttp://localhost:8080/itheima_spring_mvc_war_exploded/ajax.jspâ€

æŠ¥é”™ï¼š

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â è¿™æ˜¯åé¢è¦è®²çš„é™æ€èµ„æºè®¿é—®æƒé™é—®é¢˜ï¼ˆéœ€è¦è®¿é—®webappçš„é™æ€èµ„æºï¼‰ï¼Œåé¢å†å…·ä½“è®²è§£ã€‚ç°åœ¨å…ˆè§£å†³é—®é¢˜

4.åœ¨spring-mvc.xmlé‡Œé¢å¢åŠ å¦‚ä¸‹é…ç½®

<mvc:resources mapping="/js/**" location="/js/"/>

5.è®¿é—®â€œhttp://localhost:8080/itheima_spring_mvc_war_exploded/ajax.jspâ€

æ§åˆ¶å°è¾“å‡ºï¼š

[User{username='zhangsan', age=18}, User{username='lisi', age=28}]

7.1.é™æ€èµ„æºè®¿é—®æƒé™å¼€å¯

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â é¦–å…ˆæˆ‘ä»¬çŸ¥é“æˆ‘ä»¬ç°åœ¨æ˜¯åœ¨ä½¿ç”¨SpringMVCï¼Œå®ƒæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªæ ¸å¿ƒæ§åˆ¶å™¨DispatcherServletï¼š

<!--é…ç½®SpringMVCçš„å‰ç«¯æ§åˆ¶å™¨-->
<servlet>
  <servlet-name>DispatcherServlet</servlet-name>
  <servlet-class>org.springframework.web.servlet.DispatcherServlet</servlet-class>
  <init-param>
    <param-name>contextConfigLocation</param-name>
    <param-value>classpath:spring-mvc.xml</param-value>
  </init-param>
  <load-on-startup>1</load-on-startup>
</servlet>
<servlet-mapping>
  <servlet-name>DispatcherServlet</servlet-name>
  <url-pattern>/</url-pattern>
</servlet-mapping>

å®ƒå¸®åŠ©æˆ‘ä»¬å®ç°è™šæ‹Ÿè·¯å¾„åŒ¹é…ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚æ³¨è§£@RequestMapping(value = "/quick15")ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æˆ‘ä»¬åœ¨Controllerä¸­ç»™æ–¹æ³•é…ç½®ä¸€ä¸ªæ³¨è§£å°±èƒ½æŠŠåœ°å€æ˜ å°„åˆ°è¯¥æ–¹æ³•ä¸Šã€‚

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â åŒæ ·ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬åœ¨è®¿é—®ajax.jspæ˜¯éœ€è¦è¯·æ±‚jqueryæ–‡ä»¶çš„ï¼Œå°±å›å»æ‰¾@RequestMappingï¼Œæ˜¾ç„¶æˆ‘ä»¬æ²¡æœ‰é…ç½®ï¼Œæ˜¯æ‰¾ä¸åˆ°çš„ï¼

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â â‘  æ‰€ä»¥è¦åœ¨SpringMVCæ¡†æ¶å½“ä¸­å¼€æ”¾å¯¹å“ªäº›èµ„æºçš„è®¿é—®æƒé™ã€‚ä¸€èˆ¬æ˜¯é™æ€èµ„æºã€‚å³è¿™äº›èµ„æºä¸éœ€è¦SpringMVCæ¡†æ¶å¸®æˆ‘ä»¬å»æ‰¾ã€‚

spring-mvc.xml:(æ³¨æ„è¦å¼•å…¥mvcå‘½åç©ºé—´)

<!--å¼€æ”¾èµ„æºçš„è®¿é—®æƒé™-->

mappingè¡¨ç¤ºæ˜ å°„åœ°å€ï¼ˆè®¿é—®åœ°å€ï¼‰ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œè¡¨ç¤º/jsç›®å½•ä¸‹é¢çš„æ‰€æœ‰èµ„æºï¼›locationè¡¨ç¤ºæ˜¯å“ªäº›èµ„æºå¼€æ”¾çš„ï¼ˆå…·ä½“èµ„æºæ‰€åœ¨çš„ç›®å½•ï¼‰ã€‚

â‘¡ è®©åŸå§‹å®¹å™¨ï¼ˆTomcatï¼‰æ‰¾

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â è¡¨ç¤ºSpringMVCåœ¨è®¿é—®èµ„æºæ—¶æ‰¾ä¸åˆ°@RequestMappingï¼Œå°±äº¤ç”±åŸå§‹å®¹å™¨ï¼Œè€Œè¿™é‡Œçš„åŸå§‹å®¹å™¨å°±æ˜¯Tomcatï¼Œå³äº¤ç»™Tomcatï¼Œè®©å®ƒå†…éƒ¨çš„æœºåˆ¶å»æ‰¾èµ„æºã€‚

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â æ§åˆ¶å°èƒ½æ­£ç¡®æ‰“å°å¼ ä¸‰ã€‚

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å…¶å®å°±æ˜¯URLè¯·æ±‚åœ°å€å¯ä»¥ä¸å†™æŒ‡å®šçš„å‚æ•°åäº†ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥åœ¨åœ°å€åé¢åŠ â€œ/â€+è¯·æ±‚å‚æ•°çš„å€¼ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶è¦ä½¿ç”¨æ³¨è§£@PathVariableã€‚å°±ä¸ç”¨å‘ä»¥å‰ä¸€æ ·åœ¨åœ°å€åé¢+â€œ?â€+é”®å€¼å¯¹çš„å½¢å¼äº†ã€‚

2.æµ‹è¯•ï¼š

  • è®¿é—®â€œhttp://localhost:8080/itheima_spring_mvc_war_exploded/user/quick18?date=2021/2/21â€
Sun Feb 21 00:00:00 CST 2021
  • è®¿é—®â€œhttp://localhost:8080/itheima_spring_mvc_war_exploded/user/quick18?date=2021-2-21â€

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â æ—¥æœŸæ ¼å¼æœ‰ä¸åŒçš„å†™æ³•ä¹ æƒ¯ï¼Œç¬¬ä¸€ç§æœåŠ¡å™¨å¯ä»¥è½¬æ¢ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯ç¬¬äºŒç§å°±æ— æ³•è½¬æ¢ï¼Œæ ¼å¼ä¸åŒ¹é…ã€‚å¦‚æœè¦ç”¨ç¬¬äºŒç§çš„æ ¼å¼å°±è¦ç”¨åˆ°è‡ªå®šä¹‰ç±»å‹è½¬æ¢å™¨ã€‚

1.åˆ›å»ºconerter.DateConverterï¼Œå¹¶å®ç°converteræ¥å£

package com.itheima.converter;

import org.springframework.core.convert.converter.Converter;

import java.text.ParseException;
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
import java.util.Date;
public class DateConverter implements Converter<String, Date> {
    @Override
    public Date convert(String dateStr) {
        //æ—¥æœŸçš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²è½¬æ¢æˆæ—¥æœŸå¯¹è±¡å¹¶è¿”å›
        SimpleDateFormat format = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd");
        Date date = null;
        try {
            date = format.parse(dateStr);
        } catch (ParseException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
        return date;
    }
}

2.åœ¨é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ï¼ˆspring-mvc.xmlï¼‰ä¸­å£°æ˜è½¬æ¢å™¨ï¼Œå¹¶åœ¨mvcæ³¨è§£é©±åŠ¨æ ‡ç­¾å¢åŠ å±æ€§

<!--mvcçš„æ³¨è§£é©±åŠ¨-->
<mvc:annotation-driven conversion-service="conversionService"/>
<!--å£°æ˜è½¬æ¢å™¨-->
<bean id="conversionService" class="org.springframework.context.support.ConversionServiceFactoryBean">
    <property name="converters">
        <list>
            <bean class="com.itheima.converter.DateConverter"></bean>
        </list>
    </property>
</bean>

3.è®¿é—®â€œhttp://localhost:8080/itheima_spring_mvc_war_exploded/user/quick18?date=2021-2-21â€

Sun Feb 21 00:00:00 CST 2021

8.æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ 

æ­¥éª¤å’Œä»¥å‰javawebé˜¶æ®µä¸€æ ·ï¼š

â‘ ã€è¦æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ª form æ ‡ç­¾ï¼Œmethod=post è¯·æ±‚

â‘¡ã€form æ ‡ç­¾çš„ encType å±æ€§å€¼å¿…é¡»ä¸º multipart/form-data å€¼

â‘¢ã€åœ¨ form æ ‡ç­¾ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨ input type=file æ·»åŠ ä¸Šä¼ çš„æ–‡ä»¶

â‘£ã€ç¼–å†™æœåŠ¡å™¨ä»£ç ï¼ˆServlet ç¨‹åºï¼‰æ¥æ”¶ï¼Œå¤„ç†ä¸Šä¼ çš„æ•°æ®ã€‚

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â encType=multipart/form-data è¡¨ç¤ºæäº¤çš„æ•°æ®ï¼Œä»¥å¤šæ®µï¼ˆæ¯ä¸€ä¸ªè¡¨å•é¡¹ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°æ®æ®µï¼‰çš„å½¢å¼è¿›è¡Œæ‹¼

æ¥ï¼Œç„¶åä»¥äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æµçš„å½¢å¼å‘é€ç»™æœåŠ¡å™¨

åœ¨æœåŠ¡ç«¯ä»¥å‰webé˜¶æ®µéœ€è¦å¯¼å…¥ç¬¬ä¸‰æ–¹jaråŒ…ï¼š

ç¬¬ä¸€æ­¥ï¼Œå°±æ˜¯éœ€è¦å¯¼å…¥ä¸¤ä¸ª jar åŒ…ï¼š

@RequestMapping(value = "/quick22")
@ResponseBody

    System.out.println(username);
    System.out.println(upload);//çœ‹çœ‹æ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯nullï¼Œä¸ç©ºè¡¨ç¤ºä¸Šä¼ æˆåŠŸ
}

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â æ³¨æ„å‚æ•°MultipartFileçš„å˜é‡åè¦å’Œæ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ è¡¨å•é¡¹çš„nameå±æ€§å€¼ä¸€è‡´ã€‚

5.è®¿é—®â€œhttp://localhost:8080/itheima_spring_mvc_war_exploded/upload.jspâ€

æäº¤åæ§åˆ¶å°è¾“å‡ºï¼š

admin
org.springframework.web.multipart.commons.CommonsMultipartFile@52bc146

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ç”±æ‰“å°ç»“æœå¯çŸ¥ï¼šæ–‡ä»¶æ˜¯å¯ä»¥ä¸Šä¼ åˆ°æœåŠ¡å™¨ç«¯äº†ï¼Œä¸‹é¢å°±è¦è¿›è¡Œä¿å­˜äº†ã€‚

  • ä¿®æ”¹4.ä¸­çš„ä»£ç ï¼š
@RequestMapping(value = "/quick22")
@ResponseBody
public void save22(String username, MultipartFile upload) throws IOException {
    System.out.println(username);
    //è·å¾—ä¸Šä¼ æ–‡ä»¶çš„åç§°
    String originalFilename = upload.getOriginalFilename();
    //å­˜æ–‡ä»¶
    upload.transferTo(new File("D:\\output\\" + originalFilename));
}
  • è®¿é—®åŸæ¥çš„é¡µé¢ï¼Œå†æ¬¡æäº¤ã€‚

ä¸Šä¼ å‰ï¼š

ä¸Šä¼ åï¼š

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â åŒæ—¶æ§åˆ¶å°è¾“å‡ºï¼šadminï¼›æ‰“å¼€æ–‡ä»¶å¯ä»¥å‘ç°å†…å®¹æ˜¯ä¸€è‡´çš„ã€‚

ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰å¤šæ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ 

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å¤šæ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ å³æœ‰å¤šä¸ªè¡¨å•é¡¹è¦ä¸Šä¼ æ–‡ä»¶ã€‚

æ–¹æ³•ä¸€ï¼š

1.ä¿®æ”¹upload.jsp

<%@ page contentType="text/html;charset=UTF-8" language="java" %>
<html>
<head>
    <title>Title</title>
</head>
<body>
        <form action="${pageContext.request.contextPath}/user/quick22" method="post" enctype="multipart/form-data">
            åç§°ï¼š<input type="text" name="username" /> <br/>
            æ–‡ä»¶ï¼š<input type="file" name="upload" />  <br/>
            æ–‡ä»¶ï¼š<input type="file" name="upload2" />  <br/>
            <input type="submit" value="ä¸Šä¼ ">
        </form>
</body>
</html>

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å¯ä»¥æ ¹æ®å•æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ æ–¹æ³•çš„å†™æ³•ï¼Œç›´æ¥åœ¨æ–¹æ³•ä¸ŠåŠ ä¸ªå½¢å‚MultipartFileï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”åç§°å°±å«â€œupload2â€ã€‚

2.ä¿®æ”¹ä¸Šä¼ æ–¹æ³•save22

@RequestMapping(value = "/quick22")
@ResponseBody
public void save22(String username, MultipartFile upload,MultipartFile upload2) throws IOException {
    System.out.println(username);
    //è·å¾—ä¸Šä¼ æ–‡ä»¶çš„åç§°
    String originalFilename = upload.getOriginalFilename();
    upload.transferTo(new File("D:\\output\\" + originalFilename));
    String originalFilename2 = upload2.getOriginalFilename();
    upload2.transferTo(new File("D:\\output\\" + originalFilename2));
}

æ–¹æ³•äºŒï¼š

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å…¶å®æ–¹æ³•éƒ½ä¸€æ ·ï¼Œå°±æ˜¯è¿™é‡Œæ–¹æ³•çš„å½¢å‚æ˜¯ç”¨æ•°ç»„æ¥æ¥ï¼Œè€Œä¸æ˜¯ä½¿ç”¨å¤šä¸ªä¸åŒåç§°çš„MultipartFileå‚æ•°ã€‚ä½†æ˜¯é¡µé¢é‡Œçš„è¡¨å•é¡¹çš„nameå±æ€§éƒ½è¦åŒåã€‚

1.ä¿®æ”¹upload.jsp

<%@ page contentType="text/html;charset=UTF-8" language="java" %>
<html>
<head>
    <title>Title</title>
</head>
<body>
    <form action="${pageContext.request.contextPath}/user/quick23" method="post" enctype="multipart/form-data">
        åç§°ï¼š<input type="text" name="username" /> <br/>
        æ–‡ä»¶ï¼š<input type="file" name="uploadFile" />  <br/>
        æ–‡ä»¶ï¼š<input type="file" name="uploadFile" />  <br/>
        <input type="submit" value="ä¸Šä¼ ">
    </form>
        <form action="${pageContext.request.contextPath}/user/quick22" method="post" enctype="multipart/form-data">
            åç§°ï¼š<input type="text" name="username" /> <br/>
            æ–‡ä»¶ï¼š<input type="file" name="upload" />  <br/>
            æ–‡ä»¶ï¼š<input type="file" name="upload2" />  <br/>
            <input type="submit" value="ä¸Šä¼ ">
        </form>
</body>
</html>

2.åœ¨UserControllerä¸­å¢åŠ æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ æ–¹æ³•

@RequestMapping(value = "/quick23")
@ResponseBody
public void save23(String username, MultipartFile[] uploadFile) throws IOException {
    System.out.println(username);
    for (MultipartFile multipartFile : uploadFile) {
        String originalFilename = multipartFile.getOriginalFilename();
        multipartFile.transferTo(new File("D:\\output\\" + originalFilename));
    }
}

è¿è¡Œæ— è¯¯ã€‚

9.SpringMVCæ‹¦æˆªå™¨

9.1.æ‹¦æˆªå™¨å’Œè¿‡æ»¤å™¨çš„åŒºåˆ«

æ³¨æ„ï¼šæ‹¦æˆªå™¨é…ç½®åœ¨SpringMVCçš„é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶spring-mvc.xmlä¸­ï¼Œå¦‚ï¼šï¼ˆå¦‚ä¸‹é…ç½®è®¿é—®webapp/index.htmlä¹Ÿä¼šæ‹¦æˆªï¼Œå› ä¸ºæ‹¦æˆªå™¨åªå¯¹actionè¯·æ±‚èµ·ä½œç”¨ï¼Œè€Œè¿‡æ»¤å™¨åˆ™å¯¹æ‰€æœ‰è¯·æ±‚èµ·ä½œç”¨ï¼ˆåŒ…æ‹¬jspé¡µé¢è¯·æ±‚jQueryæ–‡ä»¶ä¹Ÿè¿‡æ»¤ï¼Œè€Œæ‹¦æˆªå™¨åˆ™æ— æ³•æ‹¦æˆªè¿™ç±»è®¿é—®é™æ€èµ„æºçš„è¯·æ±‚ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯æ³¨æ„é€šè¿‡é€šè¿‡urlè®¿é—®é™æ€èµ„æºçš„è¯·æ±‚è¿˜æ˜¯ä¼šæ‹¦æˆªçš„ï¼‰ï¼‰

æ‹¦æˆªå™¨ä¸æ‹¦æˆªjspé¡µé¢ï¼Œä¸”æ¯”è¿‡æ»¤å™¨ä½¿ç”¨æ›´çµæ´»ï¼Œè¿‡æ»¤å™¨åªèƒ½åœ¨è¯·æ±‚å‰ä½œç”¨ã€‚

<!--é…ç½®æ‹¦æˆªå™¨-->
<mvc:interceptors>
    <mvc:interceptor>
        <!--å¯¹å“ªäº›èµ„æºæ‰§è¡Œæ‹¦æˆªæ“ä½œ-->
        <mvc:mapping path="/*"/>
        <bean class="com.hugo.interceptor.MyInterceptor2"/>
    </mvc:interceptor>
    <mvc:interceptor>
        <!--å¯¹å“ªäº›èµ„æºæ‰§è¡Œæ‹¦æˆªæ“ä½œ-->
        <mvc:mapping path="/*"/>
        <bean class="com.hugo.interceptor.MyInterceptor"/>
    </mvc:interceptor>
</mvc:interceptors>

è¿‡æ»¤å™¨é…ç½®åœ¨web.xmlä¸­ï¼Œå¦‚ä»¥å‰javawebï¼š

å¹¶ä¸”å¦‚æœæ˜¯springï¼Œspring-mvc.xmlè¿˜æ˜¯è¦å¼€å¯é™æ€èµ„æºæƒé™ï¼ˆæœ‰ä¸¤ç§æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œè¯¦æƒ…è¯·çœ‹7.2ï¼‰ï¼š

<!--é™æ€èµ„æºæƒé™å¼€æ”¾-->
<mvc:default-servlet-handler/>

9.2.å¿«é€Ÿå…¥é—¨

åˆ›å»ºå¦‚ä¸‹é¡¹ç›®ï¼š

spring-mvc.xml:(çœ‹åˆ°è¿™é‡Œå‰é¢çš„åˆå¿˜äº†1.ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆè¦é…ç½®ç»„ä»¶æ‰«æï¼Ÿâ€”â€”å› ä¸ºè¦ä½¿ç”¨æ³¨è§£å¼€å‘ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥éœ€è¦åœ¨applicationContext.xmlä¸­é…ç½®ç»„ä»¶æ‰«æï¼Œä½œç”¨æ˜¯æŒ‡å®šå“ªä¸ªåŒ…åŠå…¶å­åŒ…ä¸‹çš„Beanéœ€è¦è¿›è¡Œæ‰«æä¸€éè¯†åˆ«ä½¿ç”¨æ³¨è§£é…ç½®çš„ç±»ã€å­—æ®µå’Œæ–¹æ³•ã€‚2.ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆè¦åœ¨spring-mvc.xmlé‡Œé¢å¦å¤–é…ç½®controllerçš„æ‰«æè€Œä¸æ˜¯åœ¨applicationContext.xmlä¸­ç»Ÿä¸€å…¨éƒ¨é…ç½®ç»„ä»¶æ‰«æï¼Ÿâ€”â€”è™½ç„¶å¯ä»¥é…ç½®åœ¨applicationContext.xmlé‡Œé¢ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯SpringMVCç›¸å…³é…ç½®è¿˜æ˜¯ä¸“é—¨é…ç½®åˆ°spring-mvc.xmlé‡Œé¢æ¯”è¾ƒâ€å¥½â€œ)

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
       xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
       xmlns:mvc="http://www.springframework.org/schema/mvc"
       xmlns:context="http://www.springframework.org/schema/context"
       xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans.xsd
       http://www.springframework.org/schema/context  http://www.springframework.org/schema/context/spring-context.xsd
       http://www.springframework.org/schema/mvc  http://www.springframework.org/schema/mvc/spring-mvc.xsd
">

    <!--Controllerçš„ç»„ä»¶æ‰«æ-->
    <context:component-scan base-package="com.hugo.controller"/>

    <!--é…ç½®å†…éƒ¨èµ„æºè§†å›¾è§£æå™¨-->
    <bean id="viewResolver" class="org.springframework.web.servlet.view.InternalResourceViewResolver">
        <!--é…ç½®åœ°å€å‰ç¼€-->
        <property name="prefix" value="/"></property>
        <!--é…ç½®åœ°å€çš„åç¼€-->
        <property name="suffix" value=".jsp"></property>
    </bean>


    <!--mvcçš„æ³¨è§£é©±åŠ¨-->
    <mvc:annotation-driven/>

    <!--é™æ€èµ„æºæƒé™å¼€æ”¾-->
    <mvc:default-servlet-handler/>

</beans>

index.jsp:

<html>
<body>
<h2>Hello World!${name}</h2>
</body>
</html>

web.xmlä¸­é…ç½®å‰ç«¯æ§åˆ¶å™¨å¹¶ä¿®æ”¹xmlæ–‡ä»¶ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼š

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<web-app xmlns="http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee"
         xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
         xsi:schemaLocation="http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee/web-app_4_0.xsd"
         version="4.0">
  <display-name>Archetype Created Web Application</display-name>
  <!--é…ç½®SpringMVCçš„å‰ç«¯æ§åˆ¶å™¨-->
  <servlet>
    <servlet-name>DispatcherServlet</servlet-name>
    <servlet-class>org.springframework.web.servlet.DispatcherServlet</servlet-class>
    <init-param>
      <param-name>contextConfigLocation</param-name>
      <param-value>classpath:spring-mvc.xml</param-value>
    </init-param>
    <load-on-startup>1</load-on-startup>
  </servlet>
  <servlet-mapping>
    <servlet-name>DispatcherServlet</servlet-name>
    <url-pattern>/</url-pattern>
  </servlet-mapping>
</web-app>

è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ‹¦æˆªå™¨æ­¥éª¤ï¼š

â‘  åˆ›å»ºæ‹¦æˆªå™¨å®ç°HanderInterceptoræ¥å£

1.åˆ›å»ºinterceptor.HandlerInterceptorå¹¶å®ç°HandlerInterceptoræ¥å£

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â æ³¨æ„è¯¥æ¥å£çš„æ–¹æ³•éƒ½æ˜¯ä½¿ç”¨defaultä¿®é¥°ï¼ˆé€šè¿‡defaultå…³é”®å­—å®šä¹‰çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œé›†æˆè¯¥æ¥å£çš„æ–¹æ³•ä¸éœ€è¦å»å®ç°è¯¥æ–¹æ³•ï¼‰çš„ï¼Œä½†é‡Œé¢æ˜¯ç©ºå®ç°ã€‚æ‰€ä»¥è¦æˆ‘ä»¬æ‰‹åŠ¨å®ç°å…¶ä¸­çš„æ–¹æ³•ã€‚

    package com.hugo.interceptor;

import org.springframework.web.servlet.HandlerInterceptor;
import org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView;

import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;

public class MyInterceptor implements HandlerInterceptor {
    /**
     * åœ¨ç›®æ ‡æ–¹æ³•æ‰§è¡Œä¹‹å‰æ‰§è¡Œ
     * @param request
     * @param response
     * @param handler
     * @return
     * @throws Exception
     */
    @Override
    public boolean preHandle(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response, Object handler) throws Exception {
        System.out.println("preHandle......");
        return false;//è¿”å›trueä»£è¡¨æ”¾è¡Œï¼Œfalseè¡¨ç¤ºä¸æ”¾è¡Œ
    }

    /**
     * åœ¨ç›®æ ‡æ–¹æ³•æ‰§è¡Œä¹‹åï¼Œè§†å›¾è¿”å›ä¹‹å‰æ‰§è¡Œ
     * @param request
     * @param response
     * @param handler
     * @param modelAndView
     * @throws Exception
     */
    @Override
    public void postHandle(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response, Object handler, ModelAndView modelAndView) throws Exception {
        System.out.println("postHandle......");
    }

    /**
     * åœ¨æ•´ä¸ªæµç¨‹éƒ½æ‰§è¡Œå®Œæ¯•åæ‰§è¡Œ
     * @param request
     * @param response
     * @param handler
     * @param ex
     * @throws Exception
     */
    @Override
    public void afterCompletion(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response, Object handler, Exception ex) throws Exception {
        System.out.println("afterCompletion......");
    }
}

â‘¡ åœ¨spring-mvc.xmlä¸­é…ç½®æ‹¦æˆªå™¨

<!--é…ç½®æ‹¦æˆªå™¨-->
<mvc:interceptors>
    <mvc:interceptor>
        <!--å¯¹å“ªäº›èµ„æºæ‰§è¡Œæ‹¦æˆªæ“ä½œ-->
        <mvc:mapping path="/*"/>
        <bean class="com.hugo.interceptor.MyInterceptor"/>
    </mvc:interceptor>
</mvc:interceptors>

â‘¢ æµ‹è¯•æ‹¦æˆªå™¨çš„æ‹¦æˆªæ•ˆæœ

1.è®¿é—®â€œhttp://localhost:8080/itheima_spring_interceptor_war_exploded/targetâ€

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â æ­¤æ—¶é¡µé¢ä¸€ç‰‡ç©ºç™½ï¼Œæ§åˆ¶å°åªè¾“å‡ºï¼špreHandle......

2.å°†preHandle()æ–¹æ³•çš„è¿”å›å€¼ä¿®æ”¹ä¸ºtrue,è€Œä¸æ˜¯false

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â é¡µé¢èƒ½æ­£å¸¸æ˜¾ç¤ºå’Œè·³è½¬ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶æ§åˆ¶å°è¾“å‡ºï¼š

preHandle......
ç›®æ ‡èµ„æºæ‰§è¡Œã€‚ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚
postHandle......
afterCompletion......

9.3.æ‹¦æˆªå™¨çš„ä¸‰ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•åº”ç”¨

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â åˆ›å»ºé”™è¯¯æç¤ºé¡µé¢/error.jspç”¨æ¥åç»­æµ‹è¯•ã€‚

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰preHandleæ–¹æ³•åœ¨èµ„æºæ–¹æ³•ä¹‹å‰æ‰§è¡Œï¼Œå¯ä»¥è¿›è¡Œè¯·æ±‚è½¬å‘

public boolean preHandle(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response, Object handler) throws Exception {
    System.out.println("preHandle......");
    String param = request.getParameter("param");
    if("yes".equals(param)){
        return true;
    }else{
        request.getRequestDispatcher("/error.jsp").forward(request, response);
        return false;
    }
}

ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰postHandleæ–¹æ³•åœ¨èµ„æºæ–¹æ³•æ‰§è¡Œä¹‹åè§†å›¾è¿”å›ä¹‹å‰æ‰§è¡Œï¼Œå¯ä»¥ä¿®æ”¹è¿”å›çš„ModelAndView

public void postHandle(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response, Object handler, ModelAndView modelAndView) throws Exception {
    modelAndView.addObject("name", "lisi");
    System.out.println("postHandle......");
}

ï¼ˆ3ï¼‰afterCompletionæ–¹æ³•æ˜¯åœ¨æ•´ä¸ªæµç¨‹éƒ½æ‰§è¡Œå®Œæ¯•åæ‰§è¡Œï¼Œå¯ä»¥å¤„ç†ä¸€äº›å¼‚å¸¸

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å°±ä¸ä¸¾ä¾‹äº†ã€‚

9.4.æ€»ç»“ä¸è¡¥å……

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰æœ‰å¤šä¸ªæ‹¦æˆªå™¨

1.interceptor.MyInterceptor2æ‹¦æˆªå™¨ï¼Œå†…å®¹åªæœ‰æ§åˆ¶å°è¾“å‡ºå¹¶ä¸”æ²¡æœ‰æ‹¦æˆªå’Œè½¬å‘åˆ°å…¶ä»–é¡µé¢

2.åœ¨spring-mvc.xmlé…ç½®æ‹¦æˆªå™¨ï¼š

<!--é…ç½®æ‹¦æˆªå™¨-->
<mvc:interceptors>
    <mvc:interceptor>
        <!--å¯¹å“ªäº›èµ„æºæ‰§è¡Œæ‹¦æˆªæ“ä½œ-->
        <mvc:mapping path="/*"/>
        <bean class="com.hugo.interceptor.MyInterceptor"/>
    </mvc:interceptor>
    <mvc:interceptor>
        <!--å¯¹å“ªäº›èµ„æºæ‰§è¡Œæ‹¦æˆªæ“ä½œ-->
        <mvc:mapping path="/*"/>
        <bean class="com.hugo.interceptor.MyInterceptor2"/>
    </mvc:interceptor>

3.çœ‹æ§åˆ¶å°æ‰“å°å°±çŸ¥é“è¾“å‡ºç»“æœ

preHandle......

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å¹¶ä¸”å¤šä¸ªæ‹¦æˆªå™¨çš„æ‰§è¡Œé¡ºåºæ˜¯é…ç½®é¡ºåºã€‚

ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰æ‹¦æˆªå™¨æ–¹æ³•è¯´æ˜

ï¼ˆ3ï¼‰è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ‹¦æˆªå™¨æ­¥éª¤ï¼š

â‘  åˆ›å»ºæ‹¦æˆªå™¨å®ç°HanderInterceptoræ¥å£

â‘¡ åœ¨spring-mvc.xmlä¸­é…ç½®æ‹¦æˆªå™¨

â‘¢ æµ‹è¯•æ‹¦æˆªå™¨çš„æ‹¦æˆªæ•ˆæœ

å.Springã€SpringMVCç»¼åˆç»ƒä¹ 

1.ç»ƒä¹ ç¯å¢ƒæ­å»º

â‘ åˆ›å»ºå·¥ç¨‹ï¼ˆProject&Moduleï¼‰

â‘¡å¯¼å…¥é™æ€é¡µé¢ï¼ˆè§èµ„æ–™jspé¡µé¢ï¼‰

â‘¢å¯¼å…¥éœ€è¦åæ ‡ï¼ˆè§èµ„æ–™ä¸­çš„pom.xmlï¼‰

â‘£åˆ›å»ºåŒ…ç»“æ„ï¼ˆcontrollerã€serviceã€daoã€domainã€utilsï¼‰

â‘¤å¯¼å…¥æ•°æ®åº“è„šæœ¬ï¼ˆè§èµ„æ–™test.sqlï¼‰

â‘¥åˆ›å»ºPOJOç±»ï¼ˆè§èµ„æ–™User.javaå’ŒRole.javaï¼‰

åˆ›å»ºé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ï¼ˆapplicationContext.xml,spring-mvc.xml,jdbc.properties,log4j.propertiesï¼‰

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â springé€šè¿‡ContextLoaderListenerå’Œwebè¾¾æˆå…³ç³»ï¼Œweb.xmlæœ‰å¦‚ä¸‹é…ç½®ï¼š(ä¸ºé¡¹ç›®æä¾›äº†springæ”¯æŒï¼Œåˆå§‹åŒ–äº†Iocå®¹å™¨ï¼Œå¯ä»¥è·å–åº”ç”¨ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡å¯¹è±¡)

<!--å…¨å±€åˆå§‹åŒ–å‚æ•°-->
<context-param>
  <param-name>contextConfigLocation</param-name>
  <param-value>classpath:applicationContext.xml</param-value>
</context-param>

<!--é…ç½®ç›‘å¬å™¨-->
<listener>
  <listener-class>org.springframework.web.context.ContextLoaderListener</listener-class>
</listener>

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â SpringMVCé€šè¿‡å‰ç«¯æ§åˆ¶å™¨DispatcherServletå’Œwebè¾¾æˆå…³ç³»ï¼Œweb.xmlæœ‰å¦‚ä¸‹é…ç½®ï¼šï¼ˆè¿™æ ·å°±å¯ä»¥åœ¨æ–¹æ³•ä¸Šç›´æ¥è¿›è¡Œåœ°å€æ˜ å°„ï¼‰

<!--é…ç½®SpringMVCçš„å‰ç«¯æ§åˆ¶å™¨-->
<servlet>
  <servlet-name>DispatcherServlet</servlet-name>
  <servlet-class>org.springframework.web.servlet.DispatcherServlet</servlet-class>
  <init-param>
    <param-name>contextConfigLocation</param-name>
    <param-value>classpath:spring-mvc.xml</param-value>
  </init-param>
  <load-on-startup>1</load-on-startup>
</servlet>
<servlet-mapping>
  <servlet-name>DispatcherServlet</servlet-name>
  <url-pattern>/</url-pattern>
</servlet-mapping>

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å…³äºé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶applicationContext.xmlé‡Œé¢æ˜¯é…ç½®Beançš„ï¼Œäº¤ç»™springå®¹å™¨å»äº§ç”Ÿï¼›spring-mvc.xmlæ˜¯SpringMVCçš„æ ¸å¿ƒé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶(webå±‚çš„ç»„ä»¶æ‰«æä¹Ÿåœ¨è¿™é…ï¼Œå…¶ä»–çš„åœ¨appliactionContext.xmlé‡Œé¢é…ç½®)ï¼›jdbc.propertiesé…ç½®æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥ä¿¡æ¯ï¼›log4j.propertiesæ˜¯æ—¥å¿—é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ï¼ˆä¸éœ€è¦ä¼šå†™ï¼‰

ç¬”è®°å°±ä¸è¯¦ç»†å†™æ­å»ºè¿‡ç¨‹äº†ï¼Œå¿…è¦çš„æ—¶å€™ä¼šæä¸€ä¸‹ã€‚

é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ï¼š

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰web.xml

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<web-app xmlns="http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee"
         xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
         xsi:schemaLocation="http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee/web-app_4_0.xsd"
         version="4.0">

  <!--å…¨å±€åˆå§‹åŒ–å‚æ•°-->
  <context-param>
    <param-name>contextConfigLocation</param-name>
    <param-value>classpath:applicationContext.xml</param-value>
  </context-param>
  <!--Springçš„ç›‘å¬å™¨-->
  <listener>
    <listener-class>org.springframework.web.context.ContextLoaderListener</listener-class>
  </listener>


  <!--SpringMVCçš„å‰ç«¯æ§åˆ¶å™¨-->
  <servlet>
    <servlet-name>DispatcherServlet</servlet-name>
    <servlet-class>org.springframework.web.servlet.DispatcherServlet</servlet-class>
    <init-param>
      <param-name>contextConfigLocation</param-name>
      <param-value>classpath:spring-mvc.xml</param-value>
    </init-param>
    <load-on-startup>1</load-on-startup>
  </servlet>
  <servlet-mapping>
    <servlet-name>DispatcherServlet</servlet-name>
    <!-- / è¡¨ç¤ºæ‰€æœ‰çš„èµ„æºéƒ½è¦æ‰¾ä»–ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥è¦å¼€æ”¾é™æ€èµ„æºè®¿é—®æƒé™-->
    <url-pattern>/</url-pattern>
  </servlet-mapping>

</web-app>

ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰applicationContext.xml

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
       xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
       xmlns:context="http://www.springframework.org/schema/context"
       xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans.xsd
       http://www.springframework.org/schema/context http://www.springframework.org/schema/context/spring-context.xsd
">

    <!--1.åŠ è½½jdbc.properties-->
    <context:property-placeholder location="classpath:jdbc.properties"/>
    <!--2.é…ç½®æ•°æ®æºå¯¹è±¡-->
    <bean id="dataSource" class="com.mchange.v2.c3p0.ComboPooledDataSource">
        <property name="driverClass" value="${jdbc.driver}"/>
        <property name="jdbcUrl" value="${jdbc.url}"/>
        <property name="user" value="${jdbc.username}"/>
        <property name="password" value="${jdbc.password}"/>
    </bean>

    <!--3.é…ç½®JdbcTemplateå¯¹è±¡-->
    <bean id="jdbcTemplate" class="org.springframework.jdbc.core.JdbcTemplate">
        <property name="dataSource" ref="dataSource"/>
    </bean>

</beans>

ï¼ˆ3ï¼‰spring-mvc.xml

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
       xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
       xmlns:mvc="http://www.springframework.org/schema/mvc"
       xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans.xsd
       http://www.springframework.org/schema/mvc http://www.springframework.org/schema/mvc/spring-mvc.xsd
">

    <!--1.mvæ³¨è§£é©±åŠ¨-->
    <mvc:annotation-driven/>

    <!--2.é…ç½®è§†å›¾è§£æå™¨-->
    <bean class="org.springframework.web.servlet.view.InternalResourceViewResolver">
        <property name="prefix" value="/pages/"/>
        <property name="suffix" value=".jsp"/>
    </bean>

    <!--3.é™æ€èµ„æºè®¿é—®æƒé™å¼€æ”¾-->
    <mvc:default-servlet-handler/>

</beans>

2.jspé¡µé¢åˆ—è¡¨å±•ç¤ºæ•°æ®ä¸šåŠ¡

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰ç¼–å†™webå±‚ä»£ç 

package com.itheima.controller;

import com.itheima.domain.Role;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Controller;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestMapping;
import org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView;

import java.util.List;

@Controller
@RequestMapping("/role")
public class RoleController {
    //è¦è°ƒç”¨serviceå±‚çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œé€šè¿‡æ³¨å…¥è·å¾—(å…ˆä½¿ç”¨é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶æ–¹å¼ï¼Œåé¢å†ä½¿ç”¨æ³¨è§£)
    @Autowired//åªæœ‰è¿™Controllerå±‚çš„æ‰ä½¿ç”¨æ³¨è§£æ³¨å…¥ï¼Œå…¶ä»–å±‚çš„ä½¿ç”¨é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶
    private RoleService roleService;

    public void setRoleService(RoleService roleService) {
        this.roleService = roleService;
    }

    @RequestMapping("/list")
    public ModelAndView List(){
        ModelAndView modelAndView = new ModelAndView();
        //æ·»åŠ æ•°æ®å’Œè§†å›¾
        //1.è°ƒç”¨RoleServiceçš„æ–¹æ³•(è·å–æ•°æ®)
        List<Role> roleList = roleService.list();
        //2.è®¾ç½®æ¨¡å‹
        modelAndView.addObject("roleList", roleList);
        //3.è®¾ç½®è§†å›¾
        modelAndView.setViewName("role-list");
        return modelAndView;
    }
}

ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰serviceå±‚

  • åˆ›å»ºRoleServiceæ¥å£å’ŒListæ–¹æ³•
public interface RoleService {
    public List<Role> list();
}
  • åˆ›å»ºå’Œç¼–å†™å…¶å®ç°ç±»RoleServiceImplä»£ç 
package com.itheima.service.impl;

import com.itheima.domain.Role;
import com.itheima.service.RoleService;

import java.util.List;

public class RoleServiceImpl implements RoleService {
    //è°ƒç”¨daoå±‚æ–¹æ³•
    private  RoleDao roleDao;
    //è®¾ç½®setteræ–¹æ³•æ‰èƒ½è¿›è¡Œæ³¨å…¥
    public void setRoleDao(RoleDao roleDao) {
        this.roleDao = roleDao;
    }

    @Override
    public List<Role> list() {
        List<Role> roleList = roleDao.findAll();
        return roleList;
    }
}

ï¼ˆ3ï¼‰daoå±‚

  • åˆ›å»ºRoleDaoæ¥å£å’ŒfindAllæ–¹æ³•
public interface RoleDao {
    List<Role> findAll();
}
  • åˆ›å»ºå’Œç¼–å†™å…¶å®ç°ç±»RoleDaoImplä»£ç 
package com.itheima.dao.impl;

import com.itheima.dao.RoleDao;
import com.itheima.domain.Role;
import org.springframework.jdbc.core.BeanPropertyRowMapper;
import org.springframework.jdbc.core.JdbcTemplate;

import java.util.List;

public class RoleDaoImpl implements RoleDao {
    //è¦é æ¨¡æ¿å¯¹è±¡æ“ä½œæ•°æ®åº“
    private JdbcTemplate jdbcTemplate;
    public void setJdbcTemplate(JdbcTemplate jdbcTemplate) {
        this.jdbcTemplate = jdbcTemplate;
    }

    @Override
    public List<Role> findAll() {
        //æŸ¥è¯¢æ•°æ®åº“å¹¶è¿”å›
        List<Role> roleList = jdbcTemplate.query("select * from sys_role", new BeanPropertyRowMapper<>(Role.class));
        return roleList;
    }
}

ï¼ˆ4ï¼‰é…ç½®å®ç°

  • åœ¨spring-mvc.xmlé…ç½®webå±‚çš„ç»„ä»¶æ‰«æ
<!--4.ç»„ä»¶æ‰«æ æ‰«æController-->
<context:component-scan base-package="com.itheima.controller"/>
  • åœ¨applicationContext.xmlé‡Œé¢é…ç½®å„å±‚çš„Beanå¹¶æ³¨å…¥ä¾èµ–
<!--é…ç½®RoleService-->
<bean id="roleService" class="com.itheima.service.impl.RoleServiceImpl">
    <property name="roleDao" ref="roleDao"/>
</bean>
<!--é…ç½®RoleDao-->
<bean id="roleDao" class="com.itheima.dao.impl.RoleDaoImpl">
    <!--å‰é¢é…ç½®äº†jdbcTemplateï¼Œç›´æ¥å¯ä»¥å¼•ç”¨-->
    <property name="jdbcTemplate" ref="jdbcTemplate"/>
</bean>

ï¼ˆ5ï¼‰ç¼–å†™jspé¡µé¢å±•ç¤ºæ•°æ®ä»£ç 

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ä¸Šé¢çš„æ­¥éª¤å®Œæˆåï¼Œå·²ç»å°†æ•°æ®å­˜åˆ°modelAndViewå½“ä¸­å¹¶è½¬å‘åˆ°roleListé¡µé¢äº†ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ç°åœ¨å°±æ˜¯è¦åœ¨roleList.jspé¡µé¢ä½¿ç”¨JSTLå’ŒELè¡¨è¾¾å¼æ¥å±•ç¤ºæ•°æ®äº†ã€‚

  • å¼•å…¥JSTLæ ‡ç­¾åº“
<%@taglib prefix="c" uri="http://java.sun.com/jsp/jstl/core" %>

  • éå†è¾“å‡ºå±•ç¤º

    â€‹ å…ˆçœ‹çœ‹æ¯ä¸€é¡¹ä»¥å‰æ˜¯æ€ä¹ˆå±•ç¤ºçš„ï¼š

    <tr>
   <td><input name="ids" type="checkbox"></td>
   <td>1</td>
   <td>é™¢é•¿</td>
   <td>javaå­¦é™¢æ•´ä½“å·¥ä½œç®¡ç†</td>
   <td class="text-center">
      <a href="#" class="btn bg-olive btn-xs">åˆ é™¤</a>
   </td>
</tr>

    â€‹ ä¿®æ”¹åï¼š

<c:forEach items="${roleList}" var="role">
   <tr>
      <td><input name="ids" type="checkbox"></td>
      <td>${role.id}</td>
      <td>${role.roleName}</td>
      <td>${role.roleDesc}</td>
      <td class="text-center">
         <a href="#" class="btn bg-olive btn-xs">åˆ é™¤</a>
      </td>
   </tr>
</c:forEach>

ï¼ˆ6ï¼‰æµ‹è¯•

  • æ•°æ®åº“æ•°æ®

  • ç‚¹å‡»èœå•â€œè§’è‰²ç®¡ç†â€åé¡µé¢æ˜¾ç¤º

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â è§’è‰²ç®¡ç†å…¶å®å°±æ˜¯è®¿é—®â€œhttp://localhost:8080/spring_tx_war_exploded/role/listâ€ã€‚

3.è§’è‰²æ·»åŠ æ“ä½œä¸šåŠ¡

  • å®ç°åæ•ˆæœï¼š

  • æ­¥éª¤ï¼š

    â‘  ç‚¹å‡»åˆ—è¡¨é¡µé¢æ–°å»ºæŒ‰é’®è·³è½¬åˆ°è§’è‰²æ·»åŠ é¡µé¢ â‘¡ è¾“å…¥è§’è‰²ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œç‚¹å‡»ä¿å­˜æŒ‰é’®ï¼Œè¡¨å•æ•°æ®æäº¤æœåŠ¡å™¨ â‘¢ ç¼–å†™RoleControllerçš„save()æ–¹æ³• â‘£ ç¼–å†™RoleServiceçš„save()æ–¹æ³• â‘¤ ç¼–å†™RoleDaoçš„save()æ–¹æ³• â‘¥ ä½¿ç”¨JdbcTemplateä¿å­˜Roleæ•°æ®åˆ°sys_role â‘¦ è·³è½¬å›è§’è‰²åˆ—è¡¨é¡µé¢

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰ä¿®æ”¹role-add.jspé¡µé¢é‡Œé¢çš„è¡¨å•è·³è½¬é“¾æ¥

åŒæ—¶è¦æ³¨æ„é‡Œé¢è¡¨å•é¡¹çš„nameå±æ€§ï¼Œå› ä¸ºåé¢è¦è·å–å‚æ•°ã€‚è¿™ä¸¤ä¸ªå±æ€§çš„åå­—å°±æ˜¯Roleå¯¹è±¡çš„å±æ€§åã€‚

ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰åœ¨RoleControllerå½“ä¸­åˆ›å»ºsave()æ–¹æ³•

@RequestMapping("/save")
public String save(Role role){
    roleService.save(role);
    return "redirect:/role/list";//é‡å®šå‘
}

â€‹ è¯·æ±‚è½¬å‘ç”¨â€forwardâ€œï¼Œé»˜è®¤å°±æ˜¯forwardè·³è½¬

ï¼ˆ3ï¼‰RoleServiceImplä¸­å¢åŠ save()

@Override
public void save(Role role) {
    roleDao.save(role);
}

ï¼ˆ4ï¼‰RoleDaoImplä¸­å¢åŠ save()

@Override
public void save(Role role) {
    jdbcTemplate.update("insert into sys_role value(?,?,?)", null,role.getRoleName(),role.getRoleDesc());
}

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ç¼–å†™ä»£ç çš„é¡ºåºä¸è¦åäº†ï¼Œè¿™æ ·çš„é¡ºåºæ‰æ˜¯æœ€å¿«æœ€èˆ’æœçš„ã€‚å†™å®Œä¸Šè¿°æ­¥éª¤ï¼Œç°åœ¨æ–°å»ºä¸€ä¸ªè§’è‰²ï¼šå°±ä¸šæŒ‡å¯¼ï¼Œè´Ÿè´£å­¦ç”Ÿçš„å°±ä¸šå·¥ä½œã€‚

ç»“æœä¸ºï¼š

æ•°æ®åº“å†…å®¹æ˜¾ç¤ºä¹Ÿä¸æ­£å¸¸ï¼š

è§£å†³ä¹±ç é—®é¢˜ï¼š

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â é—®é¢˜å°±åœ¨äºPOSTä¹±ç ï¼Œæ­¤å¤„çš„formè¡¨å•æ˜¯POSTæ–¹å¼æäº¤çš„ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥è¦è§£å†³ä¸­æ–‡ä¹±ç é—®é¢˜ã€‚æ–¹æ³•å‰é¢ä¹Ÿæœ‰æè¿‡ã€‚åœ¨è¿™é…ç½®ä¸€ä¸ªå…¨å±€çš„å­—ç¬¦é›†è¿‡æ»¤å™¨ï¼š
