    <mapper resource="com.itheima.mapper/UserMapper.xml"></mapper>
    <mapper resource="com.itheima.mapper/OrderMapper.xml"></mapper>
</mappers>

9.1.ä¸€å¯¹ä¸€æŸ¥è¯¢

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å…¶å®ä»è¡¨çš„å…³ç³»çœ‹ï¼Œå¤šä¸ªè®¢å•å¯ä»¥å¯¹åº”ä¸€ä¸ªç”¨æˆ·ï¼Œå°±æ˜¯ä¸€å¯¹å¤šçš„å…³ç³»ã€‚ä½†æ˜¯å•ä»â€œä¸€ä¸ªè®¢å•å¯¹åº”ä¸€ä¸ªç”¨æˆ·â€çš„è§’åº¦å¯ä»¥çœ‹æˆæ˜¯ä¸€å¯¹ä¸€çš„å…³ç³»ã€‚ä¸ç”¨çº ç»“é‚£ä¹ˆå¤šï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å°±ä»è¿™ä¸ªè§’åº¦å»æŸ¥è¯¢å°±å¯ä»¥äº†ã€‚

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â éœ€æ±‚ï¼šæŸ¥è¯¢ordersè¡¨å’Œuserè¡¨ï¼Œè·å¾—è®¢å•å’Œè¯¥è®¢å•å¯¹åº”çš„userä¿¡æ¯ã€‚

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ä¸Šé¢çš„æŸ¥è¯¢ä¸æ˜¯å¾ˆç›´è§‚ï¼Œæ”¹ä¸ºä¸‹é¢çš„æ–¹å¼ï¼š

  • å°†ä¸Šé¢çš„sqlæŸ¥è¯¢è¯­å¥å†™è¿›æ˜ å°„æ–‡ä»¶OrderMapper.xml
<select id="findAll" resultType="order">
    SELECT *,o.id oid FROM orders o,`user` u WHERE o.uid=u.id
</select>

  • è·³è¿‡å…¶ä»–æ­¥éª¤ï¼ˆé‡å¤æœºæ¢°çš„æ­¥éª¤ï¼‰

  • ç¼–å†™æµ‹è¯•æ–¹æ³•

package test;

import com.itheima.domain.Order;
import com.itheima.domain.User;
import com.itheima.mapper.OrderMapper;
import com.itheima.mapper.UserMapper;
import org.apache.ibatis.io.Resources;
import org.apache.ibatis.session.SqlSession;
import org.apache.ibatis.session.SqlSessionFactory;
import org.apache.ibatis.session.SqlSessionFactoryBuilder;
import org.junit.Test;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.InputStream;
import java.util.List;

public class MapperTest {
    @Test
    public void test3() throws IOException {
        InputStream resourceAsStream = Resources.getResourceAsStream("sqlMapConfig.xml");
        SqlSessionFactory sqlSessionFactory = new SqlSessionFactoryBuilder().build(resourceAsStream);
        SqlSession sqlSession = sqlSessionFactory.openSession();

        OrderMapper orderMapper = sqlSession.getMapper(OrderMapper.class);
        List<Order> orderList = orderMapper.findAll();
        for (Order order : orderList) {
            System.out.println(order);
        }

        sqlSession.commit();
        sqlSession.close();
    }
}
  • è¿è¡Œç»“æœ

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å…¶å®ä¸ç”¨è¿è¡Œéƒ½çŸ¥é“Orderç±»é‡Œé¢çš„Userå±æ€§æ˜¯ä¸ä¼šå°è£…è¿›å»çš„ï¼ŒMybatisåªä¼šæ ¹æ®åå­—å¸®ä½ å°è£…è¿›Orderï¼Œæ•…user=nullã€‚å¦‚æœä½ æƒ³è¦çš„Mybatiså¸®ä½ è¿åŒOrderé‡Œé¢çš„Userå±æ€§ä¹Ÿç»™ä½ ä¹Ÿä¸€èµ·å°è£…è¿›å»çš„è¯å°±è¦é…ç½®ã€‚**ç…§åº”å¼€å¤´ï¼š**ä¸€ä¸ªOrderé‡Œé¢çš„Userå±æ€§å°±å¯¹åº”ä¸€ä¸ªuserè¡¨çš„ä¸€æ¡å±æ€§ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å«ä¸€å¯¹ä¸€æ¨¡å‹ï¼ï¼ï¼

Mybatisé…ç½®å®ç°å°è£…å®ä½“ç±»é‡Œé¢çš„å¦ä¸€ä¸ªå®ä½“å±æ€§ï¼š

æ–¹æ³•ä¸€:

  • ç¼–å†™æ˜ å°„æ–‡ä»¶OrderMapper.xml
<resultMap id="orderMap" type="order">
    <!--æ‰‹åŠ¨æŒ‡å®šå­—æ®µä¸å®ä½“å±æ€§çš„æ˜ å°„å…³ç³»
        column:æ•°æ®è¡¨çš„å­—æ®µåç§°(å°±æ˜¯è¯¥è¯­å¥åœ¨æ•°æ®åº“æŸ¥è¯¢çš„ç»“æœé›†ä¸­çš„å­—æ®µ)
        property:å®ä½“ï¼ˆåœ¨è¿™é‡ŒæŒ‡orderï¼‰çš„å±æ€§åç§°
    -->
    <id column="oid" property="id"/>
    <!--ä¸»é”®ç”¨idæ ‡ç­¾ï¼Œå…¶ä»–å­—æ®µç”¨resultæ ‡ç­¾-->
    <result column="ordertime" property="ordertime"/>
    <result column="total" property="total"/>
    <!--å‰©ä¸‹çš„å±æ€§éƒ½æ˜¯å°è£…åˆ°useré‡Œçš„-->
    <result column="uid" property="user.id"/>
    <result column="username" property="user.username"/>
    <result column="password" property="user.password"/>
    <result column="birthday" property="user.birthday"/>
</resultMap>

<select id="findAll" resultMap="orderMap">
    SELECT *,o.id oid FROM orders o,`user` u WHERE o.uid=u.id
</select>
  • è¿è¡Œæµ‹è¯•æ–¹æ³•test3()

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å¯ä»¥çœ‹åˆ°Orderå®ä½“é‡Œé¢çš„Userå®ä½“å±æ€§ä¹Ÿå°è£…è¿›å»äº†ï¼

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å…¶å®å°±æ˜¯åœ¨å¤šè¡¨æŸ¥è¯¢æ—¶ï¼Œç»“æœé›†çš„æŸäº›å­—æ®µæ— æ³•è‡ªåŠ¨å¯¹ä¸Šå·ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å°±éœ€è¦æˆ‘ä»¬ä½¿ç”¨resultMapæ ‡ç­¾æ‰‹åŠ¨ç»‘å®šç»“æœé›†å­—æ®µå’Œå±æ€§ã€‚

æ–¹æ³•äºŒï¼š

  • ä¿®æ”¹æ˜ å°„æ–‡ä»¶OrderMapper.xml
<resultMap id="orderMap" type="order">
    <!--æ‰‹åŠ¨æŒ‡å®šå­—æ®µä¸å®ä½“å±æ€§çš„æ˜ å°„å…³ç³»
        column:æ•°æ®è¡¨çš„å­—æ®µåç§°(å°±æ˜¯è¯¥è¯­å¥åœ¨æ•°æ®åº“æŸ¥è¯¢çš„ç»“æœé›†ä¸­çš„å­—æ®µ)
        property:å®ä½“ï¼ˆåœ¨è¿™é‡ŒæŒ‡orderï¼‰çš„å±æ€§åç§°
    -->
    <id column="oid" property="id"/>
    <!--ä¸»é”®ç”¨idæ ‡ç­¾ï¼Œå…¶ä»–å­—æ®µç”¨resultæ ‡ç­¾-->
    <result column="ordertime" property="ordertime"/>
    <result column="total" property="total"/>
    <!--å‰©ä¸‹çš„å±æ€§éƒ½æ˜¯å°è£…åˆ°useré‡Œçš„-->
    <!--<result column="uid" property="user.id"/>
    <result column="username" property="user.username"/>
    <result column="password" property="user.password"/>
    <result column="birthday" property="user.birthday"/>-->

    <!--
        property:å½“å‰å®ä½“(Order)ä¸­çš„å±æ€§åç§°(private User user)
        javaType:å½“å‰å®ä½“(Order)ä¸­çš„å±æ€§çš„ç±»å‹(User)
    -->
    <association property="user" javaType="user">
        <!--å†…éƒ¨å’Œä¸Šé¢ä¸€æ ·ï¼Œè¿›è¡Œå­—æ®µç»‘å®š-->
        <id column="uid" property="id"/>
        <id column="username" property="username"/>
        <id column="password" property="password"/>
        <id column="birthday" property="birthday"/>
    </association>
</resultMap>

<select id="findAll" resultMap="orderMap">
    SELECT *,o.id oid FROM orders o,`user` u WHERE o.uid=u.id
</select>

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å’Œæ–¹æ³•ä¸€æœ¬è´¨ä¸Šæ²¡æœ‰åŒºåˆ«ï¼Œåªæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªåˆ†å¼€å†™ï¼Œä¸€ä¸ªåˆç€å†™ã€‚ç»“æœè¿˜æ˜¯ä¸€æ ·çš„å°±ä¸å±•ç¤ºäº†ã€‚

9.2.ä¸€å¯¹å¤šæŸ¥è¯¢

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ä¸Šä¸€å°èŠ‚æ˜¯order->useræ˜¯ä¸€å¯¹ä¸€ï¼Œç°åœ¨åå‘æŸ¥å°±æ˜¯ä¸€å¯¹å¤šçš„å…³ç³»ã€‚ä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯å¤šè¡¨æŸ¥è¯¢æ—¶Userå®ä½“é‡Œé¢æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªè®°å½•å¤šä¸ªOrderå®ä½“çš„å±æ€§List< Order >ã€‚

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â éœ€æ±‚ï¼šæŸ¥è¯¢æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªç”¨æˆ·ä¸‹çš„æ‰€æœ‰è®¢å•ã€‚

å‰æœŸå‡†å¤‡ï¼š

  • åœ¨UserMapperæ¥å£é‡Œé¢æ·»åŠ æ–¹æ³•
package com.itheima.mapper;

import com.itheima.domain.User;

import java.util.List;

public interface UserMapper {

    public List<User> findAll();

}
  • ç¼–å†™æ˜ å°„æ–‡ä»¶UserMapper.xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE mapper
        PUBLIC "-//mybatis.org//DTD Mapper 3.0//EN"
        "http://mybatis.org/dtd/mybatis-3-mapper.dtd">
<mapper namespace="com.itheima.mapper.UserMapper">

    <select id="findAll" resultType="user">
        select * from user
    </select>

</mapper>
  • æµ‹è¯•æ–¹æ³•
@Test
public void test4() throws IOException {
    InputStream resourceAsStream = Resources.getResourceAsStream("sqlMapConfig.xml");
    SqlSessionFactory sqlSessionFactory = new SqlSessionFactoryBuilder().build(resourceAsStream);
    SqlSession sqlSession = sqlSessionFactory.openSession();

    UserMapper userMapper = sqlSession.getMapper(UserMapper.class);
    List<User> userList = userMapper.findAll();
    for (User user: userList) {
        System.out.println(user);
    }

    sqlSession.close();
}
  • æµ‹è¯•ç»“æœ
User{id=1, username='lucy', password='123', birthday=Wed Dec 12 00:00:00 CST 2018}
User{id=2, username='haohao', password='123', birthday=Thu Dec 12 00:00:00 CST 2019}

å®ç°ï¼š

  • åœ¨Useré‡Œé¢æ·»åŠ å±æ€§ã€å¢åŠ Getterå’ŒSetteræ–¹æ³•å’Œä¿®æ”¹toString

    â€‹ å› ä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªUserå¯èƒ½å¯¹åº”å¤šä¸ªOrderï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å¢åŠ çš„æ˜¯List< Order >ï¼›ä¿®æ”¹toStringæ˜¯ä¸ºäº†è¾“å‡ºæ–°çš„å±æ€§ã€‚

package com.itheima.domain;

import java.util.Date;
import java.util.List;

public class User {
    private int id;
    private String username;
    private String password;
    private Date birthday;

    //æè¿°çš„æ˜¯å½“å‰ç”¨æˆ·å­˜åœ¨å“ªäº›è®¢å•
    private List<Order> orderList;

    public List<Order> getOrderList() {
        return orderList;
    }

    public void setOrderList(List<Order> orderList) {
        this.orderList = orderList;
    }

    public Date getBirthday() {
        return birthday;
    }

    public void setBirthday(Date birthday) {
        this.birthday = birthday;
    }

    public int getId() {
        return id;
    }

    public void setId(int id) {
        this.id = id;
    }

    public String getUsername() {
        return username;
    }

    public void setUsername(String username) {
        this.username = username;
    }

    public String getPassword() {
        return password;
    }

    public void setPassword(String password) {
        this.password = password;
    }

    @Override
    public String toString() {
        return "User{" +
                "id=" + id +
                ", username='" + username + '\'' +
                ", password='" + password + '\'' +
                ", birthday=" + birthday +
                ", orderList=" + orderList +
                '}';
    }
}
  • ç¡®å®šå¤šè¡¨æŸ¥è¯¢è¯­å¥å’Œè¿”å›çš„ç»“æœé›†

  • ä¿®æ”¹æ˜ å°„æ–‡ä»¶UseeMapper.xmlå¹¶è¿›è¡Œæ˜ å°„é…ç½®ï¼ˆå­—æ®µç»‘å®šï¼‰
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE mapper
        PUBLIC "-//mybatis.org//DTD Mapper 3.0//EN"
        "http://mybatis.org/dtd/mybatis-3-mapper.dtd">
<mapper namespace="com.itheima.mapper.UserMapper">
    
    <resultMap id="userMap" type="user">
        <id column="uid" property="id"/>
        <result column="username" property="username"/>
        <result column="password" property="password"/>
        <result column="birthday" property="birthday"/>
        <!--é…ç½®é›†åˆä¿¡æ¯
              property:é›†åˆåç§°
              ofType:å½“å‰é›†åˆä¸­çš„æ•°æ®ç±»å‹
        -->
        <collection property="orderList" ofType="order">
            <!--å°è£…orderçš„æ•°æ®-->
            <id column="oid" property="id"/>
            <result column="ordertime" property="ordertime"/>
            <result column="total" property="total"/>
            <!--å› ä¸ºæˆ‘ä»¬æŸ¥çš„æ˜¯å•å‘çš„ï¼Œorderé‡Œé¢çš„userå±æ€§å°±ä¸å°äº†-->
        </collection>
    </resultMap>

    <select id="findAll" resultMap="userMap">
        SELECT *,o.id oid FROM `user` u,orders o WHERE u.id=o.uid
    </select>

</mapper>
  • è¿è¡Œtest4()å
User{id=1, username='lucy', password='123', birthday=Wed Dec 12 00:00:00 CST 2018, orderList=[Order{id=1, ordertime=Wed Dec 12 00:00:00 CST 2018, total=3000.0, user=null}, Order{id=2, ordertime=Wed Dec 12 00:00:00 CST 2018, total=4000.0, user=null}]}
User{id=2, username='haohao', password='123', birthday=Thu Dec 12 00:00:00 CST 2019, orderList=[Order{id=3, ordertime=Wed Dec 12 00:00:00 CST 2018, total=5000.0, user=null}]}

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å¯ä»¥çœ‹åˆ°Useré‡Œé¢çš„Listå°è£…è¿›å»äº†æ•°æ®äº†ã€‚

9.3.å¤šå¯¹å¤šæŸ¥è¯¢

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â éœ€æ±‚ï¼šæŸ¥è¯¢æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªç”¨æˆ·å’Œè¯¥ç”¨æˆ·æ‰€å…·æœ‰çš„æ‰€æœ‰è§’è‰²ã€‚

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å‰é¢ä¸ç®¡æ˜¯ä¸€å¯¹ä¸€æ¨¡å‹è¿˜æ˜¯ä¸€å¯¹å¤šæ¨¡å‹ï¼Œéƒ½æ˜¯ä¸¤å¼ è¡¨ï¼Œå¤šå¯¹å¤šæ¨¡å‹æœ‰ä¸‰å¼ è¡¨ï¼Œå¤šäº†ä¸€ä¸ªä¸­é—´è¡¨ã€‚

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ä½†æ˜¯ï¼å…¶å®è¿™ä¸‰ç§æ¨¡å‹ä¸æ˜¯å…³é”®ï¼Œå…³é”®åªæ˜¯å°è£…çš„å±æ€§ç±»å‹æ˜¯æ™®é€šçš„Beanè¿˜æ˜¯é›†åˆï¼

  • æ ¹æ®æ•°æ®åº“è¡¨sys_roleåˆ›å»ºå®ä½“Role

package com.itheima.domain;

public class Role {

    private int id;
    private String roleName;
    private String roleDesc;

    public int getId() {
        return id;
    }

    public void setId(int id) {
        this.id = id;
    }

    public String getRoleName() {
        return roleName;
    }

    public void setRoleName(String roleName) {
        this.roleName = roleName;
    }

    public String getRoleDesc() {
        return roleDesc;
    }

    public void setRoleDesc(String roleDesc) {
        this.roleDesc = roleDesc;
    }

    @Override
    public String toString() {
        return "Role{" +
                "id=" + id +
                ", roleName='" + roleName + '\'' +
                ", roleDesc='" + roleDesc + '\'' +
                '}';
    }
}
  • åœ¨Userä¸­å¢åŠ List< Role > ä»¥åŠå…¶Getterå’ŒSetteræ–¹æ³•å¹¶ä¸”ä¿®æ”¹toString
//æè¿°å½“å‰ç”¨æˆ·å…·å¤‡å“ªäº›å±æ€§
private List<Role> roleList;

public List<Role> getRoleList() {
    return roleList;
}

public void setRoleList(List<Role> roleList) {
    this.roleList = roleList;
}
@Override
public String toString() {
    return "User{" +
            "id=" + id +
            ", username='" + username + '\'' +
            ", password='" + password + '\'' +
            ", birthday=" + birthday +
            ", roleList=" + roleList +
            '}';
}
  • åœ¨UserMApperæ¥å£ä¸­å¢åŠ æ–¹æ³•
public List<User> findUserAndRoleAll();
  • åœ¨æ•°æ®åº“ç¡®å®šå¤šè¡¨æŸ¥è¯¢è¯­å¥å’Œè¿”å›çš„ç»“æœé›†

  • åœ¨æ˜ å°„æ–‡ä»¶UserMapper.xmlä¸­é…ç½®å¹¶åœ¨sqlConfig.xmlæ·»åŠ Roleçš„åˆ«å
<resultMap id="userRoleMap" type="user">
    <!--1.userçš„ä¿¡æ¯-->
    <id column="userid" property="id"/>
    <result column="username" property="username"/>
    <result column="password" property="password"/>
    <result column="birthday" property="birthday"/>
    <!--2.userå†…éƒ¨çš„roleListä¿¡æ¯-->
    <collection property="roleList" ofType="role">
        <id column="roleid" property="id"/>
        <result column="rolename" property="roleName"/>
        <result column="roleDesc" property="roleDesc"/>
    </collection>
</resultMap>

<select id="findUserAndRoleAll" resultMap="userRoleMap">
    SELECT * FROM `user` u,sys_user_role ur,sys_role r WHERE u.id=ur.userid AND ur.roleid=r.id
</select>
  • ç¼–å†™æµ‹è¯•æ–¹æ³•test5()
@Test
public void test5() throws IOException {
    InputStream resourceAsStream = Resources.getResourceAsStream("sqlMapConfig.xml");
    SqlSessionFactory sqlSessionFactory = new SqlSessionFactoryBuilder().build(resourceAsStream);
    SqlSession sqlSession = sqlSessionFactory.openSession();

    UserMapper mapper = sqlSession.getMapper(UserMapper.class);
    List<User> userAndRoleAll = mapper.findUserAndRoleAll();
    for (User user : userAndRoleAll) {
        System.out.println(user);
    }

    sqlSession.close();
}
  • æµ‹è¯•ç»“æœ
User{id=1, username='lucy', password='123', birthday=Wed Dec 12 00:00:00 CST 2018, roleList=[Role{id=1, roleName='CTO', roleDesc='CTO'}, Role{id=2, roleName='COO', roleDesc='COO'}]}
User{id=2, username='haohao', password='123', birthday=Thu Dec 12 00:00:00 CST 2019, roleList=[Role{id=1, roleName='CTO', roleDesc='CTO'}, Role{id=2, roleName='COO', roleDesc='COO'}]}

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â è·Ÿå‰é¢çš„æ•°æ®åº“çš„æŸ¥è¯¢ç»“æœå¯¹æ¯”å¯çŸ¥è¾“å‡ºçš„ç»“æœå°±æ˜¯æˆ‘ä»¬æƒ³è¦çš„ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”Useré‡Œé¢çš„List< Role >å°è£…è¿›å»äº†ã€‚è¿˜æœ‰å°±æ˜¯ä¸è¦ä¸åŒºåˆ†resultMapæ ‡ç­¾é‡Œçš„idæ ‡ç­¾å’Œresultæ ‡ç­¾ï¼Œçœ‹çœ‹æœ€åè¾“å‡ºçš„æ•°æ®å°±çŸ¥é“äº†ï¼ˆç›¸å½“äºç»™æˆ‘ä»¬èšåˆäº†ï¼Œä¸”èƒ½æé«˜æ•ˆç‡ï¼‰ã€‚

9.4.çŸ¥è¯†å°ç»“

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å…¶å®ä¸ç”¨åœ¨æ„è¿™ä»€ä¹ˆä¸‰ç§æ¨¡å‹ï¼Œä¸‰ç§æ¨¡å‹æœ¬è´¨ä¸Šå°±æ˜¯ä¸¤ç‚¹ä¸åŒï¼š1.å»ºè¡¨åŸåˆ™ä¸åŒï¼›2.æŸ¥è¯¢çš„sqlè¯­å¥ä¸åŒã€‚è€Œæˆ‘ä»¬è¦å…³æ³¨çš„åªæ˜¯ï¼šå°è£…çš„æ•°æ®æ˜¯æ™®é€šjavaç±»å‹ï¼Œæ˜¯æ™®é€šçš„Beanï¼Œè¿˜æ˜¯é›†åˆç±»å‹ï¼Œå¹¶ä½¿ç”¨resultMapæ ‡ç­¾è¿›è¡Œæ•°æ®è¡¨å­—æ®µå’ŒJavaBeanå±æ€§çš„ç»‘å®šã€‚

å.Mybatisçš„æ³¨è§£å¼€å‘

10.1.å•è¡¨æ“ä½œ

  • ç¯å¢ƒæ­å»ºï¼š

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â åœ¨è¿™åªå±•ç¤ºå…³é”®çš„ä»£ç å’Œæ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œå…¶ä»–é»˜è®¤é…ç½®å’Œæ­å»ºå®Œæˆã€‚æµ‹è¯•ç±»çš„åé¢æåˆ°å†è¯´ã€‚

1.æ ¸å¿ƒé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶sqlMapConfig.xml:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE configuration
        PUBLIC "-//mybatis.org//DTD Config 3.0//EN"
        "http://mybatis.org/dtd/mybatis-3-config.dtd">
<configuration>

    <!--é€šè¿‡propertiesæ ‡ç­¾åŠ è½½å¤–éƒ¨propertiesæ–‡ä»¶-->
    <properties resource="jdbc.properties"></properties>

    <!--è‡ªå®šä¹‰åˆ«å-->
    <typeAliases>
        <typeAlias type="com.com.itheima.domain.User" alias="user"></typeAlias>
    </typeAliases>

    <!--æ•°æ®æºç¯å¢ƒ-->
    <environments default="development">
        <environment id="development">
            <transactionManager type="JDBC"></transactionManager>
            <dataSource type="POOLED">
                <property name="driver" value="${jdbc.driver}"/>
                <property name="url" value="${jdbc.url}"/>
                <property name="username" value="${jdbc.username}"/>
                <property name="password" value="${jdbc.password}"/>
            </dataSource>
        </environment>
    </environments>
    <!--åŠ è½½æ˜ å°„æ–‡ä»¶-->
    <mappers>
        <mapper resource="com.itheima.mapper/UserMapper.xml"></mapper>
    </mappers>

</configuration>

2.æ˜ å°„æ–‡ä»¶UserMapper.xml

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE mapper
        PUBLIC "-//mybatis.org//DTD Mapper 3.0//EN"
        "http://mybatis.org/dtd/mybatis-3-mapper.dtd">
<mapper namespace="com.itheima.mapper.UserMapper">

    <insert id="save" parameterType="user">
        insert into user value (#{id},#{username},#{password},#{birthday})
    </insert>

    <update id="update" parameterType="user">
        update user set username = #{username},password =#{password} where id=#{id}
    </update>

    <delete id="delete" parameterType="int">
        delete from user where id = #{id}
    </delete>

    <select id="findById" parameterType="int" resultType="user">
        select * from user where id = #{id}
    </select>

    <select id="findAll" resultType="user">
        select * from user
    </select>

</mapper>

3.daoå±‚æ¥å£-mapper.UserMapper

package com.itheima.mapper;

import com.itheima.domain.User;

import java.util.List;

public interface UserMapper {

    public void save(User user);

    public void update(User user);

    public void delete(int id);

    public User findById(int id);

    public List<User> findAll();

}

3.ç¼–å†™æµ‹è¯•ç±»MyBatisTestï¼Œå¹¶æŠ½å–é‡å¤ä»£ç 

junit4junit5ç‰¹ç‚¹
@BeforeClass@BeforeAllåœ¨å½“å‰ç±»çš„æ‰€æœ‰æµ‹è¯•æ–¹æ³•ä¹‹å‰æ‰§è¡Œã€‚æ³¨è§£åœ¨ã€é™æ€æ–¹æ³•ã€‘ä¸Šã€‚
@AfterClass@AfterAllåœ¨å½“å‰ç±»ä¸­çš„æ‰€æœ‰æµ‹è¯•æ–¹æ³•ä¹‹åæ‰§è¡Œã€‚æ³¨è§£åœ¨ã€é™æ€æ–¹æ³•ã€‘ä¸Šã€‚
@Before@BeforeEachåœ¨æ¯ä¸ªæµ‹è¯•æ–¹æ³•ä¹‹å‰æ‰§è¡Œã€‚æ³¨è§£åœ¨ã€éé™æ€æ–¹æ³•ã€‘ä¸Šã€‚
@After@AfterEachåœ¨æ¯ä¸ªæµ‹è¯•æ–¹æ³•ä¹‹åæ‰§è¡Œã€‚æ³¨è§£åœ¨ã€éé™æ€æ–¹æ³•ã€‘ä¸Šã€‚
package com.itheima.test;

import com.itheima.domain.User;
import com.itheima.mapper.UserMapper;
import org.apache.ibatis.io.Resources;
import org.apache.ibatis.session.SqlSession;
import org.apache.ibatis.session.SqlSessionFactory;
import org.apache.ibatis.session.SqlSessionFactoryBuilder;
import org.junit.Before;
import org.junit.Test;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.InputStream;

public class MyBatisTest {

    private UserMapper mapper;

    @Before
    public void before() throws IOException {
        InputStream resourceAsStream = Resources.getResourceAsStream("sqlMapConfig.xml");
        SqlSessionFactory sqlSessionFactory = new SqlSessionFactoryBuilder().build(resourceAsStream);
        SqlSession sqlSession = sqlSessionFactory.openSession(true);
        mapper = sqlSession.getMapper(UserMapper.class);
    }

    @Test
    public void testSave(){
        User user = new User();
        user.setUsername("tom");
        user.setPassword("abc");
        mapper.save(user);
    }

}

4.æµ‹è¯•ç»“æœï¼š

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å…¶ä»–æ–¹æ³•ç±»ä¼¼ï¼Œå°±ä¸åœ¨è¿™å±•ç¤ºäº†ï¼Œåœ¨åé¢å°†æŸä¸ªæ³¨è§£æ—¶å€™å†è¯´ã€‚

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â è¿™äº›æµ‹è¯•æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œéƒ½æ˜¯é€šè¿‡xmlæ–‡ä»¶é…ç½®çš„ï¼Œä¸‹é¢å°±ä½¿ç”¨æ³¨è§£çš„æ–¹å¼å»å®Œæˆã€‚

  • æ³¨è§£å¼€å‘ï¼š

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â åœ¨ä¸Šé¢çš„åŸºç¡€ä¸Šå¯¹é¡¹ç›®ä½œå‡ºå¦‚ä¸‹ä¿®æ”¹ï¼š

â€‹ 1.åˆ é™¤æ˜ å°„æ–‡ä»¶UserMapper.xml

â€‹ 2.ä¿®æ”¹æ ¸å¿ƒé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶sqlConfig.xml

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å› ä¸ºåˆ é™¤äº†UserMapper.xml,å°±è¦æŠŠâ€œåŠ è½½æ˜ å°„æ–‡ä»¶â€çš„é…ç½®ä»£ç å»æ‰ã€‚

<!--åŠ è½½æ˜ å°„æ–‡ä»¶-->
<mappers>
    <mapper resource="com.itheima.mapper/UserMapper.xml"></mapper>
</mappers>

å»æ‰åä½¿ç”¨æ³¨è§£ï¼ˆæ›¿ä»£æ˜ å°„æ–‡ä»¶ï¼‰å¼€å‘æ—¶ï¼Œæ€ä¹ˆåŠ è½½æ˜ å°„å…³ç³»ï¼Œä»£æ›¿æ˜ å°„æ–‡ä»¶å‘¢ï¼Ÿ

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â æ‰€ä»¥æ­¤å¤„å°±è¦é…ç½®â€œåŠ è½½æ˜ å°„å…³ç³»â€ï¼š

<!--åŠ è½½æ˜ å°„å…³ç³»-->
<mappers>
    <!--æŒ‡å®šæ¥å£æ‰€åœ¨çš„åŒ… æ³¨æ„ä¸æ˜¯ç±»ï¼ï¼ï¼-->
    <package name="com.itheima.mapper"/>
</mappers>

3.åœ¨mapper.UserMapperæ¥å£çš„æ–¹æ³•å¢åŠ ç›¸å…³æ³¨è§£ï¼š

@Insert

â€‹ åœ¨æ¥å£UserMapperçš„æ–¹æ³•ä¸Šå¢åŠ @Insertæ³¨è§£ï¼Œå¹¶åœ¨é‡Œé¢ç¼–å†™å‰é¢å†™åœ¨æ˜ å°„æ–‡ä»¶é‡Œå¯¹åº”æ ‡ç­¾çš„sqlè¯­å¥ã€‚

@Insert("insert into user value (#{id},#{username},#{password},#{birthday})")
public void save(User user);

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â æµ‹è¯•æ–¹æ³•ä¸ç”¨æ”¹ï¼Œç›´æ¥å°±å¯ä»¥è¿è¡Œã€‚ä¸‹é¢ä¸‰ä¸ªæ ‡ç­¾çš„ä»£ç çš„æµ‹æ–¹æ³•éƒ½ä¸ç”¨æ”¹ã€‚ä»¥å‰ç”¨é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶çš„æ—¶å€™ä½¿ç”¨çš„æµ‹è¯•æ–¹æ³•æ€ä¹ˆæ ·ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨æ³¨è§£åæµ‹è¯•æ–¹æ³•ä¸ç”¨æ”¹å°±èƒ½è¿è¡Œã€‚æµ‹è¯•æ–¹æ³•ï¼š

@Test
public void testSave(){
    User user = new User();
    user.setUsername("tom");
    user.setPassword("abc");
    mapper.save(user);
}

@Update

@Update("update user set username = #{username},password =#{password} where id=#{id}")
public void update(User user);

æµ‹è¯•æ–¹æ³•ï¼š

@Test
public void testUpdate(){
    User user = new User();
    user.setId(4);
    user.setUsername("zhangsan");
    user.setPassword("123");
    mapper.update(user);
}

@Delete

@Delete("delete from user where id = #{id}")
public void delete(int id);

æµ‹è¯•æ–¹æ³•ï¼š

@Test
public void testDelete(){
    mapper.delete(4);
}

@Select

@Select("select * from user where id = #{id}")
public User findById(int id);

@Select("select * from user")
public List<User> findAll();

æµ‹è¯•æ–¹æ³•ï¼š

@Test
public void testFindById(){
    User user = mapper.findById(2);
    System.out.println(user);
}

@Test
public void testFindAll(){
    List<User> all = mapper.findAll();
    for (User user : all) {
        System.out.println(user);
    }
}

10.2.å¤šè¡¨å¤æ‚æŸ¥è¯¢

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å‰é¢æ¼”ç¤ºçš„éƒ½æ˜¯å•è¡¨ç®€å•æ“ä½œï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯æ•°æ®åº“å¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥åˆ°å°è£…åˆ°æŸä¸ªJavaBeanæ“ä½œã€‚ç°åœ¨å°±æ¥æ¼”ç¤ºå‰é¢"ä¹.å¤šè¡¨æ“ä½œ"çš„ä¸‰ç§æƒ…å†µçš„JavaBeanå°è£…ã€‚

  • åˆ›å»ºdomain.Order
package com.itheima.domain;

import java.util.Date;

public class Order {

    private int id;
    private Date ordertime;
    private double total;//é‡‘é¢

    //ä½¿ç”¨é¢å‘å¯¹è±¡çš„æ€æƒ³ï¼šå½“å‰è®¢å•å±äºå“ªä¸ªç”¨æˆ·
    private User user;

    public int getId() {
        return id;
    }

    public void setId(int id) {
        this.id = id;
    }

    public Date getOrdertime() {
        return ordertime;
    }

    public void setOrdertime(Date ordertime) {
        this.ordertime = ordertime;
    }

    public double getTotal() {
        return total;
    }

    public void setTotal(double total) {
        this.total = total;
    }

    public User getUser() {
        return user;
    }

    public void setUser(User user) {
        this.user = user;
    }

    @Override
    public String toString() {
        return "Order{" +
                "id=" + id +
                ", ordertime=" + ordertime +
                ", total=" + total +
                ", user=" + user +
                '}';
    }
}

ä¸€å¯¹ä¸€æŸ¥è¯¢(@One)

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ä¸€å¯¹ä¸€æ¨¡å‹å’Œç›¸å…³æ¦‚å¿µè¯·çœ‹â€œ9.1.ä¸€å¯¹ä¸€æŸ¥è¯¢â€ã€‚å…¶å®@Oneå’Œ@Manyå¯ä»¥ç†è§£ä¸ºå°†ä¸€ä¸ªå¤šè¡¨æŸ¥è¯¢åˆ†è§£ä¸ºä¸¤æ¬¡æŸ¥è¯¢ï¼Œ@oneè¡¨ç¤ºâ€ç¬¬äºŒæ¬¡â€œæŸ¥è¯¢ç»“æœä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªï¼Œ@Manyè¡¨ç¤ºâ€œç¬¬äºŒæ¬¡â€æŸ¥è¯¢ç»“æœä¸ºå¤šä¸ª

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â éœ€æ±‚ï¼šæŸ¥è¯¢ordersè¡¨å’Œuserè¡¨ï¼Œè·å¾—è®¢å•å’Œè¯¥è®¢å•å¯¹åº”çš„userä¿¡æ¯ã€‚

  • åˆ›å»ºæ¥å£mapper.OrderMapper
public interface OrderMapper {

    @Select("select *,o.id oid from orders o,user u where o.uid = u.id")
    public List<Order> findAll();

}
  • æŠŠä¸Šé¢çš„SQLæ”¾åˆ°æ•°æ®åº“æ‰§è¡Œ-ç¡®å®šæ‰§è¡Œçš„SQLè¯­å¥å’ŒæŸ¥çœ‹ç»“æœé›†å­—æ®µ

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ä»æŸ¥è¯¢ç»“æœå¯ä»¥çŸ¥é“æˆ‘ä»¬æ— æ³•ç›´æ¥å°è£…åˆ°Orderä¸­ï¼Œå› ä¸ºOrderä¸­è¿˜æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªUserã€‚è¿™å°±éœ€è¦æˆ‘ä»¬è¿›è¡Œäººä¸ºå°è£…ï¼

  • ä½¿ç”¨@Resultså’Œ@Resultï¼ˆç”¨â€œid = trueâ€æ ‡è®°ä¸»é”®ï¼‰
public interface OrderMapper {

    @Select("select *,o.id oid from orders o,user u where o.uid = u.id")
    @Results({
            @Result(id = true,column = "oid",property = "id"),
            @Result(column = "ordertime",property = "ordertime"),
            @Result(column = "total",property = "total"),
            @Result(column = "uid",property = "user.id"),
            @Result(column = "username",property = "user.username"),
            @Result(column = "password",property = "user.password")
    }
    )
    public List<Order> findAll();

}
  • æµ‹è¯•
@Test
public void test1(){
    List<Order> all = mapper.findAll();
    for (Order order : all) {
        System.out.println(order);
    }
}

å…¶ä»–å†™æ³•:

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å‰é¢ç”¨æ˜ å°„æ–‡ä»¶ä¸€å¯¹ä¸€æŸ¥è¯¢é…ç½®ä¸­æœ‰associationæ ‡ç­¾ï¼š

<resultMap id="orderMap" type="order">
    <!--æ‰‹åŠ¨æŒ‡å®šå­—æ®µä¸å®ä½“å±æ€§çš„æ˜ å°„å…³ç³»
        column:æ•°æ®è¡¨çš„å­—æ®µåç§°(å°±æ˜¯è¯¥è¯­å¥åœ¨æ•°æ®åº“æŸ¥è¯¢çš„ç»“æœé›†ä¸­çš„å­—æ®µ)
        property:å®ä½“ï¼ˆåœ¨è¿™é‡ŒæŒ‡orderï¼‰çš„å±æ€§åç§°
    -->
    <id column="oid" property="id"/>
    <!--ä¸»é”®ç”¨idæ ‡ç­¾ï¼Œå…¶ä»–å­—æ®µç”¨resultæ ‡ç­¾-->
    <result column="ordertime" property="ordertime"/>
    <result column="total" property="total"/>
    <!--å‰©ä¸‹çš„å±æ€§éƒ½æ˜¯å°è£…åˆ°useré‡Œçš„-->
    <!--<result column="uid" property="user.id"/>
    <result column="username" property="user.username"/>
    <result column="password" property="user.password"/>
    <result column="birthday" property="user.birthday"/>-->

    <!--
        property:å½“å‰å®ä½“(Order)ä¸­çš„å±æ€§åç§°(private User user)
        javaType:å½“å‰å®ä½“(Order)ä¸­çš„å±æ€§çš„ç±»å‹(User)
    -->
    <association property="user" javaType="user">
        <!--å†…éƒ¨å’Œä¸Šé¢ä¸€æ ·ï¼Œè¿›è¡Œå­—æ®µç»‘å®š-->
        <id column="uid" property="id"/>
        <id column="username" property="username"/>
        <id column="password" property="password"/>
        <id column="birthday" property="birthday"/>
    </association>
</resultMap>

<select id="findAll" resultMap="orderMap">
    SELECT *,o.id oid FROM orders o,`user` u WHERE o.uid=u.id
</select>

æ³¨è§£æœ‰å¯¹åº”çš„**@One**

@Select("select * from orders")
@Results({
        @Result(column = "id",property = "id"),
        @Result(column = "ordertime",property = "ordertime"),
        @Result(column = "total",property = "total"),
        @Result(
                property = "user",//è¦å°è£…çš„å±æ€§åç§°
                column = "uid",//æ ¹æ®å“ªä¸ªå­—æ®µå»æŸ¥è¯¢userè¡¨çš„æ•°æ®
                javaType = User.class,//è¦å°è£…çš„å®ä½“ç±»å‹
                //selectå±æ€§ ä»£è¡¨æŸ¥è¯¢é‚£ä¸ªæ¥å£çš„æ–¹æ³•è·å¾—æ•°æ®
                one = @One(select = "com.itheima.mapper.UserMapper.findById")
        )
}
)
public List<Order> findAll();

æåˆ°çš„æ¥å£æ–¹æ³•ä¸ºï¼š

@Select("select * from user where id = #{id}")
public User findById(int id);

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â è¿™é‡Œçš„æ€è·¯å°±æ˜¯ï¼Œå…ˆæŸ¥ä¸€ä¸ªè¡¨Ordersè¡¨ï¼Œç„¶åæ ¹æ®æŸ¥è¯¢çš„ç»“æœé›†çš„uidå±æ€§å»æŸ¥userè¡¨ã€‚ç”¨äº†è¿™ä¸ªæ ‡ç­¾åSQLè¯­å¥ç¼–å†™å°±ç®€å•å¤šäº†ã€‚

ä¸€å¯¹å¤šæŸ¥è¯¢(@Many)

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ä¸€å¯¹å¤šæ¨¡å‹å’Œç›¸å…³æ¦‚å¿µè¯·çœ‹â€œ9.2.ä¸€å¯¹å¤šæŸ¥è¯¢â€ã€‚

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â éœ€æ±‚ï¼šæŸ¥è¯¢æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªç”¨æˆ·å’Œè¯¥ç”¨æˆ·çš„æ‰€æœ‰è®¢å•ã€‚

  • åœ¨Userå®ä½“ä¸­å¢åŠ å±æ€§å’Œå…¶Getterã€Setterå’ŒtoStringæ–¹æ³•
//æè¿°çš„æ˜¯å½“å‰ç”¨æˆ·å…·æœ‰çš„è®¢å•
private List<Order> orderList;//æ‰€è°“çš„ä¸€å¯¹å¤šä¹Ÿä½“ç°åœ¨è¿™é‡Œ

public List<Order> getOrderList() {
    return orderList;
}

public void setOrderList(List<Order> orderList) {
    this.orderList = orderList;
}
@Override
public String toString() {
    return "User{" +
            "id=" + id +
            ", username='" + username + '\'' +
            ", password='" + password + '\'' +
            ", birthday=" + birthday +
            ", orderList=" + orderList +
            '}';
}
  • åœ¨UserMapperæ¥å£é‡Œé¢æ·»åŠ æ–¹æ³•å’Œæ³¨é‡Š
@Select("select * from user")
public List<User> findUserAndOrderAll();

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ä¸Šé¢åªæ˜¯æŸ¥è¯¢å‡ºäº†æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªç”¨æˆ·ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªç”¨æˆ·å¯¹åº”çš„è®¢å•æˆ‘ä»¬è¿˜è¦æŸ¥å‡ºæ¥ï¼ˆæ ¹æ®uidåœ¨ordersè¡¨æŸ¥è¯¢è¯¥ç”¨æˆ·å¯¹åº”çš„æ‰€æœ‰è®¢å•ï¼‰ã€‚

  • åœ¨OrderMapperæ¥å£é‡Œé¢åˆ›å»ºæ–¹æ³•å’Œæ³¨é‡Š
@Select("select * from orders where uid = #{uid}")
public List<Order> findByUid(int uid);

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â è¿™ä¸¤ä¸ªæŸ¥è¯¢è¿˜èƒ½å®Œæ•´è·å–æˆ‘ä»¬æ‰€éœ€è¦çš„æ‰€æœ‰ä¿¡æ¯ã€‚æ¥ä¸‹æ¥å°±æ˜¯ç»„è£…çš„äº‹äº†ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯å°†ç»“æœé›†çš„å­—æ®µå’Œæˆ‘ä»¬çš„JavaBeanå±æ€§è¿›è¡Œç»‘å®šã€‚

  • @Many ä¸€å¯¹å¤šç»‘å®š
@Select("select * from user")
@Results({
        @Result(id = true,column = "id",property = "id"),
        @Result(column = "username",property = "username"),
        @Result(column = "password",property = "password"),
        @Result(
                property = "orderList",
                column = "id",
                javaType = List.class,
                many = @Many(select = "com.itheima.mapper.OrderMapper.findByUid")
        )
}
)
public List<User> findUserAndOrderAll();
  • æµ‹è¯•
public class MyBatisTest3 {

    private UserMapper mapper;

    @Before
    public void before() throws IOException {
        InputStream resourceAsStream = Resources.getResourceAsStream("sqlMapConfig.xml");
        SqlSessionFactory sqlSessionFactory = new SqlSessionFactoryBuilder().build(resourceAsStream);
        SqlSession sqlSession = sqlSessionFactory.openSession(true);
        mapper = sqlSession.getMapper(UserMapper.class);
    }

    @Test
    public void test3(){
        List<User> userAndOrderAll = mapper.findUserAndOrderAll();
        for (User user : userAndOrderAll) {
            System.out.println(user);
        }
    }

}
  • æµ‹è¯•ç»“æœ
User{id=1, username='lucy', password='123', birthday=Wed Dec 12 00:00:00 CST 2018, orderList=[Order{id=1, ordertime=Wed Dec 12 00:00:00 CST 2018, total=3000.0, user=null}, Order{id=2, ordertime=Wed Dec 12 00:00:00 CST 2018, total=4000.0, user=null}]}
User{id=2, username='haohao', password='123', birthday=Thu Dec 12 00:00:00 CST 2019, orderList=[Order{id=3, ordertime=Wed Dec 12 00:00:00 CST 2018, total=5000.0, user=null}]}

Process finished with exit code 0

å¤šå¯¹å¤šæŸ¥è¯¢(@Many)

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ä¸€å¯¹å¤šæ¨¡å‹å’Œç›¸å…³æ¦‚å¿µè¯·çœ‹â€œ9.3.å¤šå¯¹å¤šæŸ¥è¯¢â€ã€‚

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â éœ€æ±‚ï¼šæŸ¥è¯¢æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªç”¨æˆ·çš„ä¿¡æ¯å’Œè¯¥ç”¨æˆ·å…·æœ‰çš„æ‰€æœ‰è§’è‰²ä¿¡æ¯ã€‚

  • åˆ›å»ºRoleå®ä½“
package com.itheima.domain;

public class Role {

    private int id;
    private String roleName;
    private String roleDesc;

    public int getId() {
        return id;
    }

    public void setId(int id) {
        this.id = id;
    }

    public String getRoleName() {
        return roleName;
    }

    public void setRoleName(String roleName) {
        this.roleName = roleName;
    }

    public String getRoleDesc() {
        return roleDesc;
    }

    public void setRoleDesc(String roleDesc) {
        this.roleDesc = roleDesc;
    }

    @Override
    public String toString() {
        return "Role{" +
                "id=" + id +
                ", roleName='" + roleName + '\'' +
                ", roleDesc='" + roleDesc + '\'' +
                '}';
    }
}
  • ä¿®æ”¹Userï¼ˆList< Role > roleListï¼‰
package com.itheima.domain;

import java.util.Date;
import java.util.List;

public class User {
    private int id;
    private String username;
    private String password;
    private Date birthday;

    //å½“å‰ç”¨æˆ·å…·å¤‡å“ªäº›è§’è‰²
    private List<Role> roleList;

    public List<Role> getRoleList() {
        return roleList;
    }

    public void setRoleList(List<Role> roleList) {
        this.roleList = roleList;
    }

    public Date getBirthday() {
        return birthday;
    }

    public void setBirthday(Date birthday) {
        this.birthday = birthday;
    }

    public int getId() {
        return id;
    }

    public void setId(int id) {
        this.id = id;
    }

    public String getUsername() {
        return username;
    }

    public void setUsername(String username) {
        this.username = username;
    }

    public String getPassword() {
        return password;
    }

    public void setPassword(String password) {
        this.password = password;
    }

    @Override
    public String toString() {
        return "User{" +
                "id=" + id +
                ", username='" + username + '\'' +
                ", password='" + password + '\'' +
                ", birthday=" + birthday +
                ", roleList=" + roleList +
                '}';
    }
}

  • åœ¨UserMapperæ¥å£ä¸­å¢åŠ æ–¹æ³•

    Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â é¦–å…ˆæˆ‘ä»¬è¦çŸ¥é“å¤šå¯¹å¤šæ˜¯æœ‰ä¸‰å¼ è¡¨çš„ï¼Œåœ¨æ³¨è§£å¼€å‘æ—¶æˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥åˆ†ä¸ºä¸¤æ­¥ï¼ˆå› ä¸ºç¬¬ä¸€æ­¥æˆ‘ä»¬è¦æ³¨å…¥Userçš„åŸºæœ¬å±æ€§ï¼Œç¬¬äºŒæ­¥å°±è¦æ³¨å…¥roleListï¼‰ï¼š1.æŸ¥å‡ºæ‰€æœ‰ç”¨æˆ·çš„ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­å°±åŒ…æ‹¬ç”¨æˆ·idï¼›2.ä¸­é—´è¡¨å’Œroleè¡¨è¿›è¡Œå¤šè¡¨æŸ¥è¯¢ï¼ˆä¸­é—´è¡¨roleid=role.idï¼‰ï¼Œå¹¶åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªâ€œç”¨æˆ·id=ä¸­é—´è¡¨useridâ€çš„é™åˆ¶ã€‚

@Select("select * from user")
@Results({
        @Result(id = true,column = "id",property = "id"),
        @Result(column = "username",property = "username"),
        @Result(column = "password",property = "password"),
        @Result(
                property = "roleList",
                column = "id",
                javaType = List.class,
                many = @Many(select = "com.itheima.mapper.RoleMapper.findByUserId")
        )
})
public List<User> findUserAndRoleAll();
  • åˆ›å»ºRoleMapperæ¥å£å’Œæ–¹æ³•
public interface RoleMapper {
    @Select("select * from sys_user_role ur,sys_role r where ur.roleid = r.id and ur.userid = #{uid}")
    public List<Role> findByUserId(int uid);

}
  • æµ‹è¯•
public class MyBatisTest4 {

    private UserMapper mapper;

    @Before
    public void before() throws IOException {
        InputStream resourceAsStream = Resources.getResourceAsStream("sqlMapConfig.xml");
        SqlSessionFactory sqlSessionFactory = new SqlSessionFactoryBuilder().build(resourceAsStream);
        SqlSession sqlSession = sqlSessionFactory.openSession(true);
        mapper = sqlSession.getMapper(UserMapper.class);
    }

    @Test
    public void test4(){
        List<User> userAndOrderAll = mapper.findUserAndRoleAll();
        for (User user : userAndOrderAll) {
            System.out.println(user);
        }
    }

}
  • ç»“æœ
User{id=1, username='lucy', password='123', birthday=Wed Dec 12 00:00:00 CST 2018, roleList=[Role{id=1, roleName='CTO', roleDesc='CTO'}, Role{id=2, roleName='COO', roleDesc='COO'}]}
User{id=2, username='haohao', password='123', birthday=Thu Dec 12 00:00:00 CST 2019, roleList=[Role{id=1, roleName='CTO', roleDesc='CTO'}, Role{id=2, roleName='COO', roleDesc='COO'}]}

Process finished with exit code 0

SSMæ¡†æ¶æ•´åˆ

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Mybatisæ˜¯ç¬¬ä¸‰æ–¹æ¡†æ¶ï¼Œå®ƒæœ¬èº«ä¸å±äºSpringç”Ÿæ€ç³»ç»Ÿå½“ä¸­çš„æˆå‘˜ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥è¦è¿›è¡Œé¢å¤–çš„æ•´åˆã€‚Springå’ŒSpringMVCçš„æ•´åˆåœ¨â€œå.Springã€SpringMVCç»¼åˆç»ƒä¹ â€çš„ç¯å¢ƒæ­å»ºä¸­æœ‰è¿›è¡Œè¯´æ˜ã€‚

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å…¶å®æˆ‘ä»¬ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ä¸ç”¨è¿›è¡Œæ‰€è°“çš„æ•´åˆï¼Œä½¿ç”¨æˆ‘ä»¬å‰é¢æ‰€æœ‰çš„æ“ä½œï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å°±å¯ä»¥å®Œæˆâ€œåŸå§‹çš„æ•´åˆâ€äº†ã€‚åœ¨å‰é¢åˆ°æ­¤ä¸ºæ­¢ï¼Œè¿™ä¸‰ä¸ªæ¡†æ¶å„å¸å…¶èŒï¼Œå„è‡ªè´Ÿè´£æŸä¸€å±‚çš„èŒè´£ï¼šMybatisæ˜¯è´Ÿè´£daoå±‚çš„åŠŸèƒ½ï¼›SpringMVCè´Ÿè´£webå±‚ï¼›Springå°±ç›¸å½“äºç²˜åˆå‰‚å°†è´Ÿè´£ç®¡ç†ä¸‰å±‚äº§ç”Ÿçš„Beanï¼›SpringMVCè´Ÿè´£webå±‚ï¼Œå½“ç”¨æˆ·è¯·æ±‚æ—¶è´Ÿè´£å°è£…æ•°æ®å’ŒæŒ‡æ´¾è§†å›¾ã€‚ä½†æ˜¯springè·ŸMybatiså¥‘åˆåº¦ä¸æ˜¯å¤ªé«˜ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥è¦è¿›è¡Œé¢å¤–è¿›è¡Œæ•´åˆã€‚

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â æ‰€ä»¥æœ¬ç« å…ˆç”¨åŸå§‹çš„æ•´åˆæ–¹å¼ï¼Œç„¶åæ‰¾å‡ºä¸è¶³ï¼Œæœ€åè§£å†³è¿™äº›é—®é¢˜ã€‚ä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯è§£å†³äº†ä»¥å‰åŸå§‹æ•´åˆæ–¹å¼çš„ä¸è¶³ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬çœŸæ­£çš„SSMæ•´åˆä¹Ÿå°±å®Œæˆäº†ã€‚

ä¸€.åŸå§‹æ•´åˆ(å‡†å¤‡å·¥ä½œ)

1.1.æ•°æ®åº“å’Œaccountè¡¨çš„åˆ›å»º

create database ssm;
create table account(
    id int primary key auto_increment,
    name varchar(100),
    money double(7,2)
);

1.3.ç¼–å†™å®ä½“ç±»domain.Account

package com.itheima.domain;

public class Account {

    private Integer id;
    private String name;
    private Double money;

    public Integer getId() {
        return id;
    }

    public void setId(Integer id) {
        this.id = id;
    }

    public String getName() {
        return name;
    }

    public void setName(String name) {
        this.name = name;
    }

    public Double getMoney() {
        return money;
    }

    public void setMoney(Double money) {
        this.money = money;
    }
}

1.4.ç¼–å†™Mapperæ¥å£mapper.AccountMapper

package com.itheima.mapper;
public interface AccountMapper {

    public void save(Account account);

    public List<Account> findAll();

}

1.5.ç¼–å†™serviceæ¥å£AccountServiceå’Œå…¶å®ç°ç±»

package com.itheima.service;
public interface AccountService {

    public void save(Account account);

    public List<Account> findAll();

}
import com.itheima.service.AccountService;
public class AccountServiceImpl implements AccountService {

    @Override
    public void save(Account account) {
        
    }

    @Override
    public List<Account> findAll() {
        return null;
    }
}

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å®ç°ç±»AccountServiceImplé‡Œé¢çš„æ–¹æ³•å…ˆä¸å†™ï¼Œå…ˆæŠŠæ•´ä½“æ¡†æ¶æ­èµ·æ¥ã€‚åé¢å†è¡¥å…·ä½“çš„æ–¹æ³•ã€‚

  • Web.xmlæ–‡ä»¶ï¼šweb.xml

    â€‹ è¦æŠŠé»˜è®¤çš„ç‰ˆæœ¬æ”¹æˆ2.5æˆ–ä»¥ä¸Šï¼Œå¹¶è¿›è¡Œä»¥ä¸‹é…ç½®ï¼Œå¦‚æœå¯¹ç›¸å…³é…ç½®çš„æ„ä¹‰ä¸ç†Ÿæ‚‰å¯ä»¥åˆ°Springã€SpringMVCç»¼åˆç»ƒä¹ çš„ç»ƒä¹ ç¯å¢ƒæ­å»ºæˆ–å…¶ä»–å‰é¢æåˆ°çš„ç›¸å…³éƒ¨åˆ†è¿›è¡ŒæŸ¥çœ‹ï¼š

         xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
         xsi:schemaLocation="http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee/web-app_4_0.xsd"
         version="4.0">

  <!--Springç›‘å¬å™¨-å’ŒSpringç»‘å®š(è·å–ApplicationContextå¯¹è±¡)-->

  <!--SpringMVCçš„å‰ç«¯æ§åˆ¶å™¨-å’ŒSpringMVCç»‘å®š-->

  • æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶ï¼šlog4j.properties
### direct log messages to stdout ###
log4j.appender.stdout=org.apache.log4j.ConsoleAppender
log4j.appender.stdout.Target=System.out
log4j.appender.stdout.layout=org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout
log4j.appender.stdout.layout.ConversionPattern=%d{ABSOLUTE} %5p %c{1}:%L - %m%n

### direct messages to file mylog.log ###
log4j.appender.file=org.apache.log4j.FileAppender
log4j.appender.file.File=c:/mylog.log
log4j.appender.file.layout=org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout
log4j.appender.file.layout.ConversionPattern=%d{ABSOLUTE} %5p %c{1}:%L - %m%n

### set log levels - for more verbose logging change 'info' to 'debug' ###

log4j.rootLogger=all, stdout

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ç°åœ¨ç¯å¢ƒçš„æ¶å­å°±æ­å»ºå¥½äº†ï¼Œä¸‹é¢å°±æŠŠå†…éƒ¨æ²¡å†™çš„ä¸œè¥¿ç­‰å¡«å……ä¸€ä¸‹ï¼Œè®©å®ƒè·‘èµ·æ¥ã€‚

äºŒ.é¡¹ç›®ç»†èŠ‚å¡«å……

2.1.é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰Mybatis

  • æ ¸å¿ƒæ–‡ä»¶ï¼šsqlMapConfig.xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<!DOCTYPE configuration
        PUBLIC "-//mybatis.org//DTD Config 3.0//EN"
        "http://mybatis.org/dtd/mybatis-3-config.dtd">
<configuration>

    <!--åŠ è½½propertiesæ–‡ä»¶-->
    <properties resource="jdbc.properties"></properties>

    <!--å®šä¹‰åˆ«å-->
    <typeAliases>
        <!--<typeAlias type="com.itheima.domain.Account" alias="account"></typeAlias>-->
        <package name="com.itheima.domain"></package><!--è‡ªåŠ¨ç»™è¿™ä¸ªåŒ…ä¸‹é¢æ‰€æœ‰çš„ç±»å–ä¸€ä¸ªåˆ«å-->
    </typeAliases>

    <!--ç¯å¢ƒ-->
    <environments default="developement">
        <environment id="developement">
            <transactionManager type="JDBC"></transactionManager>
            <dataSource type="POOLED">
                <property name="driver" value="${jdbc.driver}"></property>
                <property name="url" value="${jdbc.url}"></property>
                <property name="username" value="${jdbc.username}"></property>
                <property name="password" value="${jdbc.password}"></property>
            </dataSource>
        </environment>
    </environments>

    <!--åŠ è½½æ˜ å°„-->
    <mappers>
        <!--<mapper resource="com/itheima/mapper/AccountMapper.xml"></mapper>-->
        <package name="com.itheima.mapper"></package>
        <!--å°†resourcesä¸‹çš„è¿™ä¸ªcom.itheima.mapperåŒ…ä¸‹çš„æ‰€æœ‰æ˜ å°„æ–‡ä»¶éƒ½åŠ è¿›æ¥-->
    </mappers>


</configuration>
  • æ˜ å°„æ–‡ä»¶ï¼šAccountMapper.xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<!DOCTYPE mapper
        PUBLIC "-//mybatis.org//DTD Mapper 3.0//EN"
        "http://mybatis.org/dtd/mybatis-3-mapper.dtd">
<mapper namespace="com.itheima.mapper.AccountMapper">
    <insert id="save" parameterType="account">
        insert into account values(#{id},#{name},#{money})
    </insert>
    <select id="findAll" resultType="account">
        select * from account
    </select>
</mapper>

ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰Springå’ŒSpringMVC

  • srping-mvc.xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
       xmlns:mvc="http://www.springframework.org/schema/mvc"
       xmlns:context="http://www.springframework.org/schema/context"
       xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
       xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans
http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans.xsd
http://www.springframework.org/schema/mvc
http://www.springframework.org/schema/mvc/spring-mvc.xsd
http://www.springframework.org/schema/context
http://www.springframework.org/schema/context/spring-context.xsd">

    <!--ç»„ä»¶æ‰«æ  ä¸»è¦æ‰«æcontroller-->
    <context:component-scan base-package="com.itheima.controller"></context:component-scan>
    <!--é…ç½®mvcæ³¨è§£é©±åŠ¨-->
    <mvc:annotation-driven></mvc:annotation-driven>
    <!--å†…éƒ¨èµ„æºè§†å›¾è§£æå™¨-->
    <bean id="resourceViewResolver" class="org.springframework.web.servlet.view.InternalResourceViewResolver">
        <property name="prefix" value="/WEB-INF/pages/"></property>
        <property name="suffix" value=".jsp"></property>
    </bean>
    <!--å¼€å‘é™æ€èµ„æºè®¿é—®æƒé™-->
    <mvc:default-servlet-handler></mvc:default-servlet-handler>

</beans>
  • applicationContext.xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
       xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
       xmlns:aop="http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop"
       xmlns:tx="http://www.springframework.org/schema/tx"
       xmlns:context="http://www.springframework.org/schema/context"
       xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans
http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans.xsd
http://www.springframework.org/schema/tx
http://www.springframework.org/schema/tx/spring-tx.xsd
http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop
http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop/spring-aop.xsd
http://www.springframework.org/schema/context
http://www.springframework.org/schema/context/spring-context.xsd">

    <!--ç»„ä»¶æ‰«æ æ‰«æserviceå’Œmapper-->
    <context:component-scan base-package="com.itheima">
        <!--æ’é™¤controllerçš„æ‰«æ,è®©springMVCå»æ‰«æ-->
        <context:exclude-filter type="annotation" expression="org.springframework.stereotype.Controller"></context:exclude-filter>
    </context:component-scan>


</beans>

ï¼ˆ3ï¼‰web.xml

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<web-app xmlns="http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee"
         xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
         xsi:schemaLocation="http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee/web-app_4_0.xsd"
         version="4.0">

  <!--Springç›‘å¬å™¨-å’ŒSpringç»‘å®š(è·å–ApplicationContextå¯¹è±¡)-->
  <context-param>
    <param-name>contextConfigLocation</param-name>
    <param-value>classpath:applicationContext.xml</param-value>
  </context-param>
  <listener>
    <listener-class>org.springframework.web.context.ContextLoaderListener</listener-class>
  </listener>

  <!--SpringMVCçš„å‰ç«¯æ§åˆ¶å™¨-å’ŒSpringMVCç»‘å®š-->
  <servlet>
    <servlet-name>DispatcherServlet</servlet-name>
    <servlet-class>org.springframework.web.servlet.DispatcherServlet</servlet-class>
    <init-param>
      <param-name>contextConfigLocation</param-name>
      <param-value>classpath:spring-mvc.xml</param-value>
    </init-param>
    <load-on-startup>1</load-on-startup>
  </servlet>
  <servlet-mapping>
    <servlet-name>DispatcherServlet</servlet-name>
    <url-pattern>/</url-pattern>
  </servlet-mapping>

  <!--è§£å†³ä¸­æ–‡ä¹±ç çš„è¿‡æ»¤å™¨-->
  <filter>
    <filter-name>CharacterEncodingFilter</filter-name>
    <filter-class>org.springframework.web.filter.CharacterEncodingFilter</filter-class>
    <init-param>
      <param-name>encoding</param-name>
      <param-value>UTF-8</param-value>
    </init-param>
  </filter>
  <filter-mapping>
    <filter-name>CharacterEncodingFilter</filter-name>
    <url-pattern>/*</url-pattern>
  </filter-mapping>

</web-app>

2.2.ä¸šåŠ¡ä»£ç 

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰save.jsp

<%@ page contentType="text/html;charset=UTF-8" language="java" %>
<html>
<head>
    <title>Title</title>
</head>
<body>
    <h1>æ·»åŠ è´¦æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯è¡¨å•</h1>
    <form name="accountFrom" action="${pageContext.request.contextPath}/account/save" method="post">
        è´¦æˆ·åç§°ï¼š<input type="text" name="name"><br/>
        è´¦æˆ·é‡‘é¢ï¼š<input type="text" name="money"><br/>
        <input type="submit" value="ä¿å­˜"><br/>
    </form>
</body>
</html>

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â çœ‹ä¸Šé¢çš„é¡µé¢æˆ‘ä»¬çŸ¥é“ï¼Œè¯¥åœ°å€å’Œæ–¹æ³•éƒ½è¿˜æ²¡é…ç½®å’Œç¼–å†™ï¼Œä¸‹é¢è¿›è¡Œç¼–å†™ã€‚

  • AccountController
package com.itheima.controller;

import com.itheima.domain.Account;
import com.itheima.service.AccountService;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Controller;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestMapping;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.ResponseBody;
import org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView;

import java.util.List;

@Controller
@RequestMapping("/account")
public class AccountController {

    @Autowired
    private AccountService accountService;/*å˜é‡çˆ†çº¢è¡¨ç¤ºå…¶å®ç°ç±»è¿˜æ²¡é…ç½®Bean*/

    //ä¿å­˜æˆåŠŸåæ‰“å°å­—ç¬¦ä¸²
    @RequestMapping("/save")
    @ResponseBody//è¡¨ç¤ºè¿”å›çš„æ˜¯å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼Œè€Œä¸æ˜¯é¡µé¢
    public String save(Account account){
        accountService.save(account);
        return "æ•°æ®ä¿å­˜æˆåŠŸ";
    }

    //æŸ¥è¯¢å®Œæ¯•åæŠŠæ•°æ®æ”¾åˆ°åŸŸå½“ä¸­ï¼Œç„¶åè½¬å‘åˆ°æŸä¸ªè§†å›¾
    public ModelAndView findAll(){
        List<Account> accountList = accountService.findAll();
        ModelAndView modelAndView = new ModelAndView();
        modelAndView.addObject("accountList", accountList);
        modelAndView.setViewName("accountList");
        return modelAndView;
    }

}
  • AccountServiceImpl
package com.itheima.service.impl;

import com.itheima.domain.Account;
import com.itheima.mapper.AccountMapper;
import com.itheima.service.AccountService;
import org.apache.ibatis.io.Resources;
import org.apache.ibatis.session.SqlSession;
import org.apache.ibatis.session.SqlSessionFactory;
import org.apache.ibatis.session.SqlSessionFactoryBuilder;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.InputStream;
import java.util.List;
@Service("accountService")
public class AccountServiceImpl implements AccountService {

    @Override
    public void save(Account account) {
        //éœ€è¦mapper
        try {
            InputStream resourceAsStream = Resources.getResourceAsStream("sqlMapConfig.xml");
            SqlSessionFactory sqlSessionFactory = new SqlSessionFactoryBuilder().build(resourceAsStream);
            SqlSession sqlSession = sqlSessionFactory.openSession();
            AccountMapper mapper = sqlSession.getMapper(AccountMapper.class);
            mapper.save(account);
            sqlSession.commit();
            sqlSession.close();
        } catch (IOException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    @Override
    public List<Account> findAll() {
        try {
            InputStream resourceAsStream = Resources.getResourceAsStream("sqlMapConfig.xml");
            SqlSessionFactory sqlSessionFactory = new SqlSessionFactoryBuilder().build(resourceAsStream);
            SqlSession sqlSession = sqlSessionFactory.openSession();
            AccountMapper mapper = sqlSession.getMapper(AccountMapper.class);
            List<Account> accountList = mapper.findAll();
            sqlSession.close();
            return accountList;
        } catch (IOException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
        return null;
    }
}

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ç°åœ¨åŸºæœ¬çš„ä¸šåŠ¡ä»£ç å†™å®Œäº†ï¼Œå°±è¦è¿›è¡Œæµ‹è¯•äº†ã€‚

  • æµ‹è¯•

1.å¯åŠ¨æˆåŠŸ

2.è®¿é—®save.jspå¹¶æäº¤å¦‚ä¸‹ä¿¡æ¯

3.é¡µé¢æ˜¾ç¤ºç»“æœ

4.æ•°æ®è¡¨å†…å®¹

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â è¯´æ˜æ•°æ®æ’å…¥è¿›æ•°æ®åº“å»äº†ï¼Œè¿”å›é¡µé¢çš„å­—ç¬¦å‡ºç°ä¸­æ–‡ä¹±ç ã€‚å‰é¢åœ¨web.xmlè®¾ç½®çš„ä¸­æ–‡ä¹±ç è¿‡æ»¤å™¨æ˜¯è®¾ç½®çš„æ˜¯è¯·æ±‚æ•°æ®çš„ç¼–ç ï¼Œä¿®æ”¹AccountControlleré‡Œçš„saveæ–¹æ³•ä¸Šçš„RequestMappingæ³¨è§£ï¼š

@RequestMapping(value = "/save",produces = "text/html;charset=UTF-8")

5.é‡å¯é¡¹ç›®å¹¶æäº¤æ•°æ®åï¼Œé¡µé¢æ˜¾ç¤ºæ­£å¸¸

ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰accountList.jsp

1.åœ¨AccountControlleré‡Œçš„findAllæ–¹æ³•ä¸Šçš„æ·»åŠ RequestMappingæ³¨è§£

@RequestMapping("/findAll")

2.åœ¨æ˜¾ç¤ºé¡µé¢accountList.jspï¼Œå¼•å…¥JSTLï¼Œå¹¶å±•ç¤ºæŸ¥è¯¢åˆ°çš„æ•°æ®

<%@ page contentType="text/html;charset=UTF-8" language="java" %>
<%@taglib prefix="c" uri="http://java.sun.com/jsp/jstl/core" %>
<html>
<head>
    <title>Title</title>
</head>
<body>
    <h1>å±•ç¤ºè´¦æˆ·æ•°æ®åˆ—è¡¨</h1>
    <table>
        <tr>
            <th>è´¦æˆ·id</th>
            <th>è´¦æˆ·åç§°</th>
            <th>è´¦æˆ·é‡‘é¢</th>
        </tr>

        <c:forEach items="${accountList}" var="account">
            <tr>
                <td>${account.id}</td>
                <td>${account.name}</td>
                <td>${account.money}</td>
            </tr>
        </c:forEach>

    </table>
</body>
</html>

  • æµ‹è¯•

    ç›´æ¥è®¿é—®è¯¥æŸ¥è¯¢æ–¹æ³•http://localhost:8080/ssm_up/account/findAll

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â åˆ°æ­¤çœ‹åˆ°ä¸¤ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•éƒ½æ˜¯å¯ä»¥æ­£å¸¸ä½¿ç”¨çš„ï¼Œè¿™ä¹Ÿè¯´æ˜åŸå§‹çš„æ•´åˆæ–¹å¼å°±æ˜¯å¦‚æ­¤äº†ï¼Œä¸è¿‡è¿™ç§æ–¹å¼è¿˜æ˜¯å­˜åœ¨å¼Šç«¯çš„ï¼Œä¸‹é¢å°±è¿›è¡Œåˆ†æå¹¶è¿›è¡Œæ•´åˆã€‚

ä¸‰.ssmæ•´åˆæ¨¡æ¿

1.åˆ†æ

  • ä¸šåŠ¡å±‚
package com.itheima.service.impl;

@Service("accountService")
public class AccountServiceImpl implements AccountService {

    @Override
    public void save(Account account) {
        //éœ€è¦mapper
        try {
            InputStream resourceAsStream = Resources.getResourceAsStream("sqlMapConfig.xml");
            SqlSessionFactory sqlSessionFactory = new SqlSessionFactoryBuilder().build(resourceAsStream);
            SqlSession sqlSession = sqlSessionFactory.openSession();
            AccountMapper mapper = sqlSession.getMapper(AccountMapper.class);
            mapper.save(account);
            sqlSession.commit();
            sqlSession.close();
        } catch (IOException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    @Override
    public List<Account> findAll() {
        try {
            InputStream resourceAsStream = Resources.getResourceAsStream("sqlMapConfig.xml");
            SqlSessionFactory sqlSessionFactory = new SqlSessionFactoryBuilder().build(resourceAsStream);
            SqlSession sqlSession = sqlSessionFactory.openSession();
            AccountMapper mapper = sqlSession.getMapper(AccountMapper.class);
            List<Account> accountList = mapper.findAll();
            sqlSession.close();
            return accountList;
        } catch (IOException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
        return null;
    }
}

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â æˆ‘ä»¬å…ˆæ¥ä¸Šé¢ä¸šåŠ¡å±‚çš„ä»£ç ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥çœ‹åˆ°sqlSessionFactoryæ¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•é‡Œéƒ½è¦åˆ›å»ºæ¥åˆ›å»ºMapperã€‚åœ¨Serviceå±‚ä¸­æˆ‘ä»¬æ˜¯éœ€è¦æ“ä½œdaoå±‚çš„ï¼Œå³æ‰€ä»¥sqlSessionFactoryå’ŒMapperéƒ½æ˜¯éœ€è¦çš„ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯æ²¡å¿…è¦å¤šæ¬¡åˆ›å»ºï¼Œç›´æ¥äº¤ç»™Spring IOCå®¹å™¨ï¼Œç„¶åæ³¨å…¥å³å¯ã€‚

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å¹¶ä¸”æ¯æ¬¡è¿˜è¦è¿›è¡Œäº‹åŠ¡çš„æ§åˆ¶ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”å‰é¢Mybatisé‡Œé¢ä¹Ÿæ²¡æœ‰æåˆ°å¦‚ä½•è¿›è¡Œäº‹åŠ¡æ§åˆ¶ã€‚æˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨å‰é¢springæä¾›çš„å£°æ˜å¼äº‹åŠ¡æ§åˆ¶ï¼Œå°±ä¸ç”¨è‡ªå·±åœ¨è¿‡æ»¤å™¨æˆ–å…¶ä»–åœ°æ–¹è¿›è¡Œtryâ€¦â€¦catchâ€¦â€¦äº†ã€‚

2.Springæ•´åˆMybatis

  • åœ¨resourcesæ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ä¸‹åˆ›å»ºsqlMapConfig-spring.xmlï¼ˆåŸæ¥çš„sqlMapConfig.xmlå°±ä¸è¦äº†ï¼‰
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<!DOCTYPE configuration
        PUBLIC "-//mybatis.org//DTD Config 3.0//EN"
        "http://mybatis.org/dtd/mybatis-3-config.dtd">
<configuration>

    <!--å®šä¹‰åˆ«å-->
    <typeAliases>
        <!--<typeAlias type="com.itheima.domain.Account" alias="account"></typeAlias>-->
        <package name="com.itheima.domain"></package><!--è‡ªåŠ¨ç»™è¿™ä¸ªåŒ…ä¸‹é¢æ‰€æœ‰çš„ç±»å–ä¸€ä¸ªåˆ«å-->
    </typeAliases>

</configuration>
  • åœ¨applicationContext.xmlä¸­é…ç½®SqlSessionFactoryBeanå¹¶æ³¨å…¥ç›¸å…³å‚æ•°åŒæ—¶æ‰«æmapperæ‰€åœ¨çš„åŒ…,ä¸ºmapperåˆ›å»ºå®ç°ç±»
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
       xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
       xmlns:aop="http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop"
       xmlns:tx="http://www.springframework.org/schema/tx"
       xmlns:context="http://www.springframework.org/schema/context"
       xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans
http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans.xsd
http://www.springframework.org/schema/tx
http://www.springframework.org/schema/tx/spring-tx.xsd
http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop
http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop/spring-aop.xsd
http://www.springframework.org/schema/context
http://www.springframework.org/schema/context/spring-context.xsd">

    <!--ç»„ä»¶æ‰«æ æ‰«æserviceå’Œmapper-->
    <context:component-scan base-package="com.itheima">
        <!--æ’é™¤controllerçš„æ‰«æ,è®©springMVCå»æ‰«æ-->
        <context:exclude-filter type="annotation" expression="org.springframework.stereotype.Controller"></context:exclude-filter>
    </context:component-scan>

    <!--åŠ è½½propetiesæ–‡ä»¶-->
    <context:property-placeholder location="classpath:jdbc.properties"></context:property-placeholder>

    <!--é…ç½®æ•°æ®æºä¿¡æ¯-->
    <bean id="dataSource" class="com.mchange.v2.c3p0.ComboPooledDataSource">
        <property name="driverClass" value="${jdbc.driver}"></property>
        <property name="jdbcUrl" value="${jdbc.url}"></property>
        <property name="user" value="${jdbc.username}"></property>
        <property name="password" value="${jdbc.password}"></property>
    </bean>

    <!--é…ç½®sessionFactory-->
    <bean id="sqlSessionFactory" class="org.mybatis.spring.SqlSessionFactoryBean">
        <!--å› ä¸ºæ¶‰åŠåˆ°äº‹åŠ¡çš„æäº¤å’Œè¿æ¥çš„å…³é—­ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥éœ€è¦æ•°æ®æº-->
        <property name="dataSource" ref="dataSource"></property>
        <!--åŠ è½½mybatisæ ¸å¿ƒæ–‡ä»¶-->
        <property name="configLocation" value="classpath:sqlMapConfig-spring.xml"></property>
    </bean>

    <!--æ‰«æmapperæ‰€åœ¨çš„åŒ… ä¸ºmapperåˆ›å»ºå®ç°ç±»(åœ¨serviceå°±å¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥æ³¨å…¥mapperæ¥å£äº†)-->
    <bean class="org.mybatis.spring.mapper.MapperScannerConfigurer">
        <property name="basePackage" value="com.itheima.mapper"></property>
    </bean>

</beans>
  • ä¿®æ”¹serviceä»£ç 
@Service("accountService")
public class AccountServiceImpl implements AccountService {

    @Autowired
    private AccountMapper accountMapper;

    @Override
    public void save(Account account) {
        accountMapper.save(account);
    }

    @Override
    public List<Account> findAll() {
        return accountMapper.findAll();
    }
}

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ç»æµ‹è¯•ä¸Šé¢çš„æ­¥éª¤æ˜¯å¯ä»¥æˆåŠŸè¿è¡Œçš„ã€‚ç°åœ¨å°±å·®äº‹åŠ¡çš„æ§åˆ¶äº†ã€‚

3.äº‹åŠ¡æ§åˆ¶

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å…¶å®å°±æ˜¯ä½¿ç”¨å‰é¢springé‡Œå­¦çš„å£°æ˜å¼äº‹åŠ¡æ§åˆ¶ï¼Œåœ¨applicationContext.xmlé‡Œé¢é…ç½®DataSourceTransactionManagerçš„beanã€äº‹åŠ¡å¢å¼ºå’Œäº‹åŠ¡çš„aopç»‡å…¥

<!--å£°æ˜å¼äº‹åŠ¡æ§åˆ¶-->
<!--å¹³å°äº‹åŠ¡ç®¡ç†å™¨-->
<bean id="transactionManager" class="org.springframework.jdbc.datasource.DataSourceTransactionManager">
    <property name="dataSource" ref="dataSource"></property>
</bean>

<!--é…ç½®äº‹åŠ¡å¢å¼º-->
<tx:advice id="txAdvice">
    <tx:attributes>
        <tx:method name="*"/>
    </tx:attributes>
</tx:advice>

<!--äº‹åŠ¡çš„aopç»‡å…¥-->
<aop:config>
    <aop:advisor advice-ref="txAdvice" pointcut="execution(* com.itheima.service.impl.*.*(..))"></aop:advisor>
</aop:config>
  • æµ‹è¯•

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰å½•å…¥å¦‚ä¸‹æ•°æ®

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ç»“æœï¼š

ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰åœ¨saveæ–¹æ³•é‡Œé¢åŠ ä¸ªé”™è¯¯å†æµ‹è¯•

@Override
public void save(Account account) {
    accountMapper.save(account);
    int i=10/0;//åŠ ä¸ªé”™è¯¯
}

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â é¡µé¢æ˜¾ç¤ºç»“æœï¼š

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â æ•°æ®åº“æ²¡æœ‰å½•å…¥æ•°æ®ï¼š

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ä»¥ä¸Šæµ‹è¯•è¯´æ˜äº‹åŠ¡ç®¡ç†ç”Ÿæ•ˆäº†ï¼Œå› ä¸ºåœ¨saveæ–¹æ³•é‡Œå‘æ•°æ®åº“æ’å…¥æ•°æ®å®Œæˆåï¼Œç»§ç»­æ‰§è¡ŒæŠ¥é™¤é›¶é”™è¯¯ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æ•°æ®åº“è¿›è¡Œå›æ»šï¼Œå–æ¶ˆäº†æ•°æ®çš„å½•å…¥ã€‚

4.æœ€ç»ˆæ¨¡æ¿

4.1.ç›®å½•

pom.xml

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â è¿™é‡Œåªç»™å‡ºç›¸å…³ä¾èµ–åŒ…çš„åæ ‡

<dependencies>
  <!--springç›¸å…³-->
  <dependency>
    <groupId>org.springframework</groupId>
    <artifactId>spring-context</artifactId>
    <version>5.0.5.RELEASE</version>
  </dependency>
  <dependency>
    <groupId>org.aspectj</groupId>
    <artifactId>aspectjweaver</artifactId>
    <version>1.8.7</version>
  </dependency>
  <dependency>
    <groupId>org.springframework</groupId>
    <artifactId>spring-jdbc</artifactId>
    <version>5.0.5.RELEASE</version>
  </dependency>
  <dependency>
    <groupId>org.springframework</groupId>
    <artifactId>spring-tx</artifactId>
    <version>5.0.5.RELEASE</version>
  </dependency>

    <version>5.0.5.RELEASE</version>
  </dependency>

web.xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<web-app xmlns="http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee"
         xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
         xsi:schemaLocation="http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee/web-app_4_0.xsd"
         version="4.0">

  <!--Springç›‘å¬å™¨-å’ŒSpringç»‘å®š(è·å–ApplicationContextå¯¹è±¡)-->
  <context-param>
    <param-name>contextConfigLocation</param-name>
    <param-value>classpath:applicationContext.xml</param-value>
  </context-param>
  <listener>
    <listener-class>org.springframework.web.context.ContextLoaderListener</listener-class>
  </listener>

  <!--SpringMVCçš„å‰ç«¯æ§åˆ¶å™¨-å’ŒSpringMVCç»‘å®š-->
  <servlet>
    <servlet-name>DispatcherServlet</servlet-name>
    <servlet-class>org.springframework.web.servlet.DispatcherServlet</servlet-class>
    <init-param>
      <param-name>contextConfigLocation</param-name>
      <param-value>classpath:spring-mvc.xml</param-value>
    </init-param>
    <load-on-startup>1</load-on-startup>
  </servlet>
  <servlet-mapping>
    <servlet-name>DispatcherServlet</servlet-name>
    <url-pattern>/</url-pattern>
  </servlet-mapping>

  <!--è§£å†³ä¸­æ–‡ä¹±ç çš„è¿‡æ»¤å™¨-->
  <filter>
    <filter-name>CharacterEncodingFilter</filter-name>
    <filter-class>org.springframework.web.filter.CharacterEncodingFilter</filter-class>
    <init-param>
      <param-name>encoding</param-name>
      <param-value>UTF-8</param-value>
    </init-param>
  </filter>
  <filter-mapping>
    <filter-name>CharacterEncodingFilter</filter-name>
    <url-pattern>/**</url-pattern>
  </filter-mapping>

</web-app>

4.2.ä»£ç 

controller
package com.itheima.controller;

import com.itheima.domain.Account;
import com.itheima.service.AccountService;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Controller;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestMapping;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.ResponseBody;
import org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView;

import java.util.List;

@Controller
@RequestMapping("/account")
public class AccountController {

    @Autowired
    private AccountService accountService;/*å˜é‡çˆ†çº¢è¡¨ç¤ºå…¶å®ç°ç±»è¿˜æ²¡é…ç½®Bean*/

    //ä¿å­˜æˆåŠŸåæ‰“å°å­—ç¬¦ä¸²
    @RequestMapping(value = "/save",produces = "text/html;charset=UTF-8")
    @ResponseBody//è¡¨ç¤ºè¿”å›çš„æ˜¯å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼Œè€Œä¸æ˜¯é¡µé¢
    public String save(Account account){
        accountService.save(account);
        return "æ•°æ®ä¿å­˜æˆåŠŸ";
    }

    //æŸ¥è¯¢å®Œæ¯•åæŠŠæ•°æ®æ”¾åˆ°åŸŸå½“ä¸­ï¼Œç„¶åè½¬å‘åˆ°æŸä¸ªè§†å›¾
    @RequestMapping("/findAll")
    public ModelAndView findAll(){
        List<Account> accountList = accountService.findAll();
        ModelAndView modelAndView = new ModelAndView();
        modelAndView.addObject("accountList", accountList);
        modelAndView.setViewName("accountList");
        return modelAndView;
    }

}
domain
package com.itheima.domain;

public class Account {

    private Integer id;
    private String name;
    private Double money;

    public Integer getId() {
        return id;
    }

    public void setId(Integer id) {
        this.id = id;
    }

    public String getName() {
        return name;
    }

    public void setName(String name) {
        this.name = name;
    }

    public Double getMoney() {
        return money;
    }

    public void setMoney(Double money) {
        this.money = money;
    }
}
mapper
package com.itheima.mapper;

import com.itheima.domain.Account;

import java.util.List;

public interface AccountMapper {

    public void save(Account account);

    public List<Account> findAll();

}
service
package com.itheima.service;

import com.itheima.domain.Account;

import java.util.List;

public interface AccountService {

    public void save(Account account);

    public List<Account> findAll();

}

service.impl

package com.itheima.service.impl;

import com.itheima.domain.Account;
import com.itheima.mapper.AccountMapper;
import com.itheima.service.AccountService;
import org.apache.ibatis.io.Resources;
import org.apache.ibatis.session.SqlSession;
import org.apache.ibatis.session.SqlSessionFactory;
import org.apache.ibatis.session.SqlSessionFactoryBuilder;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.InputStream;
import java.util.List;
@Service("accountService")
public class AccountServiceImpl implements AccountService {

    @Autowired
    private AccountMapper accountMapper;

    @Override
    public void save(Account account) {
        accountMapper.save(account);
    }

    @Override
    public List<Account> findAll() {
        return accountMapper.findAll();
    }
}

4.3.resources

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ä½†æ˜¯sqlMapConfig.xmlæ˜¯ä¸éœ€è¦çš„äº†ï¼Œå› ä¸ºå·²ç»sqlMapConfig-spring.xmlå·²ç»å°†springå’ŒMybatisæ•´åˆäº†ã€‚

æ˜ å°„æ–‡ä»¶(AccountMapper.xml)
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<!DOCTYPE mapper
        PUBLIC "-//mybatis.org//DTD Mapper 3.0//EN"
        "http://mybatis.org/dtd/mybatis-3-mapper.dtd">
<mapper namespace="com.itheima.mapper.AccountMapper">
    <insert id="save" parameterType="account">
        insert into account values(#{id},#{name},#{money})
    </insert>
    <select id="findAll" resultType="account">
        select * from account
    </select>
</mapper>
springé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶(applicationContext.xml)
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
       xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
       xmlns:aop="http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop"
       xmlns:tx="http://www.springframework.org/schema/tx"
       xmlns:context="http://www.springframework.org/schema/context"
       xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans
http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans.xsd
http://www.springframework.org/schema/tx
http://www.springframework.org/schema/tx/spring-tx.xsd
http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop
http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop/spring-aop.xsd
http://www.springframework.org/schema/context
http://www.springframework.org/schema/context/spring-context.xsd">

    <!--ç»„ä»¶æ‰«æ æ‰«æserviceå’Œmapper-->
    <context:component-scan base-package="com.itheima">
        <!--æ’é™¤controllerçš„æ‰«æ,è®©springMVCå»æ‰«æ-->
        <context:exclude-filter type="annotation" expression="org.springframework.stereotype.Controller"></context:exclude-filter>
    </context:component-scan>

    <!--åŠ è½½propetiesæ–‡ä»¶-->
    <context:property-placeholder location="classpath:jdbc.properties"></context:property-placeholder>

    <!--é…ç½®æ•°æ®æºä¿¡æ¯-->
    <bean id="dataSource" class="com.mchange.v2.c3p0.ComboPooledDataSource">
        <property name="driverClass" value="${jdbc.driver}"></property>
        <property name="jdbcUrl" value="${jdbc.url}"></property>
        <property name="user" value="${jdbc.username}"></property>
        <property name="password" value="${jdbc.password}"></property>
    </bean>

    <!--é…ç½®sessionFactory - ä¸Mybatisé›†æˆ -->
    <bean id="sqlSessionFactory" class="org.mybatis.spring.SqlSessionFactoryBean">
        <!--å› ä¸ºæ¶‰åŠåˆ°äº‹åŠ¡çš„æäº¤å’Œè¿æ¥çš„å…³é—­ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥éœ€è¦æ•°æ®æº-->
        <property name="dataSource" ref="dataSource"></property>
        <!--åŠ è½½mybatisæ ¸å¿ƒæ–‡ä»¶-->
        <property name="configLocation" value="classpath:sqlMapConfig-spring.xml"></property>
		<!--ä»¥ä¸‹ä¸€å¥ä¸ºæˆ‘è‡ªå·±è¡¥å……çš„ï¼Œè¯¦æƒ…çœ‹æ–‡æœ«"è¡¥å……"-->
        <property name="mapperLocations" value="classpath:com.hugo.mapper/*Mapper.xml"></property>
    </bean>

    <!--æ‰«æmapperæ‰€åœ¨çš„åŒ… ä¸ºmapperåˆ›å»ºå®ç°ç±»(åœ¨serviceå°±å¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥æ³¨å…¥mapperæ¥å£äº†)-->
    <bean class="org.mybatis.spring.mapper.MapperScannerConfigurer">
        <property name="basePackage" value="com.itheima.mapper"></property>
    </bean>


    <!--å£°æ˜å¼äº‹åŠ¡æ§åˆ¶-->
    <!--å¹³å°äº‹åŠ¡ç®¡ç†å™¨-->
    <bean id="transactionManager" class="org.springframework.jdbc.datasource.DataSourceTransactionManager">
        <property name="dataSource" ref="dataSource"></property>
    </bean>

    <!--é…ç½®äº‹åŠ¡å¢å¼º-->
    <tx:advice id="txAdvice">
        <tx:attributes>
            <tx:method name="*"/>
        </tx:attributes>
    </tx:advice>

    <!--äº‹åŠ¡çš„aopç»‡å…¥-->
    <aop:config>
        <aop:advisor advice-ref="txAdvice" pointcut="execution(* com.itheima.service.impl.*.*(..))"></aop:advisor>
    </aop:config>

</beans>

druidè¿æ¥æ± æ•°æ®æºé…ç½®

<bean id="dataSource" class="com.alibaba.druid.pool.DruidDataSource">
    <property name="driverClassName" value="${jdbc.driver}"></property>
    <property name="url" value="${jdbc.url}"></property>
    <property name="username" value="${jdbc.username}"></property>
    <property name="password" value="${jdbc.password}"></property>
    <property name="initialSize" value="5"></property>
    <property name="maxActive" value="10"></property>
</bean>
jdbc.properties
jdbc.driver = com.mysql.jdbc.Driver
jdbc.url = jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/ssm?useUnicode=true&characterEncoding=utf8
jdbc.username = root
jdbc.password = 123456

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â æ³¨æ„è¦å°†è´¦å·å¯†ç ä¿®æ”¹æˆè‡ªå·±çš„ï¼Œè¿˜æœ‰ä¿®æ”¹è¿æ¥çš„æ•°æ®åº“urlã€‚

log4j.properties
### direct log messages to stdout ###
log4j.appender.stdout=org.apache.log4j.ConsoleAppender
log4j.appender.stdout.Target=System.out
log4j.appender.stdout.layout=org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout
log4j.appender.stdout.layout.ConversionPattern=%d{ABSOLUTE} %5p %c{1}:%L - %m%n

### direct messages to file mylog.log ###
log4j.appender.file=org.apache.log4j.FileAppender
log4j.appender.file.File=c:/mylog.log
log4j.appender.file.layout=org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout
log4j.appender.file.layout.ConversionPattern=%d{ABSOLUTE} %5p %c{1}:%L - %m%n

### set log levels - for more verbose logging change 'info' to 'debug' ###

log4j.rootLogger=all, stdout

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â å¦‚æœæƒ³çœ‹SQLè¯­å¥æˆ–å…¶ä»–è¯¦ç»†çš„è¿è¡Œè¿‡ç¨‹ï¼Œå¯ä»¥è®¾ç½®ä¸ºdebugæ¨¡å¼ï¼š

log4j.rootLogger=debug, stdout
spring-mvc.xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
       xmlns:mvc="http://www.springframework.org/schema/mvc"
       xmlns:context="http://www.springframework.org/schema/context"
       xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
       xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans
http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans.xsd
http://www.springframework.org/schema/mvc
http://www.springframework.org/schema/mvc/spring-mvc.xsd
http://www.springframework.org/schema/context
http://www.springframework.org/schema/context/spring-context.xsd">

    <!--ç»„ä»¶æ‰«æ  ä¸»è¦æ‰«æcontroller-->
    <context:component-scan base-package="com.itheima.controller"></context:component-scan>
    <!--é…ç½®mvcæ³¨è§£é©±åŠ¨-->
    <mvc:annotation-driven></mvc:annotation-driven>
    <!--å†…éƒ¨èµ„æºè§†å›¾è§£æå™¨-->
    <bean id="resourceViewResolver" class="org.springframework.web.servlet.view.InternalResourceViewResolver">
        <property name="prefix" value="/WEB-INF/pages/"></property>
        <property name="suffix" value=".jsp"></property>
    </bean>
    <!--å¼€å‘é™æ€èµ„æºè®¿é—®æƒé™-->
    <mvc:default-servlet-handler></mvc:default-servlet-handler>


</beans>

â€‹ éœ€è¦æ³¨æ„çš„å°±æ˜¯å¦‚æœè¿”å›çš„æ˜¯é‡å®šå‘æˆ–è¯·æ±‚è½¬å‘ï¼Œåˆ™å‰åç¼€ä¸èµ·ä½œç”¨ã€‚

sqlMapConfig-spring.xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<!DOCTYPE configuration
        PUBLIC "-//mybatis.org//DTD Config 3.0//EN"
        "http://mybatis.org/dtd/mybatis-3-config.dtd">
<configuration>

    <!--å®šä¹‰åˆ«å-->
    <typeAliases>
        <!--<typeAlias type="com.itheima.domain.Account" alias="account"></typeAlias>-->
        <package name="com.itheima.domain"></package><!--è‡ªåŠ¨ç»™è¿™ä¸ªåŒ…ä¸‹é¢æ‰€æœ‰çš„ç±»å–ä¸€ä¸ªåˆ«å-->
    </typeAliases>

</configuration>

è¡¥å……ï¼š

1.applicationContext.xmlé‡Œé¢çš„é…ç½®sessionFactoryåº”è¯¥è¿˜è¦é…ç½®åŠ è½½æ˜ å°„æ–‡ä»¶

2.applicationContext.xmlé‡Œé¢å¦‚æœä½¿ç”¨druidè¿æ¥æ± è¯·çœ‹æ³¨é‡Šæ‰çš„éƒ¨åˆ†

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
       xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
       xmlns:aop="http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop"
       xmlns:tx="http://www.springframework.org/schema/tx"
       xmlns:context="http://www.springframework.org/schema/context"
       xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans
http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans.xsd
http://www.springframework.org/schema/tx
http://www.springframework.org/schema/tx/spring-tx.xsd
http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop
http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop/spring-aop.xsd
http://www.springframework.org/schema/context
http://www.springframework.org/schema/context/spring-context.xsd">

    <!--ç»„ä»¶æ‰«æ æ‰«æserviceå’Œmapper-->
    <context:component-scan base-package="com.hugo">
        <!--æ’é™¤controllerçš„æ‰«æ,è®©springMVCå»æ‰«æ-->
        <context:exclude-filter type="annotation" expression="org.springframework.stereotype.Controller"></context:exclude-filter>
    </context:component-scan>

    <!--åŠ è½½propetiesæ–‡ä»¶-->
    <context:property-placeholder location="classpath:jdbc.properties"></context:property-placeholder>

    <!--é…ç½®æ•°æ®æºä¿¡æ¯-->
    <bean id="dataSource" class="com.mchange.v2.c3p0.ComboPooledDataSource">
        <property name="driverClass" value="${jdbc.driver}"></property>
        <property name="jdbcUrl" value="${jdbc.url}"></property>
        <property name="user" value="${jdbc.username}"></property>
        <property name="password" value="${jdbc.password}"></property>
    </bean>
<!--    <bean id="dataSource" class="com.alibaba.druid.pool.DruidDataSource">
        <property name="driverClassName" value="${jdbc.driver}"></property>
        <property name="url" value="${jdbc.url}"></property>
        <property name="username" value="${jdbc.username}"></property>
        <property name="password" value="${jdbc.password}"></property>
        <property name="initialSize" value="5"></property>
        <property name="maxActive" value="10"></property>
    </bean>-->

    <!--é…ç½®sessionFactory - ä¸Mybatisé›†æˆ -->
    <bean id="sqlSessionFactory" class="org.mybatis.spring.SqlSessionFactoryBean">
        <!--å› ä¸ºæ¶‰åŠåˆ°äº‹åŠ¡çš„æäº¤å’Œè¿æ¥çš„å…³é—­ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥éœ€è¦æ•°æ®æº-->
        <property name="dataSource" ref="dataSource"></property>
        <!--åŠ è½½mybatisæ ¸å¿ƒæ–‡ä»¶-->
        <property name="configLocation" value="classpath:sqlMapConfig-spring.xml"></property>
        <!--åŠ è½½æ˜ å°„æ–‡ä»¶-->
        <property name="mapperLocations" value="classpath:com.hugo.mapper/*Mapper.xml"></property>
    </bean>

    <!--æ‰«æmapperæ‰€åœ¨çš„åŒ… ä¸ºmapperåˆ›å»ºå®ç°ç±»(åœ¨serviceå°±å¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥æ³¨å…¥mapperæ¥å£äº†)-->
    <bean class="org.mybatis.spring.mapper.MapperScannerConfigurer">
        <property name="basePackage" value="com.hugo.mapper"></property>
    </bean>


    <!--å£°æ˜å¼äº‹åŠ¡æ§åˆ¶-->
    <!--å¹³å°äº‹åŠ¡ç®¡ç†å™¨-->
    <bean id="transactionManager" class="org.springframework.jdbc.datasource.DataSourceTransactionManager">
        <property name="dataSource" ref="dataSource"></property>
    </bean>

    <!--é…ç½®äº‹åŠ¡å¢å¼º-->
    <tx:advice id="txAdvice">
        <tx:attributes>
            <tx:method name="*"/>
        </tx:attributes>
    </tx:advice>

    <!--äº‹åŠ¡çš„aopç»‡å…¥-->
    <aop:config>
        <aop:advisor advice-ref="txAdvice" pointcut="execution(* com.hugo.service.impl.*.*(..))"></aop:advisor>
    </aop:config>

</beans>

æœ€è¿‘æ›´æ–°ï¼š2022/7/13 15:23
